## <a name="gx_canvas_memory_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2075">gx_canvas_memory_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2075">gx_canvas_memory_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2076">キャンバス メモリを定義します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2076">Define canvas memory</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2077">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2077">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_memory_define(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_COLOR *memory,
    ULONG memsize);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2078">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2078">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2079">このサービスを使用して、キャンバスの作成後にキャンバス メモリ アドレスを割り当てることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2079">This service can be used to assign the canvas memory address after the canvas has been created.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2080">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2080">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2081">**canvas** 以前に作成したキャンバスへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2081">**canvas** Pointer to previously created canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2082">**memory** キャンバス メモリ アドレス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2082">**memory** Canvas memory address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2083">**memsize** キャンバス メモリ ブロックのサイズ (バイト単位)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2083">**memsize** Size of the canvas memory block in bytes</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2084">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2084">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2085">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 割り当てが成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2085">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful assignment</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2086">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) コントロール ブロックが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2086">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2087">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2087">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2088">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2088">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2089">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2089">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2090">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2090">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Assign canvas memory block. */
status = gx_canvas_memory_define(canvas,
    (GX_COLOR *) DRAM_MEMORY,
    (640 * 480 * 2));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the canvas memory pointer has be
reassigned. */

```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2091">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2091">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2092">gx_canvas_create、</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2092">gx_canvas_create,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2093">gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2093">gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_mouse_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2094">gx_canvas_mouse_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2094">gx_canvas_mouse_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2095">マウス カーソルの画像を定義します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2095">Define the mouse cursor image</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2096">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2096">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_mouse_define(GX_CANVAS *canvas,
    GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2097">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2097">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2098">このサービスは、指定されたキャンバスのマウス情報を定義します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2098">This service defines mouse information for the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2099">このサービスでは GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT を定義する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2099">This service requires GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2100">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2100">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2101">**canvas** キャンバス コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2101">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2102">**info** マウス カーソル情報へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2102">**info** Pointer to mouse cursor information.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2103">**付録 I** には GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO 構造体の定義が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2103">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2104">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2104">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2105">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) マウス情報の設定が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2105">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful mouse info set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2106">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2106">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2107">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2107">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2108">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2108">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2109">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2109">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2110">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2110">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set mouse cursor info. */
GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO mouse_cursor;
mouse_cursor.gx_mouse_cursor_image_id = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_MOUSE;
mouse_cursor.gx_mouse_cursor_hotspot_x = 0;
mouse_cursor.gx_mouse_cursor_hotspot_y = 0;

status = gx_canvas_mouse_define(&my_canvas, &mouse_cursor);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the mouse info of “my_canvas” has been
set successfully. */

```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2111">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2111">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2112">gx_canvas_mouse_show、</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2112">gx_canvas_mouse_show,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2113">gx_canvas_mouse_hide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2113">gx_canvas_mouse_hide</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_mouse_hide"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2114">gx_canvas_mouse_hide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2114">gx_canvas_mouse_hide</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2115">マウス カーソルをオフにします</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2115">Turn off the mouse cursor</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2116">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2116">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_mouse_hide(GX_CANVAS *canvas);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2117">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2117">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2118">このサービスは、指定されたキャンバスでマウス カーソルを非表示にします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2118">This service makes the mouse cursor hidden from the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2119">このサービスでは GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT を定義する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2119">This service requires GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2120">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2120">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2121">**canvas** キャンバス コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2121">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2122">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2122">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2123">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) マウス カーソルの非表示が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2123">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful mouse cursor hide</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2124">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) マウス カーソルの非表示が失敗しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2124">**GX_FAILURE** (0X10) Failed mouse cursor hide</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2125">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2125">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2126">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2126">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>


### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2127">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2127">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2128">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2128">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2129">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2129">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Hide the mouse cursor. */
status = gx_canvas_mouse_hide(&my_canvas);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the mouse cursor of “my_canvas” has been
hidden successfully. */

```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2130">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2130">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2131">gx_canvas_mouse_show、</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2131">gx_canvas_mouse_show,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2132">gx_canvas_mouse_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2132">gx_canvas_mouse_define</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_mouse_show"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2133">gx_canvas_mouse_show</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2133">gx_canvas_mouse_show</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2134">マウス カーソルをオンにします</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2134">Turn on the mouse cursor</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2135">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2135">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_mouse_show(GX_CANVAS *canvas);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2136">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2136">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2137">このサービスは、指定されたキャンバスでマウス カーソルを表示します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2137">This service makes the mouse cursor visible for the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2138">このサービスでは GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT を定義する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2138">This service requires GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2139">このサービスが要求される前に、gx_canvas_mouse_define API を呼び出して、マウス カーソルの画像を定義する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2139">The gx_canvas_mouse_define API should be invoked to define the mouse cursor image before this service is requested.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2140">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2140">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2141">**canvas** キャンバス コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2141">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2142">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2142">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2143">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) マウス情報の設定が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2143">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful mouse info set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2144">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) マウス カーソルの表示が失敗しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2144">**GX_FAILURE** (0X10) Failed mouse cursor show</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2145">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2145">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2146">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2146">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2147">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2147">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2148">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2148">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2149">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2149">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Make mouse cursor hidden ”. */
status = gx_canvas_mouse_show(&my_canvas);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the mouse of “my_canvas” has been
hidden successfully. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2150">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2150">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2151">gx_canvas_mouse_show、</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2151">gx_canvas_mouse_show,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2152">gx_canvas_mouse_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2152">gx_canvas_mouse_define</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_offset_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2153">gx_canvas_offset_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2153">gx_canvas_offset_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2154">キャンバスの X、Y 表示オフセットを割り当てます</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2154">Assign canvas x,y display offset</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2155">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2155">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_offset_set(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas,
    GX_VALUE x, 
    GX_VALUE y);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2156">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2156">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2157">このサービスは、指定されたキャンバスに X、Y 表示オフセットを割り当てます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2157">This service assigns an x,y display offset for the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2158">これは、表示されているフレーム バッファーにキャンバスが合成される位置を制御し、多くの場合、キャンバスが物理的な画面より小さい場合に使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2158">This controls the position at which the canvas is composited into the visible frame buffer, and is often used when the canvas is smaller than the physical display.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2159">キャンバスが gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() API を使用してハードウェアのグラフィックス レイヤーにバインドされている場合、gx_canvas_offset_set サービスがハードウェア サポートを使用して直接実装されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2159">If the canvas has been bound to a hardware graphics layer using the gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() API, the gx_canvas_offset_set service is implemented directly using hardware support.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2160">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2160">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2161">**canvas** キャンバス コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2161">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2162">**x** オフセットの X 座標</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2162">**x** X coordinate of offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2163">**y** オフセットの Y 座標</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2163">**y** Y coordinate of offset</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2164">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2164">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2165">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) オフセットの割り当てが成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2165">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful assignment of offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2166">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2166">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2167">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2167">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_pie_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2181">gx_canvas_pie_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2181">gx_canvas_pie_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2182">円を描画します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2182">Draw pie</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2183">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2183">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pie_draw(
    INT xcenter, 
    INT ycenter,
    UINT r, 
    INT start_angle, 
    INT end_angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2184">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2184">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2185">このサービスは、現在の描画コンテキスト ブラシを使用してキャンバスに円を描画します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2185">This service draws a pie into the canvas using the current drawing context brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2186">この円はキャンバスの無効な領域にクリップされます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2186">The pie is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2187">このサービスでは、構成オプション GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT を定義する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2187">This service requires the configuration option GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2188">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2188">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2189">**xcenter** 円の中心の X 位置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2189">**xcenter** x-position of center of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2190">**ycenter** 円の中心の Y 位置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2190">**ycenter** y-position of center of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2191">**r** 円の半径</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2191">**r** Radius of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2192">**start_angle** 円の開始角度</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2192">**start_angle** Starting angle of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2193">**end_angle** 円の終了角度</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2193">**end_angle** Ending angle of the pie</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2194">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2194">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2195">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 円弧の描画が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2195">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful arc draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2196">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2196">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2197">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) 値が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2197">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2198">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) 開いている描画コンテキストがありません</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2198">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2199">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2199">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2200">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2200">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2201">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2201">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw a pie from 0 degree to 90 degree in clockwise. */
status = gx_canvas_pie_draw(100, 100, 50, 0, 90);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pie has been drawn to canvas. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_pixel_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2214">gx_canvas_pixel_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2214">gx_canvas_pixel_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2215">ピクセルを描画します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2215">Draw pixel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2216">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2216">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pixel_draw(GX_POINT position);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2217">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2217">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2218">このサービスは、現在の描画コンテキスト ブラシの線の色を使用してキャンバスにピクセルを描画します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2218">This service draws a pixel on the canvas using the line color of the current drawing context brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2219">構成オプション GX_BRUSH_ALPHA_SUPPORT が定義されている場合は、ピクセルをブレンドします。それ以外の場合は、完全に不透明になるようにピクセルを描画します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2219">If configuration option GX_BRUSH_ALPHA_SUPPORT is defined, blend the pixel with the otherwise, draw the pixel as fully opaque.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2220">**point** 描画するピクセルの X、Y 位置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2220">**point** x,y position of pixel to draw</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2221">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2221">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2222">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) ピクセルマップの描画が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2222">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2223">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2223">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2224">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) 開いている描画コンテキストがありません</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2224">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2225">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2225">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2226">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2226">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2227">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2227">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_POINT point; /* the x,y position you want to draw to */
GX_RECTANGLE drawto; /* the rectangle bounding your drawing */
GX_CANVAS *mycanvas; /* the canvas you want to draw to */

/* calculate 1x1 pixel drawing area: */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&drawto,
    point.gx_point_x, point.gx_point_y,
    point.gx_point_x, point.gx_point_y);

/* get my canvas: */
gx_widget_canvas_get(win, &mycanvas);

/* open my canvas for drawing: */
gx_canvas_drawing_initiate(mycanvas, win, &drawto);

/* setup my brush colors. Use any color ID in your resources: */
gx_context_line_color_set(GX_COLOR_ID_WINDOW_BORDER);

/* draw a pixel: */
status = gx_canvas_pixel_draw(point);

/* close the canvas: */
gx_canvas_drawing_complete(mycanvas, GX_TRUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pixel was successfully drawn to mycanvas. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2232">gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2232">gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2233">ピクセルマップをブレンドします</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2233">Blend pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2234">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2234">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend(
    GX_VALUE x_position,
    GX_VALUE y_position, 
    GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap, 
    GX_UBYTE alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2235">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2235">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2236">このサービスは、ピクセルマップをキャンバスの背景とブレンドします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2236">This service blends a pixelmap with the canvas background.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2237">ブレンド比率は、呼び出し元によって指定されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2237">The blending ratio is specified by the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2238">アルファ値は 0 (完全に透明) から 255 (完全に不透明) までの範囲にすることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2238">The alpha value can range from 0 (fully transparent) to 255 (fully opaque).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2239">ピクセルマップには、内部アルファ チャネルを含めることもできます。これは、入力されたブレンド値と結合されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2239">The pixelmap may also include an internal alpha channel, which is combined with the incoming blending value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2240">このサービスは、16 bpp 以上の色深度で実行されているディスプレイ ドライバーでのみサポートされます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2240">This service is only supported by display drivers running at 16-bpp color depth and higher.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2241">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2241">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2242">**x_start** ピクセルマップの開始の X 位置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2242">**x_start** Starting x-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2243">**y_end** ピクセルマップの開始の Y 位置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2243">**y_end** Starting y-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2244">**pixelmap** ピクセルマップへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2244">**pixelmap** Pointer to pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2245">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2245">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2246">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) ピクセルマップの描画が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2246">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2247">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2247">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2248">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2248">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2249">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) サポートされていません</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2249">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2250">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) 開いている描画コンテキストがありません</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2250">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2251">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2251">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2252">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2252">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2253">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2253">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw pixelmap on active canvas */

GX_PIXELMAP *map;
gx_system_pixelmap_get(ID_MY_PIXELMAP, &map);

status = gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend(10, 20, map, 128);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap has been blended onto the current canvas. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2259">gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2259">gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2260">ピクセルマップを描画します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2260">Draw pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2261">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2261">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(
    GX_VALUE x_position, 
    GX_VALUE y_position,
    GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2262">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2262">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2263">このサービスは、キャンバスにピクセルマップを描画します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2263">This service draws a pixelmap on the canvas.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2264">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2264">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2265">**x_start** ピクセルマップの開始の X 位置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2265">**x_start** Starting x-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2266">**y_end** ピクセルマップの開始の Y 位置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2266">**y_end** Starting y-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2267">**pixelmap** ピクセルマップへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2267">**pixelmap** Pointer to pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2268">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2268">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2269">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) ピクセルマップの描画が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2269">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2270">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2270">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2271">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2271">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2272">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) 開いている描画コンテキストがありません</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2272">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2273">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2273">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* Draw pixelmap on canvas. */

```

## <a name="gx_canvas_pixelmap_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2281">gx_canvas_pixelmap_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2281">gx_canvas_pixelmap_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2282">キャンバスのピクセルマップを取得します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2282">Get canvas pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2283">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2283">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pixelmap_get(GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2284">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2284">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2285">このサービスは、キャンバス データを指す GX_PIXELMAP 構造体を返します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2285">This service returns a GX_PIXELMAP structure pointing to the canvas data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2286">ピクセルマップ形式は、現在の表示色の形式に設定されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2286">The pixelmap format is set to the current display color format.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2287">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2287">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2288">**pixelmap** 返されたピクセルマップ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2288">**pixelmap** Returned pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2289">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2289">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2290">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) ピクセルマップの取得が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2290">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2291">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2291">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2292">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2292">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2293">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2293">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2294">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2294">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw pixelmap on active canvas */

GX_PIXELMAP *map;

status = gx_canvas_pixelmap_get(map);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap has been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2299">gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2299">gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2300">回転したピクセルマップを描画します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2300">Draw rotated pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2301">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2301">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate(
    GX_VALUE x_position, 
    GX_VALUE y_position,
    GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap, 
    INT angle,
    INT rot_cx, 
    INT rot_cy);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2302">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2302">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2303">このサービスは、指定された角度でピクセルマップを回転し、回転が行われるときに、ピクセルマップをキャンバスに直接レンダリングします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2303">This service rotates a pixelmap at the specified angle and renders the pixelmap to the canvas directly as the rotation is performed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2304">このサービスは、回転の出力がキャンバス メモリに直接レンダリングされ、回転したピクセルマップが呼び出し元に返されないという点で gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate とは異なります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2304">This service differs from gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate in that the output of the rotation is directly rendered to the canvas memory, and the rotated pixelmap is not returned to the caller.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2305">このサービスが gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate より優れている点は、回転したピクセルマップを保持するために追加のメモリが必要ないことです。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2305">The advantage of this service over gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate is that no additional memory is required to hold the rotated pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2306">欠点は、ピクセルマップを描画するたびに回転コードを実行しなければならないことです。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2306">The disadvantage is that the rotation code must be executed each time the pixelmap is drawn.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2307">クリッピングとビューポートの検証は、回転したピクセルマップのレンダリング中に実施されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2307">Clipping and viewport validation are enforced during rendering of the rotated pixelmap.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2308">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2308">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2309">**x_position** ピクセルマップの開始 X 位置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2309">**x_position** Starting x-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2310">**y_position** ピクセルマップの開始 Y 位置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2310">**y_position** Starting y-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2311">**pixelmap** ピクセルマップへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2311">**pixelmap** Pointer to pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2312">**angle** 回転する角度</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2312">**angle** Angle to rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2313">**rot_cx** 回転の中心の X 座標。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2313">**rot_cx** X-coord of center of rotation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2314">この値が -1 に設定されている場合、画像の中心が回転の中心として使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2314">If this value is set to -1, the center of the image is used as the rotation center.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2315">**rot_cy** 回転の中心の Y 座標。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2315">**rot_cy** Y-coord of center of rotation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2316">この値が -1 に設定されている場合、画像の中心が回転の中心として使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2316">If this value is set to -1, the center of the image is used as the center of rotation.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2317">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2317">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2318">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) ピクセルマップの描画が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2318">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2319">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2319">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2320">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2320">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2321">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) 開いている描画コンテキストがありません</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2321">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2322">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2322">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2323">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2323">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2324">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2324">Example</span></span>

```C
/* rotate “src_pixelmap” by 30 degree in clockwise direction and draw in on canvas. */
status = gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate(10, 20, &my_pixelmap, 30,
    -1, -1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the rotated pixelmap “my_pixelmap” has been drawn. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2325">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2325">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2328">gx_canvas_pixelmap_tile、</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2328">gx_canvas_pixelmap_tile,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2329">gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2329">gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_pixelmap_tile"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2330">gx_canvas_pixelmap_tile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2330">gx_canvas_pixelmap_tile</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2331">ピクセルマップをタイル表示します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2331">Tile pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2332">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2332">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pixelmap_tile(
    GX_RECTANGLE *fill,
    GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2333">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2333">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2334">このサービスは、要求されたピクセルマップを使用して、キャンバス内の四角形を塗りつぶします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2334">This service fills a rectangle within a canvas with the requested pixelmap.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2335">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2335">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2336">**fill** ピクセルマップを使用してタイル表示する領域</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2336">**fill** Area to tile with pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2337">**pixelmap** ピクセルマップへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2337">**pixelmap** Pointer to pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2338">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2338">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2339">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) ピクセルのタイル表示が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2339">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap tile</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2340">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2340">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2341">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2341">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2342">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) 開いている描画コンテキストがありません</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2342">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2343">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) 塗りつぶしのサイズが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2343">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid fill size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2344">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2344">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2345">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2345">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap “my_pixelmap” has been tiled on canvas */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_polygon_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2352">gx_canvas_polygon_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2352">gx_canvas_polygon_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2353">多角形を描画します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2353">Draw polygon</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2354">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2354">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_polygon_draw(
    GX_POINT *point_array,
    INT number_of_points);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2355">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2355">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2356">このサービスは、現在の描画コンテキスト ブラシを使用してキャンバスに多角形を描画します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2356">This service draws a polygon on the canvas using the current drawing context brush.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2357">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2357">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2358">**point_array** 多角形の点の配列</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2358">**point_array** Array of points of the polygon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2359">**number_of_points** 多角形の点の数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2359">**number_of_points** Number of points of polygon</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2360">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2360">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2361">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 多角形の描画が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2361">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful polygon draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2362">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2362">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2363">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2363">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2364">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) 開いている描画コンテキストがありません</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2364">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2365">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2365">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2366">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2366">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2367">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2367">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_POINT my_polygon[4] =
{
    { 208, 63 },
    { 274, 63 },
    { 274, 163 },
    { 208, 163 }
};

/* Draw polygon “my_polygon” on canvas. */
status = gx_canvas_polygon_draw(&my_polygon, 4);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the polygon “my_polygon” has been drawn. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2407">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2407">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2408">中心点の周りを回転するテキストを描画します (非推奨)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2408">Draw text rotated about a center point (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2409">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2409">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw(
    const GX_CHAR *text,
    GX_VALUE xCenter, 
    GX_VALUE yCenter, 
    INT angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2410">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2410">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2411">この API は非推奨になっていて、gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext() の使用が推奨されています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2411">This API has been deprecated in favor or gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext().</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2412">引き続きサポートされますが、新しいアプリケーションではこの API を使用せず、代わりに gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext() を使用する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2412">While still supported, new applications should not use this API and should instead use gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2413">このサービスは、テキストをキャンバスに描画します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2413">This service draws text to the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2414">テキストは、要求された中心点の周りを回転するように描画されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2414">The text is drawn rotated about the requested center point.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2415">テキストのレンダリングには、現在の描画コンテキストのフォントと描画コンテキストの線の色が使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2415">The current drawing context font and drawing context line color is used to render the text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2416">このサービスは、関数 gx_utility_string_to_alphamap を使用して、アルファ値のみを含む一時的な 8bpp ピクセルマップにテキスト文字列をレンダリングします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2416">This service uses the function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap to render the text string to a temporary 8bpp pixelmap containing only alpha value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2417">その後このサービスは、関数 gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate 使用して alphamap を回転させます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2417">The service then rotates the alphamap using the function gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2418">最終的な alphamap がキャンバスにレンダリングされると、このサービスは一時的な alphamap と関連付けられているメモリを解放します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2418">After the final alphamap is rendered to the canvas, this service frees the temporary alphamap and associated memory.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2419">回転するテキストをレンダリングするには一時的な alphamap が必要であるため、アプリケーションでは、回転するテキストの描画を試みる前に、gx_system_memory_allocator_set() API を呼び出して gx_system_memory_allocator を構成する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2419">Since a temporary alphamap is required to render rotated text, the application must configure the gx_system_memory_allocator by the calling gx_system_memory_allocator_set() API before attempting to draw rotated text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2420">このサービスは、回転するテキストを "1 回だけ" レンダリングする場合にのみ使用してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2420">This service should only be used to render rotated text “one time”.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2421">同じテキスト文字列を異なる場所または異なる回転角度で複数回描画する場合は、ユーティリティ関数 gx_utility_string_to_alphamap() を使用してテキスト alphamap を 1 回作成してから、gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate を複数回使用して、結果の alphamap を繰り返し回転させることで、効率が高まります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2421">If the same text string will be drawn multiple times at different locations or different rotation angles, it is more efficient to use the utility function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap() to create the text alphamap once, then use gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate multiple times to rotate the resulting alphamap repeatedly.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2422">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2422">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2423">**text** 描画されるテキスト文字列</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2423">**text** Text string to be drawn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2424">**xCenter** 回転するテキストの中心となる位置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2424">**xCenter** Center positon around which text will be rotated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2425">**yCenter** 回転するテキストの中心となる位置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2425">**yCenter** Center position around which text will be rotated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2426">**angle** 目的のテキストの回転角度 (度単位)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2426">**angle** The desired text rotation angle, in degrees.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2427">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2427">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2428">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) テキストのレンダリングが成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2428">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text rendering</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2429">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2429">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2430">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2430">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2431">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) 使用できるメモリが不十分であるか、gx_system_memory_allocator が割り当てられていません</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2431">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Insufficient memory available or gx_system_memory_allocator has not been assigned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2432">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) 文字列の長さが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2432">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2433">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2433">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2434">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2434">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2435">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2435">Example</span></span>

```C
void my_window_draw(GX_WINDOW *window)
{

    GX_VALUE xpos = 100;
    GX_VALUE ypos = 100;
    INT dynamic_count = 1234567;
    GX_CHAR dynamic_text[10];

    /* Call default window draw routine. */
    gx_window_draw(window);

    /* Set font. */
    gx_context_font_set(GX_FONT_ID_SMALL_BOLD);

    /* Convert int value to string. */
    gx_utility_ltoa(dynamic_count, dynamic_text, 20);

    /* Draw rotate text. */
    gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw(dynamic_text, xpos, ypos, 45);
}
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2443">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2443">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2444">中心点の周りを回転するテキストを描画します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2444">Draw text rotated about a center point</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2445">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2445">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_CONST GX_STRING *text,
    GX_VALUE xCenter, 
    GX_VALUE yCenter, 
    INT angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2446">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2446">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2447">このサービスは、テキストをキャンバスに描画します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2447">This service draws text to the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2448">テキストは、要求された中心点の周りを回転するように描画されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2448">The text is drawn rotated about the requested center point.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2449">テキストのレンダリングには、現在の描画コンテキストのフォントと描画コンテキストの線の色が使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2449">The current drawing context font and drawing context line color is used to render the text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2450">このサービスは、関数 gx_utility_string_to_alphamap を使用して、アルファ値のみを含む一時的な 8bpp ピクセルマップにテキスト文字列をレンダリングします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2450">This service uses the function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap to render the text string to a temporary 8bpp pixelmap containing only alpha value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2451">その後このサービスは、関数 gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate 使用して alphamap を回転させます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2451">The service then rotates the alphamap using the function gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2452">最終的な alphamap がキャンバスにレンダリングされると、このサービスは一時的な alphamap と関連付けられているメモリを解放します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2452">After the final alphamap is rendered to the canvas, this service frees the temporary alphamap and associated memory.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2453">回転するテキストをレンダリングするには一時的な alphamap が必要であるため、アプリケーションでは、回転するテキストの描画を試みる前に、***gx_system_memory_allocator_set()*** API を呼び出して gx_system_memory_allocator を構成する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2453">Since a temporary alphamap is required to render rotated text, the application must configure the gx_system_memory_allocator by the calling ***gx_system_memory_allocator_set*** API before attempting to draw rotated text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2454">このサービスは、回転するテキストを "1 回だけ" レンダリングする場合にのみ使用してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2454">This service should only be used to render rotated text “one time”.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2455">同じテキスト文字列を異なる場所または異なる回転角度で複数回描画する場合は、ユーティリティ関数 gx_utility_string_to_alphamap() を使用してテキスト alphamap を 1 回作成してから、gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate を複数回使用して、結果の alphamap を繰り返し回転させることで、効率が高まります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2455">If the same text string will be drawn multiple times at different locations or different rotation angles, it is more efficient to use the utility function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap() to create the text alphamap once, then use gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate multiple times to rotate the resulting alphamap repeatedly.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2456">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2456">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2457">**text** 描画されるテキスト文字列</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2457">**text** Text string to be drawn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2458">**xCenter** 回転するテキストの中心となる位置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2458">**xCenter** Center positon around which text will be rotated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2459">**yCenter** 回転するテキストの中心となる位置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2459">**yCenter** Center position around which text will be rotated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2460">**angle** 目的のテキストの回転角度 (度単位)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2460">**angle** The desired text rotation angle, in degrees.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2461">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2461">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2462">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) テキストのレンダリングが成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2462">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text rendering</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2463">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2463">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2464">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2464">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2465">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) 描画コンテキストが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2465">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Invalid draw context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2466">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) 使用できるメモリが不十分であるか、gx_system_memory_allocator が割り当てられていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2466">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Insufficient memory available or gx_system_memory_allocator has not been assigned.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2467">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) 文字列の長さが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2467">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2468">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2468">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2469">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2469">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2470">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2470">Example</span></span>

```C
void my_window_draw(GX_WINDOW *window)
{

    GX_VALUE xpos = 100;
    GX_VALUE ypos = 100;
    INT dynamic_count = 1234567;
    GX_CHAR dynamic_text[10];
    GX_STRING string;

    /* Call default window draw routine. */
    gx_window_draw(window);

    /* Set font. */
    gx_context_font_set(GX_FONT_ID_SMALL_BOLD);

    /* Convert int value to string. */
    gx_utility_ltoa(dynamic_count, dynamic_text, 20);

    string.gx_string_ptr = dynamic_text;
    string.gx_string_length = strlen(dynamic_text);

    /* Draw rotate text. */
    gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext(&string, xpos, ypos, 45);
}
```

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2476">gx_canvas_offset_set、</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2476">gx_canvas_offset_set,</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_shift"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2478">gx_canvas_shift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2478">gx_canvas_shift</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2479">X、Y でキャンバスをシフトします</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2479">Shift canvas by x,y</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2480">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2480">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_shift(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_VALUE x, GX_VALUE y);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2481">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2481">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2482">このサービスは、指定されたキャンバス オフセットを指定された量だけシフトします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2482">This service shifts the specified canvas offset by the specified amount.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2483">これは、表示されているフレーム バッファー内のキャンバスがレンダリングされる位置に影響します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2483">This affects the position at which the canvas is rendered within the visible frame buffer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2484">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2484">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2485">**canvas** キャンバス コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2485">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2486">**x** X 軸上でシフトするピクセル</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2486">**x** Pixels to shift on the X axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2487">**y** Y 軸上でシフトするピクセル</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2487">**y** Pixels to shift on the Y axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2488">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2488">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2489">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) キャンバスのシフトが成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2489">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful canvas shift</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2490">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2490">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2491">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2491">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2492">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) キャンバスが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2492">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2493">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2493">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2494">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2494">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2495">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2495">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Shift canvas “my_canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_shift(&my_canvas, 10, 15);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas has been shifted by 10 pixels
    on the X axis and 15 on the Y axis. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2496">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2496">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2497">gx_canvas_drawing_complete、</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2497">gx_canvas_drawing_complete,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2498">gx_canvas_initiate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2498">gx_canvas_initiate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2499">gx_canvas_alpha_set、</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2499">gx_canvas_alpha_set,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2500">gx_canvas_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2500">gx_canvas_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2501">gx_canvas_offset_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2501">gx_canvas_offset_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_show"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2502">gx_canvas_show</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2502">gx_canvas_show</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2503">キャンバスを表示します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2503">Make a canvas visible</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2504">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2504">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_show(GX_CANVAS *canvas);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2505">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2505">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2506">このサービスは、キャンバスを表示します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2506">This service makes a canvas visible.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2507">キャンバスが事前に gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() API を使用してハードウェアのグラフィックス レイヤーにバインドされている場合、gx_canvas_show() サービスがハードウェア サポートを使用して直接実装されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2507">If the canvas has been previously bound to a hardware graphics layer using the gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() API, the gx_canvas_show() service is implemented directly using hardware support.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2508">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2508">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2509">**canvas** キャンバス コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2509">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2510">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2510">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2511">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) オフセットの割り当てが成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2511">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful assignment of offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2512">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2512">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2513">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2513">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2514">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) キャンバスが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2514">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2515">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2515">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2516">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2516">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2517">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2517">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Make this canvas visible. */
status = gx_canvas_show(&my_canvas);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas drawing is now visible */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2522">gx_canvas_initiate、</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2522">gx_canvas_initiate,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2523">gx_canvas_shift、</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2523">gx_canvas_shift,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2524">gx_canvas_hide、</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2524">gx_canvas_hide,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2525">gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2525">gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2526">gx_canvas_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2526">gx_canvas_text_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2527">テキストを描画します (非推奨)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2527">Draw text (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2528">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2528">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_text_draw(
    GX_VALUE x_start, 
    GX_VALUE y_start,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *string, 
    INT length);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2529">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2529">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2530">このサービスは、テキストをキャンバスに描画します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2530">This service draws text on the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2531">この API は引き続きサポートされますが、非推奨であり、新しいアプリケーションでは、代わりに gx_canvas_text_draw_ext() を使用する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2531">This API, while still supported, is deprecated and new applications should instead use gx_canvas_text_draw_ext().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2532">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2532">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2533">**x_start** テキストの開始の X 座標</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2533">**x_start** Starting x-coordinate for text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2534">**y_start** テキストの開始の Y 座標</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2534">**y_start** Starting y-coordinate for text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2535">**string** 描画する文字列へのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2535">**string** Pointer to string to draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2536">**length** length >= 0 である場合は、描画する文字数を length に制限します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2536">**length** If length >= 0, limits the number of characters drawn to length.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2537">length < 0 である場合、NULL ターミネータが描画されるまでの文字列全体です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2537">If length < 0, the entire string until NULL terminator is drawn.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2538">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2538">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2539">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) テキストの描画が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2539">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2540">**GX_FAILURE** (0x1E) テキストの描画が失敗しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2540">**GX_FAILURE** (0x1E) Failed text draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2541">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2541">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2542">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2542">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2543">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) 開いている描画コンテキストがありません</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2543">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2544">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) 文字列の長さが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2544">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2545">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2545">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2546">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2546">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2547">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2547">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw text “example” on current canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_text_draw(10, 20, “example”, 7);

/* Draw all of a string of unknown length on the current canvas */
status = gx_canvas_text_draw(10, 40, string_ptr, -1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text “example” has been drawn. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_text_draw_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2560">gx_canvas_text_draw_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2560">gx_canvas_text_draw_ext</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2562">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2562">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(
    GX_VALUE x_start, 
    GX_VALUE y_start,
    GX_CONST GX_STRING *string);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2568">**string** 描画する文字列へのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2568">**string** Pointer to string to draw</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2569">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2569">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2570">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) テキストの描画が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2570">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2571">**GX_FAILURE** (0x1E) テキストの描画が失敗しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2571">**GX_FAILURE** (0x1E) Failed text draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2572">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2572">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2573">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2573">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2574">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) 開いている描画コンテキストがありません</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2574">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2575">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) 文字列の長さが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2575">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2576">**GX_INVALID_FONT** (0x16) フォントが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2576">**GX_INVALID_FONT** (0x16) Invalid font</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2577">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2577">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2578">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2578">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2579">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2579">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_STRING string;
string.gx_string_ptr = “example”;
string.gx_string_length = 7;

```
