## <a name="gx_checkbox_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2592">gx_checkbox_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2592">gx_checkbox_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2593">チェックボックスを作成します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2593">Create checkbox</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2594">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2594">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_checkbox_create(
    GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT checkbox_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2595">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2595">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2596">このサービスは、指定されたプロパティを使用してチェックボックス ウィジェットを作成します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2596">This service creates a checkbox widget with the specified properties.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2597">GX_CHECKBOX は GX_TEXT_BUTTON から派生し、GX_CHECKBOX ウィジェットではすべての gx_text_button サービスを使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2597">GX_CHECKBOX is derived from GX_TEXT_BUTTON, and all gx_text_button services may be used with GX_CHECKBOX widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2598">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2598">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2599">**checkbox** チェックボックス コントロール ブロックへのポインター。name: チェックボックス ウイジェットの論理名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2599">**checkbox** Pointer to checkbox control block name Logical name of checkbox widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2600">**parent** 親ウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2600">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2601">**text_id** チェックボックスのテキストのリソース ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2601">**text_id** Resource ID of checkbox text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2602">**style** チェックボックスのスタイル。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2602">**style** Style of checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2603">**付録 D** には、ウィジェット固有のスタイルだけでなく、すべてのウィジェット用に事前に定義されている一般的なスタイルが記載されています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2603">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2604">**checkbox_id** アプリケーションで定義されたチェックボックスの ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2604">**checkbox_id** Application-defined ID of checkbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2605">**size** チェックボックスの大きさ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2605">**size** Dimensions of checkbox</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2606">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2606">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2607">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) チェックボックスの作成が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2607">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2608">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2608">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2609">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2609">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2610">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) ウィジェットが既に作成されています</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2610">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2611">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) サイズが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2611">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2612">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2612">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2613">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2613">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2614">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2614">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_checkbox”. */
status = gx_checkbox_create(&my_checkbox, “my_checkbox”,
    &my_parent,
    MY_CHECKBOX_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
    MY_CHECKBOX_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the checkbox “my_checkbox” has been created. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2616">gx_checkbox_draw、</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2616">gx_checkbox_draw,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2617">gx_checkbox_event_process、</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2617">gx_checkbox_event_process,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2618">gx_checkbox_select</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2618">gx_checkbox_select</span></span>

## <a name="gx_checkbox_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2619">gx_checkbox_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2619">gx_checkbox_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2620">チェックボックスを描画します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2620">Draw checkbox</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2621">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2621">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_checkbox_draw(GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2622">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2622">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2623">このサービスは、指定されたチェックボックスを描画します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2623">This service draws the specified checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2624">通常、この関数は GUIX キャンバスの更新メカニズムによって内部で呼び出されますが、カスタム チェックボックス ウイジェットのカスタム描画関数の実装を支援するためにアプリケーションに公開されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2624">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom checkbox widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2625">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2625">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2626">**checkbox** チェックボックス コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2626">**checkbox** Pointer to checkbox control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2627">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2627">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2628">**なし**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2628">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2629">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2629">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2630">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2630">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2631">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2631">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom checkbox draw function. */
VOID custom_checkbox_draw(GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox)
{
    /* Call default checkbox draw. */
    gx_checkbox_draw(checkbox);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_checkbox_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2636">gx_checkbox_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2636">gx_checkbox_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2637">チェックボックスのイベントを処理します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2637">Process checkbox event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2638">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2638">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_checkbox_event_process(
    GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox, 
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2639">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2639">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2640">このサービスは、指定されたチェックボックスのイベントを処理します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2640">This service processes an event for the specified checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2641">このサービスは、カスタム チェックボックスのイベント処理関数によって既定のイベント ハンドラーとして呼び出される必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2641">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom checkbox event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2642">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2642">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2643">**checkbox** チェックボックス コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2643">**checkbox** Pointer to checkbox control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2644">**event_ptr** 処理するイベントへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2644">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2645">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2645">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2646">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) チェックボックスのイベント処理が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2646">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2647">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2647">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2648">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2648">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2649">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2649">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2650">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2650">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2651">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2651">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2652">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2652">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic checkbox event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_checkbox_event_process(GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default checkbox
            event processing */
        status = gx_checkbox_event_process(checkbox, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2654">gx_checkbox_create、</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2654">gx_checkbox_create,</span></span>

## <a name="gx_checkbox_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2657">gx_checkbox_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2657">gx_checkbox_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2658">チェックボックスのピクセルマップを設定します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2658">Set pixelmap for checkbox</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2659">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2659">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_checkbox_pixelmap_set(
    GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID unchecked_id, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID checked_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID unchecked_disabled_id, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID checked_disabled_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2660">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2660">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2661">このサービスは、チェックボックスの状態ごとに、指定されたチェックボックスによって表示されるピクセルマップを割り当てます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2661">This service assigns the pixelmaps to be displayed by the specified checkbox for each checkbox state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2662">リソース ID は重複してかまいません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2662">The resource IDs can be duplicated.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2663">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2663">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2664">**checkbox** チェックボックス コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2664">**checkbox** Pointer to checkbox control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2665">**unchecked_id** オフの状態の場合に使用されるピクセルマップ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2665">**unchecked_id** Pixelmap used for unchecked state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2666">**checked_id** オンの状態の場合に使用されるピクセルマップ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2666">**checked_id** Pixelmap used for checked state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2667">**unchecked_disabled_id** 無効かつオフになっているチェックボックスに使用されるピクセルマップ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2667">**unchecked_disabled_id** Pixelmap used for a disabled and unchecked checkbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2668">**unchecked_disabled_id** 無効かつオンになているチェックボックスに使用されるピクセルマップ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2668">**checked_disabled_id** Pixelmap used for a disabled and checked checkbox</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2669">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2669">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2670">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) チェックボックスをオンにすることが成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2670">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox select</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2671">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2671">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2672">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2672">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2673">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2673">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2674">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2674">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2675">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2675">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Select “my_checkbox”. */
status = gx_checkbox_pixelmap_set(&my_checkbox,
    PIXELMAP_UNCHECKED_ID,
    PIXELMAP_CHECKED_ID, PIXELMAP_UNCHECKED_DISABLED_ID,
    PIXELMAP_CHECKED_SIABLED_ID));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmaps are assigned to the checkbox “my_checkbox” */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2676">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2676">See Also</span></span>

## <a name="gx_checkbox_select"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2680">gx_checkbox_select</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2680">gx_checkbox_select</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2691">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2691">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2692">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2692">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_angle_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2699">gx_circular_gauge_angle_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2699">gx_circular_gauge_angle_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2700">現在の角度を取得します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2700">Get current angle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2701">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2701">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_circular_gauge_angle_get(
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge, 
    INT *angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2702">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2702">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2703">このサービスは、円形ゲージ ウィジェットの現在の針の角度を取得します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2703">This service retrieves the current needle angle of circular gauge widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2704">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2704">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2705">**gauge** 円形ゲージ コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2705">**gauge** Pointer to circular gauge control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2706">**angle** 取得する現在の針の角度</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2706">**angle** Current needle angle to be retrieved</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2707">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2707">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2708">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 円形ゲージの角度の取得が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2708">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful circular gauge angle get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2709">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2709">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2710">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2710">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2711">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2711">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2712">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2712">Example</span></span>

```C
INT current_angle;

/* Retrieve the current needle angle of “my_gauge”. */
status = gx_circular_gauge_angle_get(&my_gauge, &current_angle);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the current needle angle of “my_gauge” has been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_angle_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2720">gx_circular_gauge_angle_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2720">gx_circular_gauge_angle_set</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2723">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2723">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2724">このサービスは、円形ゲージ ウィジェットの目標角度を設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2724">This service sets the target angle of a circular gauge widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2725">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2725">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2727">**angle** 針の目標角度</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2727">**angle** Target needle angle</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2729">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 角度の設定が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2729">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful angle set</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2731">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2731">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2732">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2732">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2733">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2733">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2734">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2734">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set target angle of “my_gauge” to 180. */
status = gx_circular_gauge_angle_set(&my_gauge, 180);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the circular gauge of “my_gauge” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_animation_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2742">gx_circular_gauge_animation_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2742">gx_circular_gauge_animation_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2743">アニメーションのパラメーターを設定します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2743">Set animation parameters</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2744">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2744">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_circular_gauge_animation_set(
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    INT steps, 
    INT delay);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2745">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2745">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2746">このサービスは、円形ゲージ ウィジェットのアニメーション ステップと遅延時間を設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2746">This service sets animation steps and delay time for a circular gauge widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2747">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2747">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2748">**gauge** 円形ゲージ コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2748">**gauge** Pointer to circular gauge control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2749">**steps** 1 回の回転の合計ステップ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2749">**steps** Total steps for one rotation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2750">**delay** すべてのステップの遅延時間</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2750">**delay** Delay time for every step</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2751">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2751">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2752">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) チェックボックスをオンにすることが成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2752">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox select</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2753">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2753">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2754">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2754">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2755">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) 値が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2755">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2756">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2756">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2757">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2757">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2758">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2758">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set animation steps and delay time of circular gauge “my_gauge”
    to 30 and 1, the needle of “my_gauge” will rotate from
    current angle to target angle by 30 steps with 1 tick delay between every step. */
status = gx_circular_gauge_animation_set(&my_gauge, 30, 1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the steps and delay time of “my_gauge” has been set. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2759">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2759">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2760">gx_circular_gauge_angle_get、</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2760">gx_circular_gauge_angle_get,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2761">gx_circular_gauge_angle_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2761">gx_circular_gauge_angle_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2762">gx_circular_gauge_background_draw、</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2762">gx_circular_gauge_background_draw,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2763">gx_circular_gauge_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2763">gx_circular_gauge_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2764">gx_circular_gauge_draw、</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2764">gx_circular_gauge_draw,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2765">gx_circular_gauge_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2765">gx_circular_gauge_event_process</span></span>

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2766">gx_circular_gauge_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2766">gx_circular_gauge_background_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2767">円形ゲージの背景を描画します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2767">Draw circular gauge background</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2768">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2768">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_circular_gauge_background_draw(GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2769">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2769">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2770">このサービスは、指定された円形ゲージの背景を描画します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2770">This service draws background of the specified circular gauge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2771">このサービスは通常、gx_circular_gauge_draw 関数によって内部で呼び出されますが、カスタムの描画関数の記述を支援するためにアプリケーションに公開されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2771">This service is normally called internally by the gx_circular_gauge_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2772">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2772">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2773">**gauge** 円形ゲージ コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2773">**gauge** Pointer to circular gauge control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2774">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2774">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2775">**なし**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2775">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2776">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2776">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2777">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2777">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2778">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2778">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw circular gauge background. */
gx_circular_gauge_background_draw(&my_circular_gauge);
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2779">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2779">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2780">gx_circular_gauge_angle_get、</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2780">gx_circular_gauge_angle_get,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2781">gx_circular_gauge_angle_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2781">gx_circular_gauge_angle_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2782">gx_circular_gauge_animation_set、</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2782">gx_circular_gauge_animation_set,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2783">gx_circular_gauge_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2783">gx_circular_gauge_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2784">gx_circular_gauge_draw、</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2784">gx_circular_gauge_draw,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2785">gx_circular_gauge_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2785">gx_circular_gauge_event_process</span></span>

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2786">gx_circular_gauge_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2786">gx_circular_gauge_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2787">円形ゲージを作成します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2787">Create circular gauge</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2788">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2788">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_circular_gauge_create(
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE_INFO *info,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID background_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT circular_gauge_id,
    GX_VALUE xpos,
    GX_VALUE ypos);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2789">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2789">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2790">このサービスは、指定されたプロパティを使用して円形ゲージ ウィジェットを作成します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2790">This service creates a circular gauge widget with the specified properties.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2791">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2791">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2792">**gauge** 円形ゲージ コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2792">**gauge** Pointer to circular gauge control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2793">**name** 円形ゲージ ウィジェットの論理名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2793">**name** Logical name of circular gauge widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2794">**parent** 親ウイジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2794">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2795">**info** ゲージ情報構造体へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2795">**info** Pointer to the gauge information structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2796">**付録 I** には、GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE_INFO 構造体の定義が含まれています</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2796">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE_INFO structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2797">**background_id** 円形ゲージの背景のピクセルマップのリソース ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2797">**background_id** Resource ID of circular gauge background pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2798">**style** 円形ゲージのスタイル。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2798">**style** Style of circular gauge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2799">**付録 D** には、ウィジェット固有のスタイルだけでなく、すべてのウィジェット用に事前に定義されている一般的なスタイルが記載されています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2799">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2800">**circular_gauge_id** 円形ゲージのアプリケーション定義の ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2800">**circular_gauge_id** Application-defined ID of circular gauge</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2801">**xpos** ゲージの X 座標の位置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2801">**xpos** Gauge x-coordinate position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2802">**ypos** ゲージの Y 座標の位置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2802">**ypos** Gauge y-coordinate position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2803">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2803">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2804">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) チェックボックスをオンにすることが成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2804">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox select</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2805">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2805">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2806">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2806">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2807">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) コントロール ブロック サイズが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2807">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2808">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) ウィジェットが既に作成されています</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2808">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2809">使用可能な場所</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2809">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2810">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2810">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2811">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2811">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE gauge_info;

gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_animation_steps = 30;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_animation_delay = 1;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_needle_xpos = 140;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_needle_ypos = 140;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_neelde_xcor = 20;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_neelde_ycor = 88;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_needle_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Create “my_gauge”. */
status = gx_circular_gauge_create(&my_gauge, “my_gauge”,
            &my_parent,
            &gauge_info, MY_PIXELMAP_RESOURCE_ID, GX_NULL,
            MY_ICON_ID, 5, 30);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the circular gauge “my_gauge” has been created. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2815">gx_circular_gauge_animation_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2815">gx_circular_gauge_animation_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2816">gx_circular_gauge_background_draw、</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2816">gx_circular_gauge_background_draw,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2817">gx_circular_gauge_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2817">gx_circular_gauge_draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2818">gx_circular_gauge_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2818">gx_circular_gauge_event_process</span></span>

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2819">gx_circular_gauge_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2819">gx_circular_gauge_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2820">円形ゲージを描画します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2820">Draw circular gauge</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2821">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2821">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_circular_gauge_draw(GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2822">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2822">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2823">このサービスは、指定された円形ゲージを描画します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2823">This service draws the specified circular gauge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2824">通常、この関数は GUIX キャンバスの更新メカニズムによって内部で呼び出されますが、カスタム ゲージ ウイジェットのカスタム描画関数の実装を支援するためにアプリケーションに公開されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2824">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom gauge widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2825">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2825">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2826">**gauge** 円形ゲージ コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2826">**gauge** Pointer to circular gauge control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2827">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2827">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2828">**なし**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2828">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2829">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2829">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2830">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2830">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2831">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2831">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom circular gauge draw function. */
VOID custom_gauge_draw(GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge)
{
    /* Call default circular gauge draw. */
    gx_circular_gauge_draw(gauge);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2839">gx_circular_gauge_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2839">gx_circular_gauge_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2840">円形ゲージ イベントを処理します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2840">Process circular gauge event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2841">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2841">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_circular_gauge_event_process(
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2842">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2842">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2843">このサービスは、指定された円形ゲージのイベントを処理します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2843">This service processes an event for the specified circular gauge.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2844">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2844">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2845">**gauge** ゲージ コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2845">**gauge** Pointer to gauge control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2846">**event_ptr** 処理するイベントへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2846">**event_ptr** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2847">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2847">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2848">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ゲージのイベント処理が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2848">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful gauge event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2849">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2849">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2850">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2850">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2851">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2851">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2852">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2852">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2853">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2853">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic circular gauge event processing as part of custom event processing function. */
UINT custom_gauge_event_process(GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default circular gauge
             event processing */
        status = gx_circular_gauge_event_process(gauge, event);
        break;
}
return status;
```

## <a name="gx_context_brush_default"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2861">gx_context_brush_default</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2861">gx_context_brush_default</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2862">現在の描画コンテキストのブラシを設定します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2862">Set brush of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2863">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2863">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_default(GX_DRAW_CONTEXT *context);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2864">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2864">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2865">このサービスは、指定された描画コンテキストのブラシを既定値に設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2865">This service sets the brush of the specified drawing context to default.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2866">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2866">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2868">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2868">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2869">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 作成が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2869">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2870">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) コンテキスト ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2870">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid context pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2871">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2871">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2872">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2872">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2873">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2873">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the brush of “my_context” to default. */
status = gx_context_brush_default(&my_context);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush of “my_context” has been set to default. */

```

## <a name="gx_context_brush_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2888">gx_context_brush_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2888">gx_context_brush_define</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2889">現在の描画コンテキストのブラシを定義します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2889">Define brush of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2890">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2890">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_define(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID line_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_color_id, 
    UINT style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2891">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2891">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2892">このサービスは、現在の描画コンテキストのブラシを定義します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2892">This service defines the brush of the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2893">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2893">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2894">**line_color_id** 線の色のリソース ID。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2894">**line_color_id** Resource ID of line color.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2895">**付録 B** には、定義済みの色リソース ID が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2895">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2896">アプリケーションでは、カスタムの色リソース ID も追加できることに注意してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2896">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2897">**fill_color_id** 塗りつぶしの色のリソース ID。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2897">**fill_color_id** Resource ID of fill color.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2898">**付録 B** には、定義済みの色リソース ID が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2898">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2899">アプリケーションでは、カスタムの色リソース ID も追加できることに注意してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2899">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2900">**style** ブラシのスタイル。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2900">**style** Style of brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2901">**付録 D** では、サポートされているブラシのスタイルが説明されています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2901">**Appendix D** describes the supported brush styles.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2902">ブラシのスタイルは、ビットごとの OR 演算を使用して 1 つの変数に結合できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2902">Brush styles can be combined into one variable using bitwise OR operation.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2903">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2903">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2904">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) コンテキスト ブラシの定義が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2904">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context brush define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2905">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) リソース ID が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2905">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2906">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) アクティブな描画コンテキストの定義がありません</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2906">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2907">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) リソース ID が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2907">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2908">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) アクティブな描画コンテキストがありません</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2908">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2909">使用可能な場所</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2909">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2910">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2910">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2911">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2911">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define the brush of the current context. */
status = gx_context_brush_define(GX_COLOR_BLACK_ID,
    GX_COLOR_BLACK_ID,
    GX_STYLE_BORDER_NONE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush of the current context has been defined. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_brush_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2926">gx_context_brush_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2926">gx_context_brush_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2927">現在の描画コンテキストのブラシを取得します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2927">Get brush of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2928">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2928">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_get(GX_BRUSH **return_brush);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2929">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2929">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2930">このサービスは、現在の描画コンテキストのアクティブなブラシへのポインターを返します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2930">This service returns a pointer to the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2931">アクティブな描画コンテキストがない場合、このサービスは失敗し、NULL ポインターを返します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2931">If there is no active drawing context, the service fails and returns a NULL pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2932">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2932">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2933">**return_brush** ブラシの宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2933">**return_brush** Pointer to destination for brush.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2934">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2934">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2935">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) コンテキストのブラシの取得に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2935">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved context brush</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2936">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) アクティブな描画コンテキストがありません</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2936">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2937">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2937">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2938">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2938">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2939">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2939">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2940">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2940">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BRUSH *my_brush;

/* Get the brush of the current context. */
status = gx_context_brush_get(&my_brush);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush of the current context has been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_brush_pattern_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2955">gx_context_brush_pattern_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2955">gx_context_brush_pattern_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2956">現在の描画コンテキストのブラシ パターンを設定します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2956">Set brush pattern of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2957">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2957">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_pattern_set(ULONG pattern);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2958">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2958">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2959">このサービスは、現在の描画コンテキストのブラシ パターンを設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2959">This service sets the brush pattern of the current drawing context.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2960">ブラシ パターンは、水平方向の破線と垂直方向の破線の描画に使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2960">The brush pattern is used for drawing dashed horizontal and dashed vertical lines.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2961">gx_canvas_line_draw() が呼び出され、線が水平方向または垂直方向であり、brush.gx_brush_line_pattern フィールドが 0 以外の場合、パターンの線が描画されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2961">When the gx_canvas_line_draw() is called, and the line is horizontal or vertical, and the brush.gx_brush_line_pattern field is non-zero, a pattern line is drawn.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2962">現在、ブラシ パターンのマスクは、水平方向と垂直方向の線でのみサポートされています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2962">The brush pattern mask is currently only supported for horizontal and vertical lines.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2963">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2963">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2964">**pattern** ブラシに使用されるパターン。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2964">**pattern** Pattern to be used for the brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2965">これは、パターンの線の描画に使用される単純な 16 進数のオン/オフ パターンです。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2965">This is a simple hexidecimal on/off pattern to be used for pattern line drawing.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2966">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2966">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2967">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) コンテキスト ブラシの設定が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2967">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context brush set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2968">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) 描画コンテキストが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2968">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Invalid drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2969">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2969">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2970">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2970">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2971">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2971">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the brush pattern for the current contex. */
status = gx_context_brush_pattern_set(0x80808080);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush pattern of the current context
has been set to the specified pattern. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_brush_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2985">gx_context_brush_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2985">gx_context_brush_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2986">現在の描画コンテキストのブラシを設定します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2986">Set brush of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2987">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2987">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_set(GX_BRUSH *brush);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2988">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2988">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2989">このサービスは、現在の描画コンテキストのブラシを設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2989">This service sets the brush of the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2990">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2990">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2991">**brush** 現在のコンテキストで使用するブラシへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2991">**brush** Pointer to brush to use for current context.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2992">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2992">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2993">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) コンテキスト ブラシの設定が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2993">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context brush set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2994">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) アクティブな描画コンテキストがありません</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2994">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2995">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2995">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2996">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2996">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2997">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2997">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-2998">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-2998">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BRSUH my_brush;
GX_FONT *font;
GX_COLOR fill_color;
GX_COLOR line_color;

/* Retrieve the font that associated with the specified font ID. */
gx_context_font_get(MY_FONT_ID, &font);

/* Retrieve the color that associated with the specified color ID. */
gx_context_color_get(MY_FILL_COLOR_ID, &fill_color);
gx_context_color_get(MY_LINE_COLOR, &line_color);

my_brush.gx_brush_pixelmap = MY_PIXELMAP_ID;
my_brush.gx_brush_font = font;
my_brush.gx_brush_line_pattern = 0x80808080;
my_brush.gx_brush_pattern_mask = 0x80000000;
my_brush.gx_brush_fill_color = fill_color;
my_brush.gx_brush_line_color = line_color;
my_brush.gx_brush_style = GX_BRSUH_SOLID_FILL | GX_BRUSH_ALIAS |
                          GX_BRUSH_PIXELMAP_FILL | GX_BRUSH_ROUND
my_brush.gx_brush_width = 2;
my_brush.gx_brush_alpha = 255;

/* Set the brush of the current context. */
status = gx_context_brush_set(my_brush);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush of the current context has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_brush_style_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3013">gx_context_brush_style_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3013">gx_context_brush_style_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3014">現在の描画コンテキストのブラシのスタイルを設定します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3014">Set brush style of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3015">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3015">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_style_set(UINT style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3016">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3016">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3017">このサービスは、現在の描画コンテキストのブラシのスタイルを設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3017">This service sets the brush style of the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3018">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3018">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3019">**style** 現在のコンテキストのブラシのスタイル。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3019">**style** Brush style of current context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3020">**付録 D** には、ウィジェット固有のスタイルだけでなく、すべてのウィジェット用に事前に定義された一般的なスタイルが含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3020">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3021">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3021">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3022">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) コンテキスト ブラシのスタイルの設定が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3022">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context brush style set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3023">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) アクティブな描画コンテキストがありません</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3023">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3024">使用可能な場所</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3024">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3025">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3025">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3026">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3026">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the brush style of the current context. */
status = gx_context_brush_style_set(GX_BRUSH_ALIAS);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush style of the current context has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_brush_width_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3041">gx_context_brush_width_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3041">gx_context_brush_width_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3042">現在の描画コンテキストのブラシの幅を設定します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3042">Set brush width of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3043">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3043">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_width_set(UINT width);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3044">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3044">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3045">このサービスは、現在の描画コンテキストのアクティブなブラシの幅を設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3045">This service sets the width of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3046">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3046">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3047">**width** 現在のコンテキストのブラシの幅 (ピクセル単位)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3047">**width** Brush width in pixels of current context</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3048">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3048">Return Values</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3049">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) コンテキスト ブラシの幅の設定が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3049">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context brush width set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3050">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) アクティブな描画コンテキストがありません</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3050">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3051">使用可能な場所</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3051">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3052">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3052">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3053">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3053">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the brush width of the current context to 10 pixels. */
status = gx_context_brush_width_set(10); /*

If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush width of the current context has been set to 10. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_color_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3068">gx_context_color_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3068">gx_context_color_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3069">現在の描画コンテキストの色 ID に関連付けられている色の値を取得します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3069">Get color value associated with color ID in current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3070">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3070">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_color_get(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID color_id,
    GX_COLOR *return_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3071">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3071">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3072">このサービスは、示された色 ID に関連付けられている色の値を取得します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3072">This service retrieves the color value associated with the indicated color ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3073">色の値は、アクティブなコンテキスト表示の色の形式で返されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3073">The color value is returned in the color format of the active context display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3074">このサービスは、アクティブな描画操作内からのみ呼び出してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3074">This service should only be called from within an active drawing operation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3075">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3075">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3076">**color_id** 要求された色のリソース ID。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3076">**color_id** Resource ID of color requested.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3077">**return_color** 返された色の値を保持する変数のアドレス。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3077">**return_color** Address of variable to hold returned color value.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3078">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3078">Return Values</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3079">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 色の値の取得に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3079">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful color value get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3080">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) リソース ID が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3080">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3081">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) アクティブな描画コンテキストがありません</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3081">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3082">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3082">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3083">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3083">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3084">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3084">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3085">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3085">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_COLOR color_value;

/* Get the color vaue. */
status = gx_context_color_get(MY_BLACK_COLOR_ID, &color_value);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3095">gx_context_line_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3095">gx_context_line_color_set</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3098">gx_context_raw_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3098">gx_context_raw_fill_color_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3099">gx_context_raw_line_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3099">gx_context_raw_line_color_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_context_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3100">gx_context_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3100">gx_context_fill_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3101">現在の描画コンテキストの塗りつぶしの色を設定する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3101">Set fill color of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3102">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3102">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_fill_color_set(GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3103">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3103">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3104">このサービスは、現在の描画コンテキストでアクティブなブラシの塗りつぶしの色を設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3104">This service sets the fill color of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3105">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3105">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3106">**fill_color_id** 現在のコンテキストの塗りつぶしの色のリソース ID。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3106">**fill_color_id** Resource ID of fill color of current context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3107">**付録 B** に、定義済みの色のリソース ID が記載されています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3107">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3108">なお、アプリケーションでカスタムの色のリソース ID を追加することもできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3108">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3109">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3109">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3110">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) コンテキストの塗りつぶしの色の設定が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3110">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context fill color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3111">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) リソース ID が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3111">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3112">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) アクティブな描画コンテキストがありません</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3112">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3113">使用可能な場所</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3113">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3114">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3114">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3115">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3115">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the fill color of the current context to black. */
status = gx_context_fill_color_set(MY_BLACK_COLOR_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the fill color of the current context has been set to black. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3116">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3116">See Also</span></span>

## <a name="gx_context_font_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3130">gx_context_font_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3130">gx_context_font_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3131">現在の描画コンテキストでフォント ID に関連付けられているフォントを取得します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3131">Get font associated with font ID in current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3132">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3132">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_font_get(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID font_id,
    GX_FONT **return_font);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3133">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3133">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3134">このサービスは、指定されたフォント ID に関連付けられているフォント ポインターを取得します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3134">This service retrieves the font pointer associated with the indicated font ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3135">このサービスは、アクティブな描画操作内からのみ呼び出してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3135">This service should only be called from within an active drawing operation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3136">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3136">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3137">**font_id** 要求対象のフォントのリソース ID。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3137">**font_id** Resource ID of font requested.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3138">**return_font** 返されるフォント ポインターを格納する変数のアドレス。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3138">**return_font** Address of variable to hold returned font pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3139">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3139">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3140">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) フォントの取得に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3140">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3141">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) リソース ID が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3141">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3142">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) アクティブな描画コンテキストがありません</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3142">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3143">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3143">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3144">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3144">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3145">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3145">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3146">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3146">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_FONT *my_font;

/* Get the font pointer. */
status = gx_context_font_get(MY_MIDSIZE_FONT, &my_font);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the font that indicated with MY_MIDSIZE_FONT has been successfully retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_font_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3161">gx_context_font_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3161">gx_context_font_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3162">現在の描画コンテキストのフォントを設定します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3162">Set font of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3163">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3163">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_font_set(GX_RESOURCE_ID font_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3164">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3164">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3165">このサービスは、現在の描画コンテキストのアクティブなブラシのフォントを設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3165">This service sets the font in the active brush of the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3166">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3166">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3167">**font_id** 現在のコンテキストのフォント リソース ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3167">**font_id** Font resource ID of current context</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3168">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3168">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3169">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) コンテキストのフォントの設定が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3169">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context font set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3170">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) リソース ID が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3170">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3171">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) アクティブな描画コンテキストがありません</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3171">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3172">使用可能な場所</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3172">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3173">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3173">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3174">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3174">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the font of the current context to MY_FONT_ID. */
status = gx_context_font_set(MY_FONT_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the font of the current context has been set. */
```
