## <a name="gx_context_line_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3189">gx_context_line_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3189">gx_context_line_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3190">現在の描画コンテキストの線の色を設定します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3190">Set line color of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3191">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3191">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_line_color_set(GX_RESOURCE_ID line_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3192">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3192">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3193">このサービスは、現在の描画コンテキストでアクティブなブラシの線の色を設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3193">This service sets the line color of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3194">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3194">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3195">**line_color_id** 現在のコンテキストの線の色。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3195">**line_color_id** Line color of current context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3196">**付録 B** に、定義済みの色のリソース ID が記載されています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3196">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3197">なお、アプリケーションでカスタムの色のリソース ID を追加することもできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3197">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3198">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3198">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3199">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) コンテキストの線の色の設定が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3199">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context line color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3200">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) リソース ID が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3200">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3201">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) アクティブな描画コンテキストがありません</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3201">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3202">使用可能な場所</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3202">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3203">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3203">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3204">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3204">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the line color of the current context to black. */
status = gx_context_line_color_set(GX_COLOR_BLACK_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the line color of the current context has been set to black. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_pixelmap_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3219">gx_context_pixelmap_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3219">gx_context_pixelmap_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3220">現在の描画コンテキストでピクセルマップ ID に関連付けられているピクセルマップを取得します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3220">Get pixelmap associated with pixelmap ID in current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3221">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3221">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_pixelmap_get(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID pixelmap_id,
    GX_PIXELMAP **return_map);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3222">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3222">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3223">このサービスは、指定されたピクセルマップ ID に関連付けられているピクセルマップ ポインターを取得します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3223">This service retrieves the pixelmap pointer associated with the indicated pixelmap ID.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3224">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3224">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3225">**pixelmap_id** 要求対象のピクセルマップのリソース ID。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3225">**pixelmap_id** Resource ID of pixelmap requested.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3226">**return_map** 返されたピクセルマップのアドレスを格納する変数のアドレス。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3226">**return_map** Address of variable to hold returned pixelmap address.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3227">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3227">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3228">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ピクセルマップの取得に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3228">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3229">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) リソース ID が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3229">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3230">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) アクティブな描画コンテキストがありません</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3230">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3231">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ピクセルマップのポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3231">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pixelmap pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3232">使用可能な場所</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3232">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3233">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3233">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3234">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3234">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PIXELMAP *map;

/* Get the pixelmap pointer. */
status = gx_context_pixelmap_get(MY_PIXELMAP_ID, &map);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pixelmap was successfully retrieved. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3244">gx_context_line_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3244">gx_context_line_color_set</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3247">gx_context_raw_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3247">gx_context_raw_fill_color_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3248">gx_context_raw_line_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3248">gx_context_raw_line_color_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_context_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3249">gx_context_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3249">gx_context_pixelmap_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3250">現在の描画コンテキストのピクセルマップを設定します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3250">Set pixelmap of current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3251">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3251">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_pixelmap_set(GX_RESOURCE_ID pixelmap_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3252">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3252">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3253">このサービスは、現在の描画コンテキストでアクティブなブラシのピクセルマップを割り当てます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3253">This service assigns the pixelmap of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3254">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3254">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3255">**pixelmap_id** 現在のコンテキストに使用するピクセルマップのリソース ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3255">**pixelmap_id** Pixelmap resource ID to use for current context</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3256">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3256">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3257">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) コンテキストのピクセルマップの設定が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3257">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context pixelmap set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3258">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) リソース ID が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3258">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3259">**GX_INVLAID_CONTEXT** (0x06) コンテキストが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3259">**GX_INVLAID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Invalid context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3260">使用可能な場所</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3260">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3261">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3261">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3262">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3262">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set pixelmap of the current context to MY_PIXELMAP_ID. */
status = gx_context_pixelmap_set(MY_PIXELMAP_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap of the current context has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_raw_brush_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3277">gx_context_raw_brush_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3277">gx_context_raw_brush_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3278">現在の描画コンテキストの未加工ブラシを定義します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3278">Define raw brush of current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3279">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3279">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_raw_brush_define(
    GX_COLOR line_color,
    GX_COLOR fill_color, 
    UINT style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3280">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3280">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3281">このサービスは、現在の画面コンテキストの未加工ブラシを定義します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3281">This service defines the raw brush of the current screen context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3282">32 ビットの ARGB カラー値をカラー ID ではなくブラシに渡す場合、未加工の定義が使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3282">Raw definitions are used when 32-bit ARGB color values are to be passed into the brush rather than color IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3283">未加工のカラー定義は、目的の色が現在のシステム カラー テーブルに存在しない場合、または RGB カラー値が実行時に計算される場合に便利です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3283">Raw color definitions are useful when the desired color is not present in the current system color table or when the RGB color value is computed at runtime.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3284">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3284">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3285">**line_color** 32 ビットの未加工 ARGB カラー形式の線の色。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3285">**line_color** Color of line in 32-bit raw ARGB color format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3286">**付録 A** に、事前定義済みの色が記載されています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3286">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3287">なお、アプリケーションでカスタムの色を追加することもできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3287">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3288">**line_color** 32 ビットの未加工 ARGB カラー形式の塗りつぶしの色。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3288">**fill_color** Color of fill in 32-bit raw ARGB color format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3289">**付録 A** に、事前定義済みの色が記載されています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3289">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3290">なお、アプリケーションでカスタムの色を追加することもできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3290">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3291">**style** ブラシのスタイル。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3291">**style** Style of brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3292">**付録 D** には、すべてのウィジェット用に事前に定義されている一般的なスタイルおよびウィジェット固有のスタイルが記載されています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3292">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3293">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3293">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3294">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) コンテキストの未加工ブラシの定義が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3294">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw brush define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3295">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) アクティブな描画コンテキストがありません</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3295">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3296">使用可能な場所</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3296">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3297">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3297">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3298">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3298">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define the raw brush of the current context. */
status = gx_context_raw_brush_define(GX_COLOR_BLACK,
    GX_COLOR_BLACK, GX_STYLE_BORDER_NONE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the raw brush of the current context has been defined. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3305">gx_context_brush_style_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3305">gx_context_brush_style_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3306">gx_context_brush_width_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3306">gx_context_brush_width_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3307">gx_context_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3307">gx_context_fill_color_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3308">gx_context_font_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3308">gx_context_font_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3309">gx_context_line_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3309">gx_context_line_color_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3310">gx_context_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3310">gx_context_pixelmap_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3311">gx_context_raw_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3311">gx_context_raw_fill_color_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3312">gx_context_raw_line_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3312">gx_context_raw_line_color_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_context_raw_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3313">gx_context_raw_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3313">gx_context_raw_fill_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3314">現在の描画コンテキストの未加工の塗りつぶし色を設定します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3314">Set raw fill color of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3315">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3315">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_raw_fill_color_set(GX_COLOR line_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3316">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3316">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3317">このサービスは、現在の画面コンテキストの未加工の塗りつぶし色を設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3317">This service sets the raw fill color of the current screen context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3318">line_color パラメーターは、カラー ID 値ではなく、32 ビットの ARGB 形式の未加工のカラー値です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3318">The line_color parameter is a 32-bit ARGB format raw color value, rather than a color ID value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3319">未加工のカラー定義は、目的の色が現在のシステム カラー テーブルに存在しない場合、または RGB カラー値が実行時に計算される場合に便利です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3319">Raw color definitions are useful when the desired color is not present in the current system color table or when the RGB color value is computed at runtime.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3320">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3320">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3321">**line_color** 線の色。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3321">**line_color** Color of line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3322">**付録 A** に、事前定義済みの色が記載されています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3322">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3323">なお、アプリケーションでカスタムの色を追加することもできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3323">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3324">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3324">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3325">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) コンテキストの未加工の塗りつぶし色の設定が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3325">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw fill color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3326">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) アクティブな描画コンテキストがありません</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3326">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3327">使用可能な場所</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3327">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3328">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3328">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3329">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3329">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the raw fill color of the current context. */
status = gx_context_raw_fill_color_set(GX_COLOR_BLACK);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the raw fill color of the current context has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_raw_line_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3344">gx_context_raw_line_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3344">gx_context_raw_line_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3345">現在の描画コンテキストの未加工の線の色を設定します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3345">Set raw line color of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3346">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3346">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_raw_line_color_set(GX_COLOR line_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3347">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3347">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3348">このサービスは、現在の描画コンテキストでアクティブなブラシの線の色を設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3348">This service sets the line color of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3349">line_color パラメーターは、カラー ID 値ではなく、32 ビットの ARGB 形式の未加工のカラー値です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3349">The line_color parameter is a 32-bit ARGB format raw color value, rather than a color ID value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3350">未加工のカラー定義は、目的の色が現在のシステム カラー テーブルに存在しない場合、または RGB カラー値が実行時に計算される場合に便利です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3350">Raw color definitions are useful when the desired color is not present in the current system color table or when the RGB color value is computed at runtime.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3351">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3351">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3352">**line_color** 線の色の値。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3352">**line_color** Color of line value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3353">**付録 A** に、事前定義済みの色が記載されています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3353">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3354">なお、アプリケーションでカスタムの色を追加することもできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3354">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3355">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3355">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3356">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) コンテキストの未加工の線の色の設定が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3356">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw line color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3357">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) アクティブな描画コンテキストがありません</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3357">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3358">使用可能な場所</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3358">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3359">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3359">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
/* Set the raw line color of the current context. */
status = gx_context_raw_line_color_set(GX_COLOR_BLACK);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the raw line color of the current context has been set. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3372">gx_context_raw_brush_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3372">gx_context_raw_brush_define</span></span>

## <a name="gx_context_string_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3374">gx_context_string_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3374">gx_context_string_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3375">文字列 ID に関連付けられた文字列を取得します (非推奨)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3375">Retrieve string associated with String ID (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3376">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3376">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_string_get(GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR **return_string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3377">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3377">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3378">この非推奨の API は、指定された文字列 ID に関連付けられている文字列を返します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3378">This deprecated API returns the string associated with the given string ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3379">新しいアプリケーションでは gx_context_string_get_ext() を使用してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3379">New applications should use gx_context_string_get_ext().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3380">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3380">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3381">**string_id** GUIX Studio アプリケーションによって生成される文字列 ID。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3381">**string_id** String ID generated by the GUIX Studio application.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3382">**return_string** 文字列ポインターを返す変数のアドレス。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3382">**return_string** Address of variable to return string pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3383">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3383">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3384">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) コンテキストの未加工の線の色の設定が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3384">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw line color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3385">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3385">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3386">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3386">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3387">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) アクティブな描画コンテキストがありません</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3387">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3388">使用可能な場所</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3388">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3389">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3389">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3390">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3390">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CHAR *text;

status = gx_context_string_get(GX_ID_ERROR, &text);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string pointer has been returned. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3391">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3391">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3392">gx_context_string_get_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3392">gx_context_string_get_ext</span></span>

## <a name="gx_context_string_get_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3393">gx_context_string_get_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3393">gx_context_string_get_ext</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3394">指定された文字列 ID に関連付けられている文字列を取得します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3394">Retrieve string associated with given string ID.</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3395">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3395">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_string_get_ext(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id, 
    GX_STRING *return_string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3396">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3396">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3397">このサービスは、指定された文字列 ID に関連付けられている文字列を返します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3397">This service returns the string associated with a given string ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3398">このサービスは、アクティブな描画コンテキストがある場合、つまり、ウィジェットの描画関数内からのみ呼び出すことができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3398">This service can only be invoked when there is an active drawing context, i.e. from within the drawing function of a widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3399">このサービスは、アクティブなキャンバスとディスプレイを識別し、検出されたディスプレイ インスタンスから文字列を取得します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3399">This service identifies the active canvas and display and retrieves the string from the located display instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3400">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3400">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3401">**string_id** アプリケーション リソース ヘッダー ファイル内の GUIX Studio によって生成される文字列を識別するために使用される文字列 ID。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3401">**string_id** String ID used to identify the string, as generated by GUIX Studio in the application resource header file.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3402">**return_string** 文字列ポインターと文字列長が返される GX_STRING 変数のアドレス。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3402">**return_string** Address of GX_STRING variable in which the string pointer and string length will be returned.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3403">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3403">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3404">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) コンテキストの未加工の線の色の設定が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3404">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw line color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3405">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3405">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3406">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3406">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3407">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) アクティブな描画コンテキストがありません</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3407">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3408">使用可能な場所</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3408">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3409">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3409">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3410">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3410">Example</span></span>


```C
GX_STRING string;

/* Set the raw line color of the current context. */
status = gx_context_string_get_ext(ID_ERROR, &string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string.gx_string_ptr and
string.gx_string_length values have been returned. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3414">gx_context_brush_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3414">gx_context_brush_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3415">gx_context_brush_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3415">gx_context_brush_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3416">gx_context_brush_pattern_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3416">gx_context_brush_pattern_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3417">gx_context_brush_style_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3417">gx_context_brush_style_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3418">gx_context_brush_width_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3418">gx_context_brush_width_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3419">gx_context_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3419">gx_context_fill_color_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3420">gx_context_font_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3420">gx_context_font_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3421">gx_context_line_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3421">gx_context_line_color_set</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3424">gx_context_raw_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3424">gx_context_raw_fill_color_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_active_language_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3425">gx_display_active_language_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3425">gx_display_active_language_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3426">ディスプレイにアクティブな言語を割り当てます</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3426">Assign the display active language</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3427">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3427">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_active_language_set(
    GX_DISPLAY *display, 
    GX_UBYTE language);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3428">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3428">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3429">このサービスは、指定されたディスプレイに現在アクティブな言語を割り当てます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3429">This service assigns the currently active language for the indicated display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3430">言語インデックスは、ディスプレイの言語テーブルで定義されている言語に対応し、ANSI 言語識別子ではありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3430">The language index corresponds to the languages defined in the display language table, and is not an ANSI language identifier.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3431">マルチディスプレイ システムでは、異なるディスプレイで、それぞれ異なるアクティブな言語を実行できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3431">Different displays in a multi display system can each run different active languages.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3432">この API を使用する前に、ディスプレイの言語テーブルを割り当てる必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3432">The display language table should be assigned before this API is used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3433">gx_studio_display_configure を使用してディスプレイを初期化すると、言語テーブルが自動的にインストールされ、アプリケーションはアクティブな言語インデックスを渡します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3433">When a display is initialized using gx_studio_display_configure, the language table is automatically installed and the application passes in the active language index.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3434">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3434">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3435">**display** ディスプレイ コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3435">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3436">**language** アクティブな言語インデックス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3436">**language** Active language index</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3437">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3437">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3438">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 言語の割り当てが成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3438">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful language assign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3439">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ディスプレイのポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3439">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid display pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3440">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) 言語インデックスが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3440">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid language index</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3441">使用可能な場所</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3441">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3442">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3442">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3443">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3443">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Change value of color MY_COLOR_ID. */
status = gx_display_active_language_set(&my_display,
    LANGUAGE_ENGLISH);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the active language has been assigned. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3444">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3444">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3445">gx_display_language_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3445">gx_display_language_table_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3446">gx_studio_display_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3446">gx_studio_display_configure</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3447">gx_display_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3447">gx_display_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3448">1 つのカラー値を再割り当てします</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3448">Re-assign one color value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3449">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3449">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_color_set(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID color_id, 
    GX_COLOR new_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3450">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3450">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3451">このサービスは、指定されたカラー ID に関連付けられているカラー値を再割り当てします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3451">This service re-assigns the color value associated with the specified color ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3452">これを使用すると、まったく新しいカラー テーブルを指定しなくても、ディスプレイのカラー テーブルを変更できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3452">This can be used to modify the color table of a display without providing an entirely new color table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3453">指定するカラー値は、ディスプレイでサポートされているネイティブ形式である必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3453">The color value provided must be in the native format supported by the display.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3454">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3454">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3455">**display** ディスプレイ コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3455">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3456">**color_id** 再割り当てするカラー ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3456">**color_id** Color ID to reassign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3457">**new_color** この color_id スロットに割り当てるカラー値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3457">**new_color** Color value to assign to this color_id slot</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3458">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3458">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3459">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 色の再割り当てが成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3459">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful color reassign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3460">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) カラー ID が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3460">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid color ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3461">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3461">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3462">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) ディスプレイが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3462">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Invalid display</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3463">使用可能な場所</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3463">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3464">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3464">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3465">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3465">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Change value of color MY_COLOR_ID. */
status = gx_display_color_set(&my_display, MY_COLOR_ID, 0x5454);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the color has been reassigned. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3466">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3466">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3467">gx_display_color_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3467">gx_display_color_table_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_color_table_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3468">gx_display_color_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3468">gx_display_color_table_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3469">ディスプレイにカラー テーブルを割り当てます</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3469">Assign display color table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3470">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3470">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_color_table_set(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_COLOR *color_table, 
    INT color_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3471">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3471">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3472">このサービスは、ディスプレイで使用するカラー テーブルを再割り当てします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3472">This service re-assigns the color table to be used by the display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3473">通常、このサービスは GUIX Studio で生成されたディスプレイの構成関数によって呼び出されますが、アプリケーション ソフトウェアから呼び出すこともできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3473">This service is normally invoked by the GUIX Studio generated display configuration function, but can also be called by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3474">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3474">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3475">**display** ディスプレイ コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3475">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3476">**color_table** ディスプレイのネイティブ形式のカラー値の配列。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3476">**color_table** Array of color values in display native format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3477">**color_count** カラー テーブル内のエントリの数を示します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3477">**color_count** Indicates number of entries in color table</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3478">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3478">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3479">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) カラー テーブルの設定が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3479">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful color table set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3480">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3480">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3481">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3481">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3482">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) ディスプレイが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3482">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Invalid display</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3483">使用可能な場所</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3483">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3484">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3484">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3485">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3485">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_COLOR default_table[32] = { … };

/* Change the color table */
status = gx_display_color_table_set(&my_display, default_table, 32);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the color table has been reassigned. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3486">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3486">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3487">gx_display_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3487">gx_display_color_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3488">gx_display_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3488">gx_display_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3489">ディスプレイを作成します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3489">Create display</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3490">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3490">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_create(
    GX_DISPLAY *display, 
    GX_CONST CHAR *name,
    UINT (*display_driver_setup)(GX_DISPLAY *),
    GX_VALUE width, 
    GX_VALUE height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3491">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3491">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3492">このサービスは、ディスプレイを作成し、ディスプレイ ドライバー設定関数を呼び出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3492">This service creates a display and calls the display driver setup function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3493">GUIX はこのディスプレイを取得し、ディスプレイの内部リストに追加します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3493">GUIX takes this display and adds it to its internal list of displays.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3494">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3494">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3495">**display** ディスプレイ コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3495">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3496">**name** ディスプレイの名前</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3496">**name** Name of the display</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3497">**display_driver_setup** ディスプレイ ドライバー設定関数へのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3497">**display_driver_setup** Pointer to display driver setup function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3498">**optional_driver_info** オプションのドライバー情報へのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3498">**optional_driver_info** Pointer to optional driver information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3499">**color_format** **付録 C** で定義されているカラー形式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3499">**color_format** Color format, as defined in **Appendix C**</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3500">**width** X 軸のピクセル数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3500">**width** Number of pixels on the x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3501">**height** Y 軸のピクセル数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3501">**height** Number of pixels on the y-axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3502">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3502">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3503">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ディスプレイの作成が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3503">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful display create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3504">**GX_SYSTEM_ERROR** (0xFE) ディスプレイの設定が失敗しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3504">**GX_SYSTEM_ERROR** (0xFE) Fail to setup display</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3505">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3505">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3506">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3506">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3507">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x23) ディスプレイ コントロール ブロックのサイズが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3507">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x23) Invalid display control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3508">使用可能な場所</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3508">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3509">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3509">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3510">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3510">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_DISPLAY my_display;

UINT my_driver_setup_callback(GX_DISPLAY *display)
{
    …
}

/* Create screen “my_display”. */
status = gx_display_create(&my_display, “my display”,
    my_driver_setup_callback, 320, 480);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the screen “my_display” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_display_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3513">gx_display_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3513">gx_display_delete</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3514">ディスプレイを破棄します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3514">Destroy display</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3515">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3515">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_delete(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    VOID (*display_driver_cleanup)(GX_DISPLAY *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3516">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3516">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3517">このサービスは、ディスプレイをシャットダウンし、割り当てられたリソースをクリーンアップします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3517">This service shuts down a display, and cleans up allocated resources.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3518">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3518">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3519">**display** ディスプレイ コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3519">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3520">**display_driver_cleanup** ディスプレイ ドライバーのクリーンアップ関数へのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3520">**display_driver_cleanup** Pointer to display driver cleanup function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3521">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3521">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3522">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ディスプレイの削除が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3522">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful display delete</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3523">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) 作成されたディスプレイ リストが NULL です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3523">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Created display list is NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3524">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3524">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3525">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3525">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3526">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3526">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3527">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3527">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3528">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3528">Example</span></span>

```C
VOID driver_cleanup_callback(GX_DISPLAY *display)
{
    …
}

/* Delete a display “my_display”. */
status = gx_display_delete(&my_display, driver_cleanup_callback);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the screen “my_display” has been destroyed. */
```

## <a name="gx_display_font_table_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3538">gx_display_font_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3538">gx_display_font_table_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3539">ディスプレイのフォント テーブルを割り当てます</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3539">Assign display font table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3540">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3540">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_font_table_set(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_FONT **font_table, 
    INT table_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3541">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3541">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3542">このサービスは、ディスプレイで使用するフォント テーブルを再割り当てします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3542">This service re-assigns the font table to be used by the display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3543">通常、このサービスは GUIX Studio で生成されたディスプレイの構成関数によって呼び出されますが、アプリケーション ソフトウェアから呼び出すこともできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3543">This service is normally invoked by the GUIX Studio generated display configuration function, but can also be called by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3544">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3544">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3545">**display** ディスプレイ コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3545">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3546">**font_table** GX_FONT ポインターの配列。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3546">**font_table** Array of GX_FONT pointers.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3547">**table_size** テーブル内のフォント数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3547">**table_size** Number of fonts in table</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3548">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3548">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3549">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) フォント テーブルの設定が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3549">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful font table set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3550">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3550">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3551">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3551">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3552">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3552">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3553">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3553">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3554">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3554">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_FONT *font_table[32] = { … };

/* Assign font table */
status = gx_display_font_table_set(&my_display, font_table, 32);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the font table has been reassigned. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3555">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3555">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3556">gx_display_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3556">gx_display_color_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3557">gx_display_color_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3557">gx_display_color_table_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3558">gx_display_pixelmap_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3558">gx_display_pixelmap_table_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_language_table_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3559">gx_display_language_table_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3559">gx_display_language_table_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3560">ディスプレイの言語テーブルを取得します (非推奨)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3560">Retrieve display language table (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3561">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3561">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_language_table_get(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_CHAR **table, 
    GX_UBYTE *language_count,
    UINT *string_table_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3562">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3562">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3563">このサービスは、指定されたディスプレイから言語テーブルを取得します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3563">This service retrieves the language table from the indicated display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3564">アプリケーションで実行時にこのサービスを使用すると、動的に定義された文字列を使用して、ディスプレイの言語テーブルを変更できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3564">This service can be used by an application to modify the display language table, at runtime, using dynamically defined strings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3565">この API は、非推奨であり、古いスタイルの言語テーブル (つまり、バージョン 5.6 より前のライブラリ バージョン用に生成された Studio 生成のリソース ファイル) を使用するアプリケーションに対してのみサポートされます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3565">This API is deprecated and supported only for applications using the old style language table (i.e. the Studio generated resource file is generated for library version prior to version 5.6).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3566">新しいアプリケーションでは gx_display_language_table_get_ext() を使用してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3566">New applications should use gx_display_language_table_get_ext().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3567">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3567">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3568">**display** ディスプレイ コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3568">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3569">**table** テーブル ポインターを受け取るアドレス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3569">**table** Address to receive table pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3570">**language_count** 言語数を受け取るアドレス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3570">**language_count** Address to receive language count</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3571">**string_table_size** 文字列テーブルのサイズを受け取るアドレス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3571">**string_table_size** Address to receive string table size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3572">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3572">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3573">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) フォント テーブルの設定が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3573">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful font table set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3574">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3574">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3575">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3575">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3576">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3576">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3577">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3577">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3578">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3578">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CHAR **language_table;
GX_UBYTE language_count;
UINT string_count;

/* Retrieve language table */
status = gx_display_language_table_get(&my_display,
        &language_table, &language_count, &string_count);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the language table has been retrieved.
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3579">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3579">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3583">gx_display_language_table_get_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3583">gx_display_language_table_get_ext</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_language_table_get_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3584">gx_display_language_table_get_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3584">gx_display_language_table_get_ext</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3585">ディスプレイの言語テーブルを取得します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3585">Retrieve display language table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3586">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3586">Prototype</span></span>

```C
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_STRING **table,

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3587">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3587">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3588">このサービスは、指定されたディスプレイから言語テーブルを取得します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3588">This service retrieves the language table from the indicated display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3589">アプリケーションで実行時にこのサービスを使用すると、動的に定義された文字列を使用して、ディスプレイの言語テーブルを変更できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3589">This service can be used by an application to modify the display language table, at runtime, using dynamically defined strings.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3590">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3590">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3591">**display** ディスプレイ コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3591">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3592">**table** テーブル ポインターを受け取るアドレス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3592">**table** Address to receive table pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3593">**language_count** 言語数を受け取るアドレス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3593">**language_count** Address to receive language count</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3594">**string_table_size** 文字列テーブルのサイズを受け取るアドレス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3594">**string_table_size** Address to receive string table size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3595">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3595">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3596">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) フォント テーブルの設定が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3596">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful font table set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3597">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3597">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3598">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3598">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3599">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3599">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3601">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3601">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_STRING **language_table;
GX_UBYTE language_count;
UINT string_count;

/* Retrieve language table */
status = gx_display_language_table_get_ext(&my_display,
    &language_table, &language_count, &string_count);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the language table has been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_display_language_table_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3606">gx_display_language_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3606">gx_display_language_table_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3607">ディスプレイの言語テーブルを割り当てます (非推奨)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3607">Assign display language table (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3608">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3608">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_language_table_set(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_CHAR **table, 
    GX_UBYTE number_of_languages, 
    UINT number_of_strings);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3609">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3609">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3610">このサービスは非推奨です。新しいアプリケーションでは gx_display_language_table_set_ext() を使用してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3610">This service is deprecated and new applications should use gx_display_language_table_set_ext().</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3611">このサービスは、バージョン 5.6 より前のライブラリ バージョンをターゲットとする、Studio で生成されたリソース ファイルとの互換性のためにのみサポートされています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3611">This service is supported only for compatibility with Studio generated resources files targeting library versions prior to version 5.6.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3612">このサービスは、ディスプレイで使用する言語テーブルを再割り当てします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3612">This service assigns the language table to be used by the display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3613">通常、このサービスは GUIX Studio で生成された関数 gx_studio_display_configure によって呼び出されますが、アプリケーション ソフトウェアから呼び出すこともできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3613">This service is normally invoked by the GUIX Studio generated function gx_studio_display_configure, but can also be called by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3614">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3614">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3615">**display** ディスプレイ コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3615">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3616">**table** 言語テーブル</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3616">**table** Language table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3617">**number_of_languages** 指定したテーブル内の列の数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3617">**number_of_languages** Number of columns in the provided table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3618">**number_of_strings** 各テーブル列内の文字列の数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3618">**number_of_strings** Number of strings in each table column</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3619">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3619">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3620">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) フォント テーブルの設定が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3620">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful font table set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3621">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3621">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3622">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3622">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3623">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3623">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3624">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3624">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3625">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3625">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CHAR ***language_table= my_app_language_table;

/* Assign language table */
status = gx_display_language_table_set(&my_display, language_table,
5, 232);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the language table has been reassigned. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3626">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3626">See Also</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_language_table_set_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3629">gx_display_language_table_set_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3629">gx_display_language_table_set_ext</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3630">ディスプレイの言語テーブルを割り当てます</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3630">Assign display language table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3631">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3631">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_language_table_set_ext(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_STRING **table, 
    GX_UBYTE number_of_languages,
    UINT number_of_strings);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3632">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3632">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3633">このサービスは、ディスプレイで使用する言語テーブルを再割り当てします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3633">This service assigns the language table to be used by the display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3634">通常、このサービスは GUIX Studio で生成された関数 gx_studio_display_configure によって呼び出されますが、アプリケーション ソフトウェアから呼び出すこともできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3634">This service is normally invoked by the GUIX Studio generated function gx_studio_display_configure, but can also be called by the application software.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3635">ランタイム言語テーブルの割り当ては、通常、gx_binres_language_table_load() を使用してバイナリ リソース ファイルから言語が読み込まれる場合に実行されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3635">Runtime language table assignment is usually done when languages are loaded from a binary resource file using gx_binres_language_table_load().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3636">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3636">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3637">**display** ディスプレイ コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3637">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3638">**table** 言語テーブル</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3638">**table** Language table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3639">**number_of_languages** 指定したテーブル内の列の数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3639">**number_of_languages** Number of columns in the provided table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3640">**number_of_strings** 各テーブル列内の文字列の数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3640">**number_of_strings** Number of strings in each table column</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3641">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3641">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3642">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) フォント テーブルの設定が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3642">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful font table set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3643">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3643">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3644">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3644">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3645">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) 文字列の長さが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3645">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3646">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3646">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3647">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3647">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3648">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3648">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_STRING **language_table = my_app_language_table;

/* Assign the language table */
status = gx_display_language_table_set_ext(&my_display,
    language_table, 5, 132);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the language table has been reassigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_display_pixelmap_table_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3652">gx_display_pixelmap_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3652">gx_display_pixelmap_table_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3653">ディスプレイのフォント テーブルを割り当てます</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3653">Assign display font table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3654">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3654">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_pixelmap_table_set(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_PIXELMAP **pixelmap_table, 
    INT table_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3655">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3655">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3656">このサービスは、ディスプレイで使用するピクセルマップ テーブルを再割り当てします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3656">This service re-assigns the pixelmap table to be used by the display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3657">通常、このサービスは Studio で生成されたディスプレイの構成関数によって呼び出されますが、アプリケーション ソフトウェアから呼び出すこともできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3657">This service is normally invoked by the Studio generated display configuration function, but can also be called by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3658">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3658">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3659">**display** ディスプレイ コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3659">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3660">**pixelmap_table** GX_PIXELMAP ポインターの配列。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3660">**pixelmap_table** Array of GX_PIXELMAP pointers.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3661">**table_size** テーブル内のピクセルマップの数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3661">**table_size** Number of pixelmaps in table</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3662">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3662">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3663">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ピクセルマップ テーブルの設定が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3663">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful set pixelmap table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3664">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3664">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3665">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3665">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3666">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3666">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3667">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3667">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-3668">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-3668">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap_table[32] = { … };

/* Assign pixelmap table */
status = gx_display_pixelmap_table_set(&my_display, pixelmap_table, 32);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap table has been reassigned. */
```
