- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4135">gx_horinzontal_list_selected_widget_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4135">gx_horinzontal_list_selected_widget_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4136">gx_horizontal_list_selected_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4136">gx_horizontal_list_selected_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4137">gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4137">gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4138">水平スクロール バーを作成します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4138">Create horizontal scrollbar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4139">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4139">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create(
    GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WINDOW *parent,
    GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE *appearance ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4140">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4140">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4141">このサービスは、水平スクロール バーを作成します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4141">This service creates a horizontal scrollbar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4142">水平スクロール バーの ID は事前に定義されています (ウィンドウでイベントをキャッチする方法がわかっている必要があるため)。また、サイズは自動になります (親ウィンドウのクライアントの幅に合わせる必要があるため)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4142">The ID for a horizontal scrollbar is pre-defined (because a window has to know how to catch events from it), and the size is automatic (because it has to fill the parent window’s client width).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4143">クライアント領域のスクロール バーを許可する場合は、id と size のパラメーターを指定して別の create 関数を追加する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4143">If we decide to allow client area scrollbars, we will need to add another create function with the id and size parameters.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4144">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4144">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4145">**scrollbar** スクロール バーのウィジェット コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4145">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4146">**name** スクロール バーの名前</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4146">**name** Name of scrollbar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4147">**parent** 親ウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4147">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4148">**appearance** 外観構造によって、スクロール バーの外観が定義されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4148">**appearance** The appearance structure defines the appearance of the scroll bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4149">この値が GX_NULL 場合、gx_system_scroll_appearance_get で定義されている既定のスクロール バーの外観が使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4149">If this value is GX_NULL, the scrollbar will use the default scrollbar appearance defined by gx_system_scroll_appearance_get.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4150">GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE 構造の定義については、**付録 I** を参照してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4150">Refer to **Appendix I** for the definition of the GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4151">**Style** スクロール バー ウィジェットのスタイル。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4151">**Style** Style of scrollbar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4152">**付録 D** には、すべてのウィジェット用に事前に定義されている一般的なスタイルおよびウィジェット固有のスタイルが記載されています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4152">**Appendix D** contains pre- defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4153">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4153">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4154">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 水平スクロール バーの作成に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4154">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful horizontal scrollbar create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4155">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4155">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4156">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4156">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4157">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) ウィジェットが既に作成されています</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4157">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4158">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) ウィジェット コントロール ブロック サイズが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4158">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4159">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4159">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4160">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4160">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4161">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4161">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create horizontal scrollbar “my_scrollbar”. */
status = gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create(&my_scrollbar,
    “my_horizontal_scrollbar”, &my_parent, GX_NULL,
    GX_STYLE_SCROLLBAR_END_BUTTONS);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the horizontal scrollbar “my_scrollbar” has been created. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4162">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4162">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4163">gx_scrollbar_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4163">gx_scrollbar_draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4164">gx_scrollbar_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4164">gx_scrollbar_event_process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4165">gx_scrollbar_limit_check</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4165">gx_scrollbar_limit_check</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4166">gx_scrollbar_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4166">gx_scrollbar_reset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4167">gx_vertical_scrollbar_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4167">gx_vertical_scrollbar_create</span></span>

## <a name="gx_icon_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4168">gx_icon_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4168">gx_icon_button_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4169">アイコン ボタンを作成します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4169">Create icon button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4170">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4170">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_icon_button_create(
    GX_ICON_BUTTON *button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID icon_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT icon_button_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4171">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4171">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4172">このサービスは、指定されたアイコン ボタン ウィジェットを作成します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4172">This service creates the specified icon button widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4173">GX_ICON_BUTTON は GX_BUTTON からの派生であり、すべての gx_button API サービスをサポートします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4173">GX_ICON_BUTTON is derived from GX_BUTTON and supports all gx_button API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4174">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4174">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4175">**button** アイコン ボタン コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4175">**button** Pointer to icon button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4176">**name** アイコン ボタン ウィジェットの論理名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4176">**name** Logical name of icon button widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4177">**parent** 親ウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4177">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4178">**icon_id** アイコンのリソース ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4178">**icon_id** Resource ID of icon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4179">**style** アイコンのスタイル。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4179">**style** Style of icon.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4180">**付録 D** には、すべてのウィジェット用に事前に定義されている一般的なスタイルおよびウィジェット固有のスタイルが記載されています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4180">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4181">**icon_button_id** アプリケーションで定義されたアイコン ボタンの ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4181">**icon_button_id** Application-defined ID of icon button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4182">**size** アイコン ボタンの大きさ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4182">**size** Dimensions of icon button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4183">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4183">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4184">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) アイコン ボタンの作成に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4184">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created icon button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4185">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4185">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4186">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4186">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4187">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) ウィジェットが既に作成されています</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4187">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4188">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) ウィジェット コントロール ブロック サイズが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4188">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4189">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4189">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4190">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4190">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4191">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4191">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_icon_button”. */
status = gx_icon_button_create(&my_icon_button, “my_icon_button”,
    &my_parent,
    MY_ICON_RESOURCE_ID, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_ICON_BUTTON_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the icon button “my_icon_button” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_icon_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4208">gx_icon_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4208">gx_icon_button_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4209">アイコン ボタンを描画します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4209">Draw an icon button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4210">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4210">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_icon_button_draw(GX_ICON_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4211">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4211">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4212">このサービスでは、アイコン ボタンを描画します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4212">This service draws the icon button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4213">通常、この関数は、キャンバスの更新操作の一部として GUIX によって内部的に呼び出されますが、カスタム描画関数を提供し、カスタム描画ベースとして既定のアイコン ボタン描画を呼び出す必要があるアプリケーションにも公開されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4213">This function is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default icon button drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4214">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4214">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4215">**button**: アイコン ボタン コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4215">**button** Pointer to icon button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4216">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4216">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4217">**なし**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4217">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4218">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4218">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4219">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4219">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4220">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4220">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom icon draw function. */
void MyIconButtonDraw(GX_ICON_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Do the normal drawing first */
    gx_icon_button_draw(button);

    /* Add custom drawing here */
}
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4221">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4221">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4222">gx_button_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4222">gx_button_background_draw</span></span>

## <a name="gx_icon_button_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4237">gx_icon_button_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4237">gx_icon_button_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4238">アイコン ボタン ウィジェットにピクセルマップを設定します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4238">Set pixelmap to the icon button widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4239">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4239">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_icon_button_pixelmap_set(
    GX_ICON_BUTTON *button,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID icon_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4240">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4240">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4241">このサービスでは、新しいピクセルマップをアイコン ボタン ウィジェットに割り当てます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4241">This service assigns a new pixelmap to the icon button widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4242">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4242">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4243">**button**: アイコン ボタン コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4243">**button** Pointer to icon button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4244">**icon_id**: ピクセルマップのリソース ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4244">**icon_id** Resource ID of pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4245">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4245">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4246">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) アイコン ボタンのピクセルマップが正常に設定されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4246">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set icon button pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4247">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4247">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4248">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4248">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4249">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4249">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4250">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4250">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4251">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4251">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set pixelmap for “my_icon_button”. */
status = gx_icon_button_pixelmap_set(&my_icon_button,
    GX_PIXELMAP_ID_ICON);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pixelmap of the icon button “my_icon_button” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_icon_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4268">gx_icon_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4268">gx_icon_background_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4269">アイコンの背景を描画します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4269">Draw icon background</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4270">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4270">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_icon_background_draw(GX_ICON *icon);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4271">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4271">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4272">このサービスでは、指定されたアイコン ウィジェットの背景を描画します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4272">This service draws background of the specified icon widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4273">このサービスは、通常、gx_icon_button_draw 関数によって内部的に呼び出されますが、カスタムの描画関数の作成を支援するためにアプリケーションに公開されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4273">This service is normally called internally by the gx_icon_button_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4274">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4274">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4275">**icon**: アイコン ウィジェット コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4275">**icon** Pointer to icon widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4276">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4276">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4277">**なし**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4277">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4278">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4278">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4279">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4279">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4280">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4280">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom icon draw function. */
void MyIconButtonDraw(GX_ICON *icon)
{
    /* Call icon background draw. */
    gx_icon_background_draw(icon);

    /* Add custom drawing here */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw(icon);
}
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4281">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4281">See Also</span></span>

## <a name="gx_icon_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4286">gx_icon_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4286">gx_icon_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4287">[作成] アイコン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4287">Create icon</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4288">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4288">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_icon_create(
    GX_ICON *icon, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID pixelmap_id, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT icon_id, 
    GX_VALUE x, 
    GX_VALUE y);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4289">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4289">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4290">このサービスでは、指定されたアイコン ウィジェットを作成します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4290">This service creates the specified icon widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4291">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4291">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4292">**icon**: アイコン コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4292">**icon** Pointer to icon control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4293">**name**: アイコン ウィジェットの論理名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4293">**name** Logical name of icon widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4294">**parent**: 親ウイジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4294">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4295">**pixelmap_id**: ピクセルマップのリソース ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4295">**pixelmap_id** Resource ID of pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4296">**style**: アイコンのスタイル</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4296">**style** Style of icon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4297">**icon_id**: アイコンのアプリケーション定義 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4297">**icon_id** Application-defined ID of icon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4298">**x**: x 座標の開始位置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4298">**x** Starting x-coordinate position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4299">**y**: y 座標の開始位置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4299">**y** Starting y-coordinate position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4300">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4300">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4301">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) アイコンの作成に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4301">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful icon create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4302">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4302">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4303">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4303">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4304">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) ウィジェットが既に作成されています</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4304">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4305">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) ウィジェット コントロール ブロック サイズが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4305">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4306">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4306">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4307">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4307">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4308">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4308">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_icon”. */
status = gx_icon_create(&my_icon, “my_icon”, &my_parent,
    MY_PIXELMAP_RESOURCE_ID, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_ICON_ID,
    5, 30);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the icon “my_icon” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_icon_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4313">gx_icon_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4313">gx_icon_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4314">アイコンを描画します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4314">Draw icon</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4315">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4315">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_icon_draw(GX_ICON *icon);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4316">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4316">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4317">このサービスでは、指定されたアイコン ウィジェットを描画します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4317">This service draws the specified icon widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4318">通常、このサービスは、キャンバスの更新操作の一部として GUIX によって内部的に呼び出されますが、カスタム描画関数を提供し、カスタム描画ベースとして既定のアイコン描画を呼び出す必要があるアプリケーションにも公開されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4318">This service is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default icon drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4319">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4319">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4320">**icon**: アイコン ウィジェット コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4320">**icon** Pointer to icon widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4321">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4321">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4322">**なし**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4322">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4323">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4323">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4324">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4324">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4325">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4325">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom icon drawing function. */

VOID my_icon_draw(GX_MENU *menu)
{
    /* Call default icon draw. */
    gx_icon_draw(menu);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_icon_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4330">gx_icon_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4330">gx_icon_event_process</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4331">アイコン ウィジェット イベントの処理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4331">Icon widget event processing</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4332">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4332">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_icon_event_process(
    GX_ICON *icon, 
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4333">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4333">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4334">このサービスでは、GX_ICON ウィジェットに送信されるイベントを処理します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4334">This service handles events sent to a GX_ICON widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4335">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4335">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4336">**icon**: アイコン ウィジェット コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4336">**icon** Pointer to icon widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4337">**event_ptr**: GX_EVENT 構造体へのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4337">**event_ptr** Pointer to GX_EVENT structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4338">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4338">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4339">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) アイコン イベントが正常に処理されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4339">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful processed icon event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4340">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4340">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4341">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4341">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4342">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4342">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4343">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4343">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4344">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4344">Example</span></span>

```C
switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
{
case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
    /* Do default handling. */
    status = gx_icon_event_process(icon, event_ptr);

    /* add your own handling here */
    break;
}
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4345">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4345">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4346">gx_icon_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4346">gx_icon_button_create</span></span>

## <a name="gx_icon_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4349">gx_icon_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4349">gx_icon_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4350">アイコンのピクセルマップを設定します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4350">Set pixelmap for icon</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4351">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4351">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_icon_pixelmap_set(
    GX_ICON *icon, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4352">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4352">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4353">このサービスでは、指定されたアイコン ウィジェットのピクセルマップを設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4353">This service sets the pixelmap for the specified icon widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4354">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4354">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4355">**icon**: アイコン ウィジェット コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4355">**icon** Pointer to icon widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4356">**normal_id**: 通常状態のリソース ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4356">**normal_id** Normal state Resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4357">**selected_id**: 選択状態のリソース ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4357">**selected_id** Selected state Resource ID</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4358">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4358">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4359">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) アイコンのピクセルマップが正常に設定されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4359">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful icon pixelmap set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4360">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4360">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4361">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4361">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4362">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4362">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4363">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4363">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4364">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4364">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set pixelmap for “my_icon”. */
status = gx_icon_pixelmap_set(&my_icon,
    MY_NOT_SELECTED_RESOURCE_ID,
    MY_SELECTED_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the icon “my_icon” has a pixelmap set. */
```

## <a name="gx_image_reader_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4369">gx_image_reader_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4369">gx_image_reader_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4370">イメージ リーダー モジュール インスタンスを作成します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4370">Create image reader module instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4371">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4371">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_image_reader_create(
    GX_IMAGE_READER *image_reader,
    GX_CONST GX_UBYTE *data, 
    INT data_size,
    GX_UBYTE color_format, 
    GX_UBYTE mode);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4372">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4372">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4373">この関数では、ランタイムの未加工イメージ リーダーまたはデコーダーを作成します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4373">This function creates a runtime raw image reader / decoder.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4374">現在、未加工イメージの種類として jpeg と png のみがサポートされています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4374">Currently only jpeg and png raw image types are supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4375">このサービスでは、GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT が定義されている必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4375">This service requires GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4376">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4376">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4377">**image_reader**: イメージ リーダー コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4377">**image_reader** Image reader control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4378">**data**: 未加工入力データへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4378">**data** Pointer to raw input data.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4379">**data_size**: 未加工入力データのサイズ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4379">**data_size** Size of raw input data.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4380">**color_format**: 要求された出力の色形式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4380">**color_format** The requested output color format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4381">**mode**: 圧縮、ディザー、およびアルファのモード フラグ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4381">**mode** Compress, dither and alpha modes flags.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4382">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4382">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4383">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) イメージ　リーダーが正常に作成されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4383">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful image reader create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4384">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4384">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4385">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) データ サイズが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4385">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid data size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4386">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4386">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4387">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4387">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4388">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4388">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_IMAGE_READER my_image_reader;

“color format” could be set to:
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_32ARGB
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_24RGB
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_565RGB
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_8BIT_PALETTE

/* Create image reader “my_image_reader”. */
status = gx_image_reader_create(&my_image_reader, decoder_data,
    decoder_data_size,
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_32ARGB,
    GX_IMAGE_READER_MODE_COMPRESS)

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_image_reader” has been successfully created. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4389">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4389">See Also</span></span>

## <a name="gx_image_reader_palette_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4392">gx_image_reader_palette_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4392">gx_image_reader_palette_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4393">イメージ リーダー パレットを定義します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4393">Define image reader palette</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4394">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4394">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_image_reader_palette_set(
    GX_IMAGE_READER *image_reader,
    GX_COLOR *pal,
    UINT palsize);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4395">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4395">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4396">このサービスでは、イメージ リーダー コントロール ブロックのパレットを設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4396">This service sets palette for image reader control block.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4397">このサービスでは、GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT が定義されている必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4397">This service requires GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4398">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4398">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4399">**image_reader**: イメージ リーダー コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4399">**image_reader** Image reader control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4400">**pal**: パレットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4400">**pal** Pointer to palette</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4401">**palsize**: パレットのサイズ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4401">**palsize** The size of the palette</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4402">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4402">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4403">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) イメージ　リーダー パレットの設定が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4403">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful image reader palette set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4404">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4404">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4405">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) パレットのサイズが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4405">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid palette size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4406">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4406">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4407">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4407">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4408">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4408">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set “my_palette” as the palette of “my_image_reader”. */
status = gx_image_reader_palette_set(&my_image_reader, my_palette,
    my_palette_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the palette of “my_image_reader” has been set to “my_palette”. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4409">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4409">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4411">gx_image_reader_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4411">gx_image_reader_start</span></span>

## <a name="gx_image_reader_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4412">gx_image_reader_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4412">gx_image_reader_start</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4413">圧縮解除と変換のプロセスを開始します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4413">Start the decompress and conversion process</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4414">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4414">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_image_reader_start(
    GX_IMAGE_READER *image_reader, 
    GX_PIXELMAP *outmap);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4415">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4415">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4416">このサービスでは、未加工のイメージを指定された色形式にデコードします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4416">This service decodes a raw image to a specified color format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4417">現在、未加工のイメージの種類として jpeg と png のみがサポートされています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4417">Currently only jpeg and png raw image types are supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4418">これには、GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT が定義されている必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4418">This requires GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4419">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4419">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4420">**image_reader**: イメージ リーダー コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4420">**image_reader** Image reader control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4421">**pixelmap**: 出力ピクセルマップ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4421">**pixelmap** Output pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4422">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4422">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4423">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) イメージのデコードに成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4423">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful image decoding</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4424">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) メモリ アロケーターが定義されていないか、メモリの割り当てに失敗しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4424">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4425">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0X28) 入力のイメージの種類または出力の色形式がサポートされていません</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4425">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Input image type or output color format is not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4426">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4426">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4427">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4427">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4428">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4428">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4430">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4430">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_IMAGE_READER my_image_reader;
GX_PIXELMAP output_map;

/* Create my_image_reader here. */

/* Decoding a raw image according to the settings of “my_image_reader”. */
status = gx_image_reader_start(&my_image_reader, output_map)

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS “output_map” have been loaded with the requested pixelmap. */
```

## <a name="gx_line_chart_axis_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4434">gx_line_chart_axis_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4434">gx_line_chart_axis_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4435">折れ線グラフの x、y 軸を描画します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4435">Draw line chart x,y axis</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4436">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4436">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_line_chart_axis_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4437">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4437">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4438">このサービスでは、折れ線グラフの x、y 軸を描画します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4438">This service draws the x,y axis of a line chart.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4439">軸の色と線の幅のパラメーターは、折れ線グラフ情報の構造体から取得されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4439">The axis colors and line width parameters are retrieved from the line chart information structure.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4440">このサービスは、通常、gx_line_chart_draw 関数によって内部的に呼び出されますが、カスタムの描画関数の作成を支援するためにアプリケーションに公開されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4440">This service is normally called internally by the gx_line_chart_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4441">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4441">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4442">**chart**: 折れ線グラフ コントロール ブロック。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4442">**chart** Line chart control block.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4443">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4443">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4444">**なし**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4444">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4445">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4445">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4446">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4446">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4447">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4447">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom chart drawing function. */

VOID my_chart_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart)
{
    /* Call default window draw. */
    gx_window_draw((GX_WINDOW *)chart);

    /* Draw the line chart axis. */
    gx_line_chart_axis_draw(&chart->gx_line_chart_info);

    /* Draw the data line */
    gx_line_chart_data_draw(&chart->gx_line_chart_info);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4448">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4448">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4449">gx_line_chart_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4449">gx_line_chart_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4450">gx_line_chart_data_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4450">gx_line_chart_data_draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4451">gx_line_chart_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4451">gx_line_chart_draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4452">gx_line_chart_update</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4452">gx_line_chart_update</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4453">gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4453">gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate</span></span>

## <a name="gx_line_chart_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4454">gx_line_chart_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4454">gx_line_chart_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4455">GX_LINE_CHART ウィジェットを作成します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4455">Create GX_LINE_CHART widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4456">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4456">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_line_chart_create(
    GX_LINE_CHART *chart,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_LINE_CHART_INFO *info,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT chart_id, GX_RECTANGLE *size)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4457">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4457">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4458">このサービスでは、折れ線グラフ ウィンドウを作成します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4458">This service creates a line chart window.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4459">グラフ描画パラメーターとグラフ データは、GX_LINE_CHART_INFO 構造体で渡されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4459">The chart drawing parameters and chart data are passed in via the GX_LINE_CHART_INFO structure.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4460">GX_LINE_CHART は GX_WINDOW に基づいており、すべての GX_WINDOW API がサポートされています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4460">GX_LINE_CHART is based on GX_WINDOW, and supports all of the GX_WINDOW APIs.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4461">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4461">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4462">**chart**: GX_LINE_CHART コントロール ブロックへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4462">**chart** Pointer to the GX_LINE_CHART control block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4463">**name**: 省略可能な折れ線グラフ名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4463">**name** Optional line chart name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4464">**parent**: 親ウィジェット、または GX_NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4464">**parent** Parent widget, or GX_NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4465">**info**: 折れ線グラフ描画パラメーターを定義する構造体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4465">**info** Structure defining line chart drawing parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4466">**付録 I** には GX_LINE_CHART_INFO 構造体の定義が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4466">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_LINE_CHART_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4467">**style**: ウィジェットのスタイル フラグ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4467">**style** Widget style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4468">**chart_id**: グラフの論理 ID 値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4468">**chart_id** Chart logical ID value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4469">**size**: グラフ ウィンドウの境界ボックス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4469">**size** Chart window bounding rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4470">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4470">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4471">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 折れ線グラフの作成に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4471">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful line chart create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4472">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4472">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4473">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4473">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4474">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) ウィジェット コントロール ブロック サイズが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4474">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4475">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) ウィジェットは既に作成されています</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4475">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4476">使用可能な場所</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4476">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4477">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4477">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4478">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4478">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create a line chart */
GX_LINE_CHART chart;
GX_RECTANGLE chart_size;
GX_LINE_CHART_INFO gx_chart_info;
GX_WINDOW_ROOT *root_window;

chart_size = root_window->gx_widget_size;

/* Initialize params for the GUIX base chart. */
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_min_val = DATA_MIN_VAL;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_max_val = DATA_MAX_VAL;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_max_data_count = MAX_DATA_COUNT;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_active_data_count = 0;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_axis_line_width = AXIS_LINE_WIDTH;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_data_line_width = DATA_LINE_WIDTH;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_data = chart_data;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_line_color = GX_COLOR_ID_DATA_LINE;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_axis_color = GX_COLOR_ID_AXIS_LINE;

/* Leave room for labels on bottom and right. */
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_left_margin = 0;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_top_margin = 0;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_right_margin = 80;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_bottom_margin = 32;

status = gx_line_chart_create(&chart, “Line Chart”, root_window,
    &gx_chart_info, GX_STYLE_NONE, &chart_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the “chart” has been successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_line_chart_data_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4485">gx_line_chart_data_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4485">gx_line_chart_data_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4486">折れ線グラフのデータ線を描画します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4486">Draw line chart data line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4487">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4487">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_line_chart_data_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4488">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4488">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4489">このサービスでは、折れ線グラフのデータ線を描画します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4489">This service draws the line chart data line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4490">線の色と線の幅のパラメーターは、折れ線グラフ情報の構造体から取得されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4490">The line colors and line width parameters are retrieved from the line chart information structure.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4491">このサービスは、通常、gx_line_chart_draw 関数によって内部的に呼び出されますが、カスタムの描画関数の作成を支援するためにアプリケーションに公開されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4491">This service is normally called internally by the gx_line_chart_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4492">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4492">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4493">**chart**: 折れ線グラフ コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4493">**chart** Line chart control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4494">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4494">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4495">**なし**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4495">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4496">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4496">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4497">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4497">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4498">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4498">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom chart drawing function. */

VOID my_chart_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart)
{
    /* Call default window draw. */
    gx_window_draw((GX_WINDOW *)chart);

    /* Draw the line chart axis. */
    gx_line_chart_axis_draw(chart);

    /* Draw the data line. */
    gx_line_chart_data_draw(chart);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4505">折れ線グラフを描画します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4505">Draw the line chart</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4506">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4506">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_line_chart_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4507">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4507">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4508">これは、グラフの軸とデータ線を描画する既定の折れ線グラフ描画関数です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4508">This is the default line chart drawing function, which draws the chart axis and data line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4509">アプリケーションには通常、基本の折れ線グラフ ウィジェットによって描画されたグラフ軸やデータ線に、目盛り、スケール、またはその他の情報などを追加するための既定の描画を置き換えるカスタム描画関数が用意されています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4509">Applications usually provide a custom drawing function to replace the default drawing to add things such as tickmarks, scale, or other information to the chart axis and data line drawn by the base line chart widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4510">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4510">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4511">**chart**: 折れ線グラフ コントロール ブロックへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4511">**chart** Pointer to the line chart control block.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4512">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4512">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4513">**なし**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4513">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4514">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4514">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4515">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4515">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4516">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4516">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom chart drawing function. */

VOID my_chart_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart)
{
    /* Call default line chart draw. */
    gx_line_chart_draw(chart);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4517">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4517">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4518">gx_line_chart_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4518">gx_line_chart_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4519">gx_line_chart_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4519">gx_line_chart_draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4520">gx_line_chart_update</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4520">gx_line_chart_update</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4521">gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4521">gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate</span></span>

## <a name="gx_line_chart_update"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4522">gx_line_chart_update</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4522">gx_line_chart_update</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4523">折れ線グラフのデータ線を更新します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4523">Update line chart data line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4524">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4524">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_line_chart_update(
    GX_LINE_CHART *chart, 
    INT *data,
    INT data_count)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4525">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4525">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4526">このサービスでは、折れ線グラフ ウィンドウによってプロットされたデータ配列を更新し、強制的にウィンドウを再描画します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4526">This service updates the data array plotted by the line chart window, and forces the window to redraw.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4527">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4527">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4528">**chart**: 折れ線グラフ コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4528">**chart** Line chart control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4529">**data**: プロットされるデータ配列</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4529">**data** Data array to be plotted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4530">**data_count**: データ配列のサイズ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4530">**data_count** Size of the data array</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4531">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4531">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4532">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) テキスト ボタンの作成に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4532">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text button create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4533">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4533">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4534">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4534">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4535">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4535">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4536">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4536">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4537">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4537">Example</span></span>

```C
INT chart_data[100];
GX_LINE_CHART chart;

/* Update the data array associated with “chart”. */
status = gx_line_chart_update(&chart, chart_data, 100);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the line chart data has been updated. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4538">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4538">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4539">gx_line_chart_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4539">gx_line_chart_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4540">gx_line_chart_data_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4540">gx_line_chart_data_draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4541">gx_line_chart_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4541">gx_line_chart_draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4542">gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4542">gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate</span></span>

## <a name="gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4543">gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4543">gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4544">y 軸の固定小数点スケーリング値を計算します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4544">Calculate fixed-point y axis scaling value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4545">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4545">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate(
    GX_LINE_CHART *chart,
    INT *return_val);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4546">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4546">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4547">このサービスでは、グラフの Y 軸にデータ値をプロットするために使用される固定小数点スケーリング値を計算します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4547">This service calculates the fixed-point scaling value used to plot data values on the chart Y axis.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4548">このスケーリング値を計算するために、chart_info パラメーターとグラフの境界ボックスが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4548">The chart_info parameters and chart bounding rectangle are used to calculate this scaling value.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4549">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4549">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4550">**chart**: 折れ線グラフ コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4550">**chart** Line chart control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4551">**return_val**: 固定小数点の戻り値を保持する値のアドレス。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4551">**return_val** Address of value to hold fixed-point return value.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4552">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4552">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4553">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) y スケール値の計算に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4553">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful y scale value calculate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4554">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4554">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4555">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4555">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4556">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4556">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4557">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4557">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_LINE_CHART chart;
INT y_scale;

/* Caluclate y scale value of “chart”. */
status = gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate(&chart, &y_scale);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, y scale value of “chart” has been calculated. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4558">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4558">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4559">gx_line_chart_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4559">gx_line_chart_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4560">gx_line_chart_data_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4560">gx_line_chart_data_draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4561">gx_line_chart_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4561">gx_line_chart_draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4562">gx_line_chart_update</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4562">gx_line_chart_update</span></span>

## <a name="gx_menu_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4563">gx_menu_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4563">gx_menu_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4564">メニューを作成します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4564">Create a menu</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4565">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4565">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_menu_create(
    GX_MENU *menu,GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_id, 
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT menu_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4566">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4566">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4567">このサービスでは、指定されたとおりにメニューを作成し、そのメニューを指定された親ウィジェットに関連付けます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4567">This service creates a menu as specified and associates the menu with the supplied parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4568">これは、すべての種類のウィジェットを子メニュー項目として受け入れます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4568">It accepts all types of widget as child menu item.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4569">ウィジェットを子メニュー項目として挿入するには、**gx_menu_insert** を呼び出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4569">To insert a widget as a child menu item, call **gx_menu_insert**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4570">GX_MENU は GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT から派生しており、すべての gx_pixelmap_prompt API サービスがサポートされます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4570">GX_MENU is derived from GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT and supports all gx_pixelmap_prompt API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4571">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4571">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4572">**menu**: メニュー コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4572">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4573">**name**: メニューの名前</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4573">**name** Name of the menu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4574">**parent**: 親ウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4574">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4575">**text_id**: テキストのリソース ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4575">**text_id** Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4576">**fill_id**: 塗りつぶしのリソース ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4576">**fill_id** Resource ID of fill</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4577">**style**: ウィジェットのスタイル。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4577">**style** Style of the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4578">**付録 D** には、ウィジェット固有のスタイルだけでなく、すべてのウィジェット用に事前に定義されている一般的なスタイルが記載されています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4578">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4579">**menu_id**: メニューのアプリケーション定義 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4579">**menu_id** Application-defined ID of the menu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4580">**size**: メニューのサイズ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4580">**size** Size of the menu</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4581">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4581">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4582">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) メニューの作成に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4582">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful menu creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4583">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4583">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4584">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4584">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4585">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) ウィジェットが既に作成されています</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4585">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4586">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) ウィジェット コントロール ブロック サイズが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4586">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4587">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4587">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4588">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4588">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4589">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4589">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_MENU my_menu;

/* Create “my_menu”. */
status = gx_menu_create(&my_menu, “my_menu”, parent, MY_TEXT_ID,
    MY_FILL_ID, GX_STYLE_ENABLED, MY_MENU_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the menu was successfully created. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4595">gx_menu_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4595">gx_menu_draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4596">gx_menu_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4596">gx_menu_event_process</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4599">gx_menu_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4599">gx_menu_text_draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4600">gx_menu_text_offset_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4600">gx_menu_text_offset_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_menu_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4601">gx_menu_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4601">gx_menu_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4602">メニューを描画します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4602">Draw menu</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4603">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4603">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_menu_draw(GX_MENU *menu);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4604">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4604">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4605">このサービスでは、指定されたメニューを描画します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4605">This service draws the specified menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4606">通常、この関数は GUIX キャンバスの更新メカニズムによって内部的に呼び出されますが、カスタム メニュー ウイジェットのカスタム描画関数の実装を支援するためにアプリケーションに公開されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4606">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom menu widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4607">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4607">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4608">**menu**: メニュー コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4608">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4609">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4609">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4610">**なし**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4610">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4611">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4611">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4612">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4612">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4613">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4613">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom menu drawing function. */

VOID my_menu_draw(GX_MENU *menu)
{
    /* Call default menu draw. */
    gx_menu_draw(menu);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```
