## <a name="gx_menu_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4625">gx_menu_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4625">gx_menu_event_process</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4626">メニュー イベントを処理します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4626">Process menu event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4627">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4627">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_menu_event_process(GX_MENU *menu, GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4628">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4628">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4629">このサービスでは、指定されたメニューのイベントを処理します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4629">This service processes an event for the specified menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4630">このサービスは、カスタム メニューのイベント処理関数によって既定のイベント ハンドラーとして呼び出される必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4630">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom menu event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4631">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4631">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4632">**menu**: メニュー コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4632">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4633">**event_ptr**: 処理するイベントへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4633">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4634">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4634">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4635">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) メニューのイベント処理が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4635">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful menu event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4636">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4636">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4637">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4637">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4638">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x23) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4638">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x23) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4639">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4639">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4640">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4640">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4641">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4641">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic menu event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_menu_event_process(GX_MENU *menu, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */

        /* Call default event process if this is a system event such as GX_EVENT_SHOW. */
        status = gx_menu_event_process(menu, event);
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default menu
           event processing */
        status = gx_menu_event_process(menu, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4652">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4652">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4653">このサービスでは、メニューに新しい項目を挿入します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4653">This service inserts a new item to the menu.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4659">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4659">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4660">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4660">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4661">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4661">Allowed From</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4704">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4704">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4705">このサービスでは、メニューのテキストを描画します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4705">This service draws the text of a menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4706">通常、この関数は GUIX キャンバスの更新メカニズムによって内部的に呼び出されますが、カスタム メニュー ウイジェットのカスタム描画関数の実装を支援するためにアプリケーションに公開されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4706">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom menu widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4707">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4707">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4708">**menu**: メニュー コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4708">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4709">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4709">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4710">**なし**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4710">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4711">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4711">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4712">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4712">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4713">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4713">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom menu drawing function. */

VOID my_menu_draw(GX_MENU *menu)
{
    /* Call default menu background draw. */
    gx_pixelmap_prompt_background_draw(
                            (GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *)menu);

    /* Draw menu text. */
    gx_menu_text_draw(menu);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4718">gx_accordion_menu_position</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4718">gx_accordion_menu_position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4719">gx_menu_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4719">gx_menu_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4720">gx_menu_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4720">gx_menu_draw</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4723">gx_menu_remove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4723">gx_menu_remove</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4724">gx_menu_text_offset_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4724">gx_menu_text_offset_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_menu_text_offset_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4725">gx_menu_text_offset_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4725">gx_menu_text_offset_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4726">メニュー テキスト描画オフセットを設定します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4726">Set menu text draw offset</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4727">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4727">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_menu_text_offset_set(
    GX_MENU *menu, 
    GX_VALUE x_offset,
    GX_VALUE y_offset);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4728">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4728">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4729">このサービスでは、メニュー テキストに対して x、y 表示オフセットを設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4729">This service sets x, y display offset for menu text.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4730">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4730">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4731">**menu**: メニュー コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4731">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4732">**x_offset**: オフセットの X 座標</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4732">**x_offset** X coordinate of offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4733">**y_offset**: オフセットの Y 座標</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4733">**y_offset** Y coordinate of offset</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4734">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4734">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4735">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) メニュー テキスト描画オフセットが正常に設定されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4735">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful set menu text draw offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4736">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4736">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4737">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4737">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4738">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4738">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4739">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4739">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4740">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4740">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set text draw offset of menu “my_menu” to (20, 10). */
status = gx_menu_text_offset_set(&my_menu, 20, 10);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text draw offset of menu “my_menu” has been set to (20, 10). */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4744">gx_accordion_menu_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4744">gx_accordion_menu_event_process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4745">gx_accordion_menu_position</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4745">gx_accordion_menu_position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4746">gx_menu_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4746">gx_menu_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4747">gx_menu_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4747">gx_menu_draw</span></span>

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4752">gx_multi_line_text_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4752">gx_multi_line_text_button_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4753">複数行テキスト ボタンを作成します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4753">Create multi line text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4754">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4754">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_button_create(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT text_button_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4755">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4755">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4756">このサービスでは、複数行テキスト ボタン ウィジェットを作成します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4756">This service creates a multi-line text button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4757">複数行テキスト ボタンでは、ボタンのテキストが 1 - n 行に表示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4757">A multi-line text button displays the button text over 1-n lines.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4758">最大行数は、定数 GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON_MAX_LINES によって定義されます。既定値は 4 です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4758">The maximum number of lines is defined by the constant GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON_MAX_LINES, which defaults to 4.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4759">改行は、複数行テキスト ボタンに割り当てられたテキスト文字列内で復帰や、復帰と改行の組み合わせによって設定されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4759">The line breaks are set by carriage return and/or carriage return + line feed pairs within the text string assigned to the multi-line text button.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4760">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON は GX_TEXT_BUTTON から派生しており、すべての gx_text_button API サービスがサポートされます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4760">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON is derived from GX_TEXT_BUTTON and supports all gx_text_button API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4761">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4761">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4762">**text_button**: テキスト ボタン コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4762">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4763">**name**: テキスト ボタンの論理名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4763">**name** Logical name of text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4764">**parent**: ボタンの親ウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4764">**parent** Pointer to parent widget of the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4765">**text_id**: テキストのリソース ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4765">**text_id** Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4766">**style**: テキスト ボタンのスタイル。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4766">**style** Text button style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4767">**付録 D** には、ウィジェット固有のスタイルに加えて、すべてのウィジェット用に事前に定義された一般的なスタイルも含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4767">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4768">**text_button_id**: テキスト ボタンのアプリケーション定義 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4768">**text_button_id** Application-defined ID of the text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4769">**size**: ボタンのサイズ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4769">**size** Size of the button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4770">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4770">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4771">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 複数行テキスト ボタンの作成に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4771">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi line text button create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4772">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4772">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4773">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4773">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4774">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) ウィジェットが既に作成されています</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4774">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4775">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) ウィジェット コントロール ブロック サイズが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4775">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4776">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4776">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4777">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4777">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4778">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4778">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create multi-line text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_button_create(&my_text_button, "my text button",
    &my_parent_window, MY_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID,
    GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE, MY_TEXT_BUTTON_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the multi-line text button “my_text_button” was created. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4779">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4779">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4780">gx_text_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4780">gx_text_button_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4781">gx_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4781">gx_button_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4782">gx_multi_line_text_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4782">gx_multi_line_text_button_draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4783">gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4783">gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4784">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4784">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4785">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4785">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4786">gx_multi_line_text_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4786">gx_multi_line_text_button_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4787">複数行テキスト ボタンを描画します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4787">Draw multi-line text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4788">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4788">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_multi_line_text_button_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4789">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4789">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4790">このサービスでは、複数行テキスト ボタンを描画します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4790">This service draws the multi-line text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4791">通常、この関数は、キャンバスの更新操作の一部として GUIX によって内部的に呼び出されますが、カスタム描画関数を提供し、カスタム描画ベースとして既定の複数行テキスト ボタン描画を呼び出す必要があるアプリケーションにも公開されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4791">This function is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default multi-line text button drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4792">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4792">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4793">**button**: テキスト ボタン コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4793">**button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4794">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4794">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4795">**なし**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4795">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4796">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4796">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4797">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4797">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4798">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4798">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw the text button “my_text_button”. */
void MyButtonDraw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Do the normal drawing first */
    gx_multi_line_text_button_draw(&my_text_button);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4806">gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4806">gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4807">複数行テキスト ボタンに対する既定のイベント処理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4807">Default event handling for multi-line text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4808">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4808">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4809">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4809">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4810">このサービスは、複数行テキスト ボタン ウィジェットの既定のイベント処理関数です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4810">This service is the default event handling function for the multi line text button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4811">この関数には、テキスト ボタン ウィジェットに対してカスタム イベント処理を提供するアプリケーションからアクセスできるようになります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4811">This function is made accessible to applications that want to provide custom event handling for a text button widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4812">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4812">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4813">**button**: テキスト ボタン コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4813">**button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4814">**event_ptr**: 処理されるイベント</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4814">**event_ptr** Event to be processed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4815">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4815">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4816">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) イベントが正常に処理されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4816">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully handled event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4817">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4817">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4818">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4818">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4819">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4819">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4820">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4820">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4821">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4821">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT MyEventHandler(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process(button, event_ptr);
        /* add custom actions here */
        break;
    default:
        gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process(button, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4822">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4822">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4823">gx_text_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4823">gx_text_button_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4824">gx_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4824">gx_button_create</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4826">gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4826">gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4827">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4827">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4829">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4829">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4830">描画サポート関数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4830">Drawing support function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4831">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4831">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4832">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4832">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4833">このサポート関数では、複数行テキスト ボタンのテキスト部分を描画します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4833">This support function draws the text portion of a multi-line text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4834">この関数は gx_multi_line_text_button_draw() によって内部的に呼び出され、カスタムの複数行テキスト ボタンの描画関数を定義するアプリケーションの利便性向上のために、独立した API として提供されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4834">This function is called internally by gx_multi_line_text_button_draw(), and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom multi-line text button drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4835">ボタンの背景描画をカスタマイズする必要があるアプリケーションは、カスタム描画関数を提供し、背景上にボタン テキストを描画するカスタム描画の一部として multi_line_text_button_text_draw サービスを呼び出すことができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4835">Applications that want to customize the button background drawing can provide their custom drawing function, and invoke the multi_line_text_button_text_draw service as part of their custom drawing to draw the button text over the background.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4836">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4836">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4837">**text_button**: テキスト ボタン コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4837">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4838">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4838">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4839">**なし**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4839">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4840">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4840">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4841">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4841">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4842">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4842">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function */
VOID my_button_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* insert code here to draw button background */

    /* call support function to do text drawing */
    gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw();

    /* draw child widgets */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *) button);
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4850">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4850">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4851">テキスト リソース ID をテキスト ボタンに設定します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4851">Set text resource ID to the text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4852">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4852">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    RESOURCE_ID string_id)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4853">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4853">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4854">このサービスでは、指定された文字列リソース ID をテキスト ボタンに設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4854">This service sets the specified string resource ID to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4855">文字列には、ボタン領域内の複数行にテキストを表示する改行文字を含めることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4855">The string may contain newline characters which act to display the text on multiple lines within the button area.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4856">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4856">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4857">**text_button**: テキスト ボタン コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4857">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4858">**string_id**: 文字列のリソース ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4858">**string_id** Resource ID of the string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4859">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4859">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4860">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 文字列リソース ID をテキスト ボタンに正常に設定しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4860">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the string resource ID to the text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4861">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4861">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4862">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4862">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4863">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4863">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4864">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4864">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4865">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4865">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the string ID ”MY_STRING_ID” to the text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set(
    &my_text_button, MY_STRING_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the string ID MY_STRING_ID was set to “my_text_button”. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4866">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4866">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4870">gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4870">gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4871">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4871">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4872">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4872">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4873">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4873">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4874">テキストをテキスト ボタンに割り当てます (非推奨)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4874">Assign text to the text button (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4875">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4875">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_mult_line_text_button_text_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4876">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4876">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4877">このサービスは非推奨となり、gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext() に置き換えられます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4877">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4878">このサービスでは、指定された文字列をテキスト ボタンに割り当てます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4878">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4879">text_button ウィジェットがスタイル GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY で作成された場合は、ウィジェットによって、割り当てられたテキスト文字列のプライベート コピーが作成されます。そのため、このサービスを要求する前に gx_system_memmory_allocate_set API が 1 回呼び出される必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4879">If the text_button widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned, and therefore the gx_system_memmory_allocate_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4880">GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY がアクティブでない場合、ウィジェットでは受信文字列のプライベート コピーが作成されないため、文字列は静的またはグローバルに割り当てられる必要があります (つまり、自動または一時変数であってはなりません)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4880">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4881">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4881">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4882">**text_button**: テキスト ボタン コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4882">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4883">**text**: NULL で終わる文字列へのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4883">**text** pointer to the NULL-terminated string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4884">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4884">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4885">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ボタンにテキストが正常に設定されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4885">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the text to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4886">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4886">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4887">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4887">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4888">**GX_MEMORY_ERROR** (0X30) メモリ アロケーターが定義されていません</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4888">**GX_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4889">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) 文字列の長さが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4889">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4890">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4890">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
static GX_CHAR text[] = “myrstring”;

status = gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set(&my_text_button, text);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text of “my_text_button” was set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4900">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4900">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4901">テキスト ボタンにテキストを割り当てます</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4901">Assign text to the text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4902">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4902">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_mult_line_text_button_text_set_ext(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_STRING *string)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4903">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4903">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4904">このサービスでは、指定された文字列をテキスト ボタンに割り当てます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4904">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4905">text_button ウィジェットがスタイル GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY で作成された場合は、ウィジェットによって、割り当てられたテキスト文字列のプライベート コピーが作成されます。そのため、このサービスを要求する前に gx_system_memmory_allocate_set API が 1 回呼び出される必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4905">If the text_button widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned, and therefore the gx_system_memmory_allocate_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4906">GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY がアクティブでない場合、ウィジェットでは受信文字列のプライベート コピーが作成されないため、文字列は静的またはグローバルに割り当てられる必要があります (つまり、自動または一時変数であってはなりません)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4906">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4907">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4907">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4908">**text_button**: テキスト ボタン コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4908">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4909">**string**: GX_STRING 変数へのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4909">**string** pointer to GX_STRING variable</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4910">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4910">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4911">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ボタンにテキストが正常に設定されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4911">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the text to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4912">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4912">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4913">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4913">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4914">**GX_MEMORY_ERROR** (0X30) メモリ アロケーターが定義されていません</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4914">**GX_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4915">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) 文字列の長さが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4915">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4916">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4916">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4917">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4917">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4918">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4918">Example</span></span>

```C
static GX_CHAR text[] = “myrstring”;
GX_STRING string;

string.gx_string_ptr = text;
string.gx_string_length = strlen(text);

/* Set text to the text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext(&my_text_button, string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text of “my_text_button” was set. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4919">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4919">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4923">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4923">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_backspace"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4924">gx_multi_line_text_input_backspace</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4924">gx_multi_line_text_input_backspace</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4925">複数行テキスト入力のカーソル位置の前にある文字を削除します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4925">Delete a character before multi line text input cursor position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4926">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4926">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_backspace(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4927">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4927">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4928">このサービスでは、複数行テキスト入力のカーソル位置の前にある文字を削除します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4928">This service deletes the character before multi line text input cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4929">このサービスは、Backspace キーを押すイベントを受信したときに内部的に呼び出されますが、アプリケーションから呼び出すこともできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4929">This service is called internally when a backspace key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4930">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4930">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4931">**text_input** 複数行テキスト入力ウィジェット コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4931">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4932">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4932">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4933">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 複数行テキスト入力の Backspace に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4933">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text input backspace</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4934">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4934">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4935">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4935">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4936">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4936">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x23) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4937">**GX_FAILURE** (0X10) 無効なフォント</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4937">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Invalid font</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4938">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4938">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* Delete a character before the cursor of “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_backspace(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the character before the cursor has been deleted. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_clear"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4972">gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_clear</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4972">gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_clear</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4973">テキスト入力バッファーからすべての文字を削除します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4973">Deletes all characters from the text input buffer</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4974">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4974">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_clear(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4975">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4975">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4976">このサービスは、テキスト入力バッファーからすべての文字を削除します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4976">This service deletes all characters from the text input buffer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-4977">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-4977">Parameters</span></span>

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5017">gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5017">gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5018">テキスト入力ウィジェットのバッファー情報を取得します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5018">Retrieves buffer information of text input widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5019">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5019">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_get(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input, 
    GX_CHAR **buffer_address,
    UINT *content_size, 
    UINT *buffer_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5020">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5020">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5021">このサービスでは、複数行テキスト入力ウィジェットのバッファー情報を取得します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5021">This service retrieves buffer information of a multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5022">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5022">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5023">**text_input**: 複数行テキスト入力ウィジェット コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5023">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5024">**buffer_address**: 入力バッファーのアドレス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5024">**buffer_address** The address of the input buffer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5025">**content_size** 入力データのバイト数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5025">**content_size** The byte count of the input data</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5026">**buffer_size** 入力バッファーのサイズ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5026">**buffer_size** The size of the input buffer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5027">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5027">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5028">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 複数行テキストの取得に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5028">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5029">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5029">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5030">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5030">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5031">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5031">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5032">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5032">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5033">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5033">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CHAR *buffer_address;
UINT context_size;
UINT buffer_size;

/* Retrieves buffer information of “my_text_input” widget. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_get(&my_text_input,
    &buffer_address, &string_size,
    &buffer_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the value of buffer_address, string_size and buffer_size has been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5065">gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5065">gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5066">複数行テキスト入力の現在のカーソル位置に文字列を挿入します (非推奨)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5066">Insert a character string at current multi line text input cursor position (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5067">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5067">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_UBYTE *insert_str,
    UINT insert_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5068">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5068">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5069">この API は非推奨となり、gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert_ext () に置き換えられました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5069">This API is deprecated and replaced by gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5070">このサービスでは、複数行テキスト入力文字列バッファーの現在の入力位置に文字列を挿入します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5070">This service inserts a character string into the multi line text input string buffer at the current cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5071">このサービスは、特定のキーを押すイベントを受信したときに内部的に呼び出されますが、アプリケーションから呼び出すこともできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5071">This service is called internally when specific key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5072">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5072">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5073">**text_input**: 複数行テキスト入力ウィジェット コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5073">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5074">**insert_str**: 挿入される UTF-8 形式の文字列</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5074">**insert_str** UTF-8 format character string to be inserted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5075">**insert_size**: 挿入されるバイト数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5075">**insert_size** Byte count to be inserted</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5076">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5076">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5077">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 文字列を正常に挿入しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5077">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully inserted the character string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5078">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5078">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5079">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5079">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5080">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5080">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5081">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) 文字列のサイズが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5081">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid string size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5082">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) フォントが無効であるか、バッファー サイズが不足しています</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5082">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Invalid font or out of buffer size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5083">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5083">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5084">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5084">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5085">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5085">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Insert characters at current cursor position. */
GX_CHAR insert_text[10] = “insert”;
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert(&my_text_input,
    insert_text,
    GX_STRLEN(insert_text));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the multi line text input widget has successfully insert the string. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5088">gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5088">gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert_ext</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5089">複数行テキスト入力の現在のカーソル位置に文字列を挿入します (非推奨)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5089">Insert a character string at current multi line text input cursor position (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5090">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5090">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert_ext(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CONST GX_STRING *string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5091">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5091">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5092">このサービスでは、複数行テキスト入力文字列バッファーの現在の入力位置に文字列を挿入します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5092">This service inserts a character string into the multi line text input string buffer at the current cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5093">このサービスは、特定のキーを押すイベントを受信したときに内部的に呼び出されますが、アプリケーションから呼び出すこともできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5093">This service is called internally when specific key down events are received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5094">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5094">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5095">**text_input**: 複数行テキスト入力ウィジェット コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5095">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5096">**string**: 挿入される UTF-8 でエンコードされた文字列</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5096">**string** UTF-8 encoded character string to be inserted</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5097">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5097">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5098">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 文字列を正常に挿入しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5098">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully inserted the character string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5099">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5099">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5100">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5100">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5101">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5101">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5102">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) 文字列のサイズが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5102">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid string size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5103">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) フォントが無効であるか、バッファー サイズが不足しています</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5103">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Invalid font or out of buffer size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5104">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) 文字列の長さが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5104">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5105">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5105">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5106">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5106">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5107">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5107">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Insert characters at current cursor position. */
GX_CHAR insert_text[10] = “insert”;
GX_STRING string;

string.gx_string_ptr = insert_text;
string.gx_string_length = strlen(insert_text);

status = gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert_ext(&my_text_input, &string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the multi line text input widget has successfully inserted the string. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5139">gx_multi_line_text_input_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5139">gx_multi_line_text_input_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5140">複数行テキスト入力を作成します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5140">Create multi-line text input</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5141">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5141">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_create(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, GX_WINDOW *parent,
    GX_CHAR *input_buffer, UINT buffer_size,
    ULONG style, USHORT text_input_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5142">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5142">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5143">このサービスでは、複数行テキスト入力ウィジェットを作成します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5143">This service creates a multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5144">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT は GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW から派生しており、すべての gx_multi_line_text_view サービスがサポートされます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5144">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT is derived from GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW and supports all gx_multi_line_text_view services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5145">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5145">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5146">**text_input**: 複数行テキスト入力ウィジェット コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5146">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5147">**name**: テキスト入力ウィジェットの名前</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5147">**name** Name of text input widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5148">**parent**: 親ウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5148">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5149">**input_buffer**: テキスト入力バッファーへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5149">**input_buffer** Pointer to text input buffer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5150">**buffer_size**: テキスト入力バッファーのサイズ (バイト単位)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5150">**buffer_size** Size of text input buffer in bytes</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5151">**style**: テキスト入力ウィジェットのスタイル。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5151">**style** Style of text input widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5152">**付録 D** には、ウィジェット固有のスタイルに加えて、すべてのウィジェット用に事前に定義された一般的なスタイルも含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5152">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5153">**text_input_id**: テキスト入力のアプリケーション定義 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5153">**text_input_id** Application-defined ID of text input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5154">**size**: テキスト入力ウィジェットのディメンション</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5154">**size** Dimensions of text input widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5155">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5155">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5156">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 複数行テキスト入力の作成が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5156">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text input create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5157">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5157">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5158">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5158">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5163">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5163">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5164">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5164">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT my_text_input;
GX_CHAR my_buffer[100];
GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Define widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 10, 10, 100, 200);

/* Create multi-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_create(&my_text_input,
    “my_text_input”, &my_parent,
    my_buffer, 100, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
    MY_TEXT_INPUT_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text input “my_text_input” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_cursor_pos_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5196">gx_multi_line_text_input_cursor_pos_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5196">gx_multi_line_text_input_cursor_pos_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5197">複数行テキスト入力のカーソル位置を取得します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5197">Retrieve multi line text input cursor position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5198">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5198">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_cursor_pos_get(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_POINT cursor_pos);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5199">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5199">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5200">このサービスでは、複数行テキスト入力のカーソル位置を取得します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5200">This service retrieves the mult-line text input cursor position.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5201">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5201">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5202">**text_input**: 複数行テキスト入力ウィジェット コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5202">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5203">**cursor_pos**: 取得したカーソル位置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5203">**cursor_pos** Retrieved cursor position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5204">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5204">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5205">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)カーソル位置の取得に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5205">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved cursor position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5206">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5206">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5207">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5207">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5208">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5208">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5209">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5209">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5210">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5210">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve the cursor position of “my_text_input”. */
GX_POINT cursor_pos;
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_cursor_pos_get(&my_text_input,
    &cursor_pos);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the cursor position has been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5243">gx_multi_line_text_input_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5243">gx_multi_line_text_input_delete</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5244">複数行テキスト入力のカーソル位置にある文字を削除します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5244">Delete the character at the multi line text input cursor position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5245">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5245">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_delete(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5246">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5246">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5247">このサービスでは、複数行テキスト入力のカーソル位置の後にある文字を削除します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5247">This service deletes the character after the multi line text input cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5248">このサービスは、Delete キーを押すイベントを受信したときに内部的に呼び出されますが、アプリケーションから呼び出すこともできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5248">This service is called internally when a delete key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5249">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5249">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5250">**text_input** 複数行テキスト入力ウィジェット コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5250">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5251">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5251">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5252">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) カーソルの後の文字を正常に削除しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5252">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully delete a character after the cursor</span></span>

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_down_arrow"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5291">gx_multi_line_text_input_down_arrow</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5291">gx_multi_line_text_input_down_arrow</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5292">複数行テキスト入力のカーソルを次の行に移動します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5292">Move the multi line text input cursor to the next line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5293">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5293">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_down_arrow(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5294">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5294">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5295">このサービスでは、複数行テキスト入力ウィジェットのカーソルを次の行に配置します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5295">This service positions the multi line text input widget cursor to the next line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5296">このサービスは、下矢印キーを押すイベントを受信したときに内部的に呼び出されますが、アプリケーションから呼び出すこともできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5296">This service is called internally when a down arrow key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5297">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5297">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5298">**text_input** 複数行テキスト入力ウィジェット コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5298">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5299">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5299">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5300">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) テキスト入力カーソルを次の行に正常に移動しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5300">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved text input cursor to the next line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5301">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5301">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5302">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5302">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5303">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5303">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5304">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) フォントまたは行の高さが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5304">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Invalid font or line height</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5305">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5305">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5306">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5306">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5307">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5307">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move input cursor to the next line. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_down_arrow(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, text text input cursor has been moved to the next line. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_end"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5339">gx_multi_line_text_input_end</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5339">gx_multi_line_text_input_end</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5340">複数行テキスト入力のカーソルを現在の行の末尾に移動します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5340">Move the multi line text input cursor to the end of the current line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5341">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5341">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_end(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5342">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5342">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5343">このサービスでは、複数行テキスト入力ウィジェットのカーソルを現在の文字列行の末尾に配置します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5343">This service positions the multi line text input widget cursor to the end of the current string line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5344">このサービスは、End キーを押すイベントを受信したときに内部的に呼び出されますが、アプリケーションから呼び出すこともできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5344">This service is called internally when an end key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5345">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5345">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5346">**text_input** 複数行テキスト入力ウィジェット コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5346">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5347">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5347">Return Values</span></span>

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5386">gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5386">gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5387">複数行テキスト入力の既定のイベント処理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5387">Default event handling for multi-line text input</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5388">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5388">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5389">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5389">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5390">このサービスは、複数行テキスト入力ウィジェットの既定のイベント処理関数です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5390">This service is the default event handling function for the multi line text input widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5391">この関数は、複数行テキスト入力ウィジェットに対してカスタム イベント処理を提供するアプリケーションからアクセスできるようになります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5391">This function is made accessible to applications that want to provide custom event handling for a multi line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5392">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5392">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5393">**button**: 複数行テキスト入力コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5393">**button** Pointer to multi line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5394">**event_ptr**: 処理されるイベント</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5394">**event_ptr** Event to be processed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5395">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5395">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5396">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) イベントが正常に処理されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5396">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully handled event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5397">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5397">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5398">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5398">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5399">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) 親ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5399">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5400">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5400">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5401">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5401">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-5402">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-5402">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT MyEventHandler(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* pass all other events to the generic multi line text
            input event processing */
        gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process(input, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}
```
