## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_info_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7866">gx_radial_progress_bar_info_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7866">gx_radial_progress_bar_info_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7867">放射状進行状況バーの情報を設定します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7867">Set radial progress bar information</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7868">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7868">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_progress_bar_info_set(
    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7869">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7869">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7870">このサービスでは、放射状進行状況バーに割り当てられた情報パラメーターをリセットします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7870">This service resets the information parameters assigned to the radial progress bar.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7871">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7871">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7872">**progress** bar 放射状進行状況バー コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7872">**progress** bar Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7873">**info** 放射状進行状況バーの情報構造体へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7873">**info** Pointer to radial progress bar information structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7874">**付録 I** には GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO 構造体の定義が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7874">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7875">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7875">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7876">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) 放射状進行状況バーの情報が正常に設定されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7876">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial progress bar info set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7877">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7877">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7878">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7878">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7879">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7879">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7880">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7880">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7881">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7881">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7882">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7882">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RAIDAL_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO info;

info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_xcenter = 200;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_ycenter = 200;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_radius = 100;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_current_angle = 180;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_anchor_val = -180;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_font_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
info.gx_raidal_progress_bar_info_normal_text_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_selected_text_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_disabled_text_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_normal_brush_width = 20;
info.gx_raidal_progress_bar_info_selected_brush_width = 16;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_normal_brush_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_WIDGET_FILL;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_selected_brush_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL;

/* Set appearance information for radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_info_set(&my_progress_bar, &info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the appearance information of “my_progress_bar” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7893">gx_radial_progress_bar_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7893">gx_radial_progress_bar_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7894">放射状進行状況バーのテキストの色を設定します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7894">Set radial progress bar text color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7895">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7895">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_progress_bar_text_color_set(
    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_text_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7896">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7896">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7897">このサービスでは、進行状況バーのテキストの色を設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7897">This service sets the text color of radial progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7898">この値は、スタイル GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_TEXT_DRAW が設定されている場合にのみ使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7898">This value is only used if the style GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_TEXT_DRAW is set.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7899">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7899">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7900">**progress** bar 放射状進行状況バー コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7900">**progress** bar Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7901">**normal_color** 通常状態のテキストの色のリソース ID。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7901">**normal_color** Resource ID of text color in normal state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7902">**付録 A** には、事前定義された色のリソース ID が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7902">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7903">なお、アプリケーションでカスタムの色のリソース ID を追加することもできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7903">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7904">**selected_color_id** ウィジェットがフォーカスされたときのテキストの色のリソース ID。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7904">**selected_color** Resource ID of text color when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7905">**付録 A** には、事前定義された色のリソース ID が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7905">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7906">なお、アプリケーションでカスタムの色のリソース ID を追加することもできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7906">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7907">**disabled_color** スタイル GX_STYLE_ENABLED が設定されていない場合の、テキストの色のリソース ID。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7907">**disabled_color** Resource ID of text color when the style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7908">**付録 A** には、事前定義された色のリソース ID が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7908">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7909">なお、アプリケーションでカスタムの色のリソース ID を追加することもできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7909">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7910">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7910">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7911">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 放射状進行状況バーのテキストの色が正常に設定されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7911">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial progress bar text color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7912">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7912">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7913">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7913">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7914">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェット チェックが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7914">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget check</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7915">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7915">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7916">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7916">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7917">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7917">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set text color for radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_text_color_set(&my_progress_bar,
                            GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
                            GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
                            GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text color of “my_progress_bar” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7928">gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7928">gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7929">放射状進行状況バーのテキストを描画します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7929">Draw radial progress bar text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7930">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7930">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7931">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7931">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7932">このサービスでは、指定された放射状進行状況バーのテキストを描画します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7932">This service draws the text of specified radial progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7933">この関数は gx_radial_progress_bar_draw() の一部として内部的に呼び出されますが、アプリケーションによってカスタムの進行状況バー描画関数が定義されるケースをサポートするために、アプリケーションに公開されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7933">This function is called internally as part of the gx_radial_progress_bar_draw(), but is exposed to the application to support those cases where the application defines a custom progress bar drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7934">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7934">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7935">**progress bar** 放射状進行状況バー コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7935">**progress bar** Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7936">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7936">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7937">**なし**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7937">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7938">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7938">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7939">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7939">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7940">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7940">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw text for radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw (&my_progress_bar);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text of “my_progress_bar” has been drawn. */

/* Write a custom radial progress bar drawing function. */
VOID my_radial_progress_bar_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *radial_progress)
{
    /* Add your own background draw here. */

    /* Call default radial progress bar text draw. */
    gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw(radial_progress);

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *)radial_progress);
}
```

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7951">gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7951">gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7952">放射状進行状況バーの値を設定します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7952">Set radial progress bar value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7953">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7953">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set(
    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar, 
    GX_VALUE value);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7954">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7954">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7955">このサービスでは、放射状進行状況バーの値を設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7955">This service sets radial progress bar value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7956">割り当てられる値は、[-360, 360] の範囲に制限され、進行状況バーの現在の場所で可能な角度値の範囲を定義します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7956">The assigned value is limited to the range [-360, 360], defining the possible range of angular values for the progress bar current location.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7957">アプリケーションでは、示されている実際の値をスケーリングして、進行状況バー ウィジェットに角度値を割り当てる必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7957">The application must scale the real-world value being indicated to assign an angular value to the progress bar widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7958">進行状況バーは、現在値がアンカー位置と上部円弧の端点間の角度差を示すように描画されます。負の値を指定すると、アンカー位置から時計回りの方向に円弧が描画されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7958">The progress bar is drawn such that the current value indicates the angular delta between the anchor position and the end point of the upper arc. Negative values cause the arc to be drawn in a clockwise direction starting at the anchor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7959">正の現在値を指定すると、アンカー位置から反時計回りに円弧が描画されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7959">Positive current value causes the arc to be drawn in a counter-clockwise direction starting at the anchor position.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7960">たとえば、円弧の最上部 (12 時の位置) から開始し、右 (3 時の位置) で終わる円弧を描画するには、アンカー値 90 度と、現在値 -90 度を割り当てます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7960">For example, to draw an arc starting at the top of the arc (12 o’clock position) and ending at the right (three o’clock position), assign an anchor value of 90 degrees and a current value of -90 degrees.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7961">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7961">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7962">**progress** bar 放射状進行状況バー コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7962">**progress** bar Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7963">**value** 新しい進行状況バーの値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7963">**value** New progress bar value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7964">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7964">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7965">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) 放射状進行状況バーの値が正常に設定されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7965">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial progress bar value set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7966">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7966">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7967">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7967">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7968">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7968">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7969">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7969">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7970">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7970">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7971">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7971">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE new_value = 180;

/* Set value for radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set(&my_progress_bar,
                                        new_value);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the value of “my_progress_bar” has been set. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7979">gx_radial_progress_bar_info_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7979">gx_radial_progress_bar_info_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7980">gx_radial_progress_bar_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7980">gx_radial_progress_bar_text_color_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7981">gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7981">gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw</span></span>

## <a name="gx_radio_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7982">gx_radio_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7982">gx_radio_button_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7983">ラジオ ボタンを作成します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7983">Create radio button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7984">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7984">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radio_button_create(
    GX_RADIO_BUTTON *button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id, ULONG style,
    USHORT radio_button_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7985">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7985">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7986">このサービスでは、ラジオ ボタン ウィジェットを作成します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7986">This service creates a radio button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7987">GX_RADIO_BUTTON は GX_TEXT_BUTTON から派生しているため、すべての gx_text_button サービスもこのウィジェットの種類でサポートされます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7987">GX_RADIO_BUTTON is derived from GX_TEXT_BUTTON, and therefore all gx_text_button services are also supported by this widget type.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7988">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7988">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7989">**button** ラジオ ボタン コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7989">**button** Pointer to radio button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7990">**name** ラジオ ボタン ウィジェットの論理名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7990">**name** Logical name of radio button widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7991">**parent** 親ウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7991">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7992">**text_id** ラジオ ボタンのリソース ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7992">**text_id** Resource ID of radio button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7993">**style** ラジオ ボタンのスタイル。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7993">**style** Style of radio button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7994">**付録 D** には、すべてのウィジェット用に事前に定義されている一般的なスタイルと、ウィジェット固有のスタイルが含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7994">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7995">**radio_button_id** ラジオ ボタンのアプリケーション定義 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7995">**radio_button_id** Application-defined ID of radio button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7996">**size** ラジオ ボタンの大きさ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7996">**size** Dimensions of radio button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7997">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7997">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7998">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ラジオ ボタンが正常に作成されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7998">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radio button create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-7999">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-7999">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8000">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8000">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8001">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) ウィジェットは既に作成されています</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8001">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8002">**GX_INVALID_** SIZE (0x19) ウィジェット コントロール ブロックのサイズが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8002">**GX_INVALID_** SIZE (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8003">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) リソース ID が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8003">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8004">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8004">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8005">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8005">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8006">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8006">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8007">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8007">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_radio_button”. */
status = gx_radio_button_create(&my_radio_button, “my_radio_button”, &my_parent,
                    MY_RADIO_BUTTON_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID,
                    GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_RADIO_BUTTON_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radio button “my_radio_button” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_radio_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8022">gx_radio_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8022">gx_radio_button_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8023">ラジオ ボタンを描画します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8023">Draw radio button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8024">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8024">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_radio_button_draw(GX_RADIO_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8025">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8025">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8026">このサービスでは、ラジオ ボタン ウィジェットを描画します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8026">This service draws a radio button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8027">このサービスは、GUIX キャンバスの更新によって内部的に呼び出されますが、オーバーライドされた描画関数によって呼び出すこともできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8027">This service is called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh, but can also be called by overridden drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8028">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8028">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8029">**button** ラジオ ボタン ウィジェット コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8029">**button** Pointer to radio button widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8030">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8030">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8031">**なし**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8031">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8032">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8032">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8033">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8033">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8034">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8034">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom radio button drawing function. */

VOID my_radio_button_draw(GX_RADIO_BUTTON *radio_button)
{
    /* Call default radio button draw. */
    gx_radio_button_draw(radio_button);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *)radio_button);
}
```

## <a name="gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8049">gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8049">gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8050">ラジオ ボタンのピクセルマップを設定します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8050">Set pixelmaps for radio button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8051">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8051">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set(
    GX_RADIO_BUTTON *button,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID off_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID on_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID off_disabled_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID on_disabled_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8052">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8052">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8053">このサービスでは、ボタンの状態ごとに、指定されたラジオ ボタンによって表示されるピクセルマップを割り当てます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8053">This service assigns the pixelmaps to be displayed by the specified radio button for each button state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8054">リソース ID は重複してかまいません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8054">The resource IDs can be duplicated.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8055">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8055">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8056">**off_id** ラジオ ボタンのオフ状態に使用されるピクセルマップ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8056">**off_id** Pixelmap used for radio button off state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8057">**off_id** ラジオ ボタンのオン状態に使用されるピクセルマップ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8057">**on_id** Pixelmap used for radio button on state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8058">**off_disabled_id** 無効またはオフの状態のラジオ ボタンに使用されるピクセルマップ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8058">**off_disabled_id** Pixelmap used for radio button disabled and off state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8059">**off_disabled_id** 無効またはオンの状態のラジオ ボタンに使用されるピクセルマップ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8059">**on_disabled_id** Pixelmap used for radio button disabled and on state</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8060">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8060">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8061">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ラジオ ボタンが正常に設定されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8061">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radio button pixelmaps set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8062">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8062">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8063">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8063">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8064">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8064">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8065">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8065">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8066">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8066">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8067">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8067">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set pixelmap for “my_radio_button”. */
status = gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set(&my_radio_button,
                                MY_OFF_PIXELMAP,
                                MY_ON_PIXELMAP,
                                MY_OFF_DISABLED_PIXELMAP,
                                MY_ON_DISABLED_PIXELMAP);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmaps for radio button “my_radio_button” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8082">gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8082">gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8083">放射状スライダーのアンカー一覧を設定します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8083">Set radial slider anchor list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8084">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8084">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_VALUE *anchor_angles, 
    USHORT anchor_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8085">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8085">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8086">このサービスでは、放射状スライダーのアンカー角度を設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8086">This service sets anchor angles for radial slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8087">アンカー角度一覧が設定されている場合、放射状スライダーの角度は、定義済みアンカー角度のいずれかになります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8087">If anchor angle list is set, the radial slider angle will be one of defined anchor angles.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8088">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8088">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8089">**slider** 放射状スライダー コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8089">**slider** Radial slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8090">**anchor_angles** 設定する角度一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8090">**anchor_angles** Angle list to set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8091">**anchor_count** アンカー角度の数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8091">**anchor_count** Count of the anchor angles</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8092">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8092">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8093">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) アンカー角度が正常に設定されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8093">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful anchor angles set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8094">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8094">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8095">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8095">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8096">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) アンカー一覧が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8096">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid anchor list</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8097">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8097">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8098">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8098">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8099">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8099">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE anchor_angles[]={0, 30, 60, 90, 120, 150, 180};
USHORT anchor_count = 7;

/* Set anchor angles for radial slider. */
status = gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set(&my_radial_slider,
                                anchor_angles, anchor_count);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the anchor angles have been set for “my_radial_slider”. */

/* Set anchor angles for radial slider. */
status = gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set(&my_radial_slider,
                                GX_NULL, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the anchor angles have been removed from “my_radial_slider”. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_angle_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8110">gx_radial_slider_angle_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8110">gx_radial_slider_angle_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8111">放射状スライダーの角度を設定します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8111">Set radial slider angle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8112">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8112">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_angle_set(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_VALUE new_angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8113">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8113">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8114">このサービスでは、放射状スライダーの新しい角度値を設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8114">This service sets new angle value for radial slider.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8115">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8115">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8116">**slider** 放射状スライダー コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8116">**slider** Pointer to radial slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8117">**new_angle** 設定する新しい角度値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8117">**new_angle** New angle value to be set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8118">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8118">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8119">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) 放射状スライダーの角度が正常に設定されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8119">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial slider angle set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8120">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8120">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8121">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8121">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8122">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8122">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8123">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8123">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8124">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8124">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8125">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8125">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set “my_radial_slider” angle to 0 degree(3 o’clock position). */
status = gx_radial_slider_angle_set(&my_radial_slider, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the value of “my_radial_slider” has been set to 0 degree. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8135">gx_radial_slider_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8135">gx_radial_slider_pixelmap_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_animation_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8136">gx_radial_slider_animation_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8136">gx_radial_slider_animation_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8137">放射状スライダーのアニメーション情報を作成します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8137">Create radial slider animation info</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8138">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8138">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_animation_set(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    USHORT steps, USHORT delay, 
    USHORT animation_style,
    VOID (*animation_update_callback)(GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8139">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8139">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8140">このサービスでは、放射状スライダーの針のアニメーションについて、アニメーションのステップ、遅延時間、およびアニメーション スタイルを設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8140">This service sets animation steps, delay time and animation styles for radial slider needle animation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8141">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8141">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8142">**slider** 放射状スライダー コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8142">**slider** Pointer to radial slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8143">**steps** 1 つのアニメーションの合計ステップ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8143">**steps** Total steps for one animation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8144">**delay** 各アニメーション ステップの遅延時間</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8144">**delay** Delay time for each animation step</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8145">**animation_style** イージング関数の種類。次のものが含まれます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8145">**animation_style** Easing function type, includes:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8146">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8146">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8147">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8147">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8148">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8148">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8149">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8149">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8150">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8150">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8151">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8151">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8152">GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8152">GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8153">GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8153">GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8154">GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8154">GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8155">GX_ANIMATION_CUBIC_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8155">GX_ANIMATION_CUBIC_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8156">GX_ANIMATION_CUBIC_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8156">GX_ANIMATION_CUBIC_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8157">GX_ANIMATION_CUBIC_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8157">GX_ANIMATION_CUBIC_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8158">GX_ANIMATION_ELASTIC_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8158">GX_ANIMATION_ELASTIC_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8159">GX_ANIMATION_ELASTIC_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8159">GX_ANIMATION_ELASTIC_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8160">GX_ANIMATION_ELASTIC_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8160">GX_ANIMATION_ELASTIC_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8161">GX_ANIMATION_EXPO_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8161">GX_ANIMATION_EXPO_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8162">GX_ANIMATION_EXPO_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8162">GX_ANIMATION_EXPO_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8163">GX_ANIMATION_EXPO_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8163">GX_ANIMATION_EXPO_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8164">GX_ANIMATION_QUAD_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8164">GX_ANIMATION_QUAD_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8165">GX_ANIMATION_QUAD_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8165">GX_ANIMATION_QUAD_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8166">GX_ANIMATION_QUAD_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8166">GX_ANIMATION_QUAD_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8167">GX_ANIMATION_QUART_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8167">GX_ANIMATION_QUART_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8168">GX_ANIMATION_QUART_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8168">GX_ANIMATION_QUART_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8169">GX_ANIMATION_QUART_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8169">GX_ANIMATION_QUART_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8170">GX_ANIMATION_QUINT_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8170">GX_ANIMATION_QUINT_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8171">GX_ANIMATION_QUINT_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8171">GX_ANIMATION_QUINT_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8172">GX_ANIMATION_QUINT_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8172">GX_ANIMATION_QUINT_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8173">GX_ANIMATION_SINE_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8173">GX_ANIMATION_SINE_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8174">GX_ANIMATION_SINE_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8174">GX_ANIMATION_SINE_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8175">GX_ANIMATION_SINE_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8175">GX_ANIMATION_SINE_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8176">**animation_update_callback** 各アニメーション ステップの後に呼び出されるユーザー定義のコールバック関数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8176">**animation_update_callback** User-defined callback function that will be called after each animation step</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8177">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8177">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8178">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) 放射状スライダーのアニメーションが正常に設定されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8178">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial slider animation set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8179">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8179">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8180">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8180">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8181">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8181">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8182">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8182">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8183">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8183">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8184">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8184">Example</span></span>

```C
VOID animation_callback(GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider)
{
    /* This function will be called after each animation step,
    add custom code here. */
}

/* Set animation info for “my_radial_slider”. */
status = gx_radial_slider_animation_set(&my_radial_slider, 15, 2,
                                GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_IN_OUT,
                                animation_callback);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider needle will move with specified animation. */

/* Disable animation for “my_radial_slider”. */
status = gx_radial_slider_animation_set(&my_radial_slider, 0, 0,
                                        0, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider needle will move without animation. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_animation_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8195">gx_radial_slider_animation_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8195">gx_radial_slider_animation_start</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8196">新しい放射状スライダー値をアニメーションを使用して設定します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8196">Set new radial slider value with animation</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8197">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8197">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_animation_start(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_VALUE target_angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8198">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8198">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8199">このサービスでは、スライダーの針を現在の位置から指定した位置に動かすアニメーションを開始します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8199">This service starts an animation to move the slider needle from current position to the specified position.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8200">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8200">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8201">**slider** 放射状スライダー コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8201">**slider** Pointer to radial slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8202">**target_angle** 目標角度の値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8202">**target_angle** Target angle value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8203">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8203">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8204">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 放射状スライダーのアニメーションが正常に開始されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8204">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial slider animation start</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8205">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8205">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8206">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8206">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8207">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8207">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8208">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8208">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8209">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8209">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8210">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8210">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Start an animation to move radial slider needle from
current position to 90 degree position. */
status = gx_radial_slider_animation_start(&my_radial_slider, 90);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider needle animation has been started. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8221">gx_radial_slider_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8221">gx_radial_slider_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8222">放射状スライダーの作成</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8222">Create radial slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8223">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8223">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_create(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO *info,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT slider_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8224">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8224">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8225">このサービスにより、放射状スライダー ウィジェットが作成されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8225">This service creates a radial slider widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8226">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8226">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8227">**slider** 放射状スライダー コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8227">**slider** Pointer to radial slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8228">**name** 放射状スライダー ウィジェットの論理名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8228">**name** Logical name of radial slider widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8229">**parent** 親ウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8229">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8230">**info** 放射状スライダーの外観の定義。**付録 I** には GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO の定義が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8230">**info** Radial slider appearance definition, **Appendix I** contains definition to GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8231">**style** ラジオ ボタンのスタイル。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8231">**style** Style of radio button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8232">**付録 D** には、すべてのウィジェット用に事前に定義されている一般的なスタイルおよびウィジェット固有のスタイルが含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8232">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8233">**radio_button_id** 放射状スライダーのアプリケーション定義 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8233">**radio_button_id** Application-defined ID of radial slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8234">**size** 放射状スライダーの大きさ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8234">**size** Dimensions of radial slider</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8235">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8235">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8236">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 放射状スライダーが正常に作成されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8236">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial slider create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8237">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8237">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8238">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8238">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8239">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) ウィジェットは既に作成されています</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8239">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8240">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) ウィジェット コントロール ブロック サイズが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8240">**GX_INVALID_** SIZE (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8241">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) 親ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8241">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid parent widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8242">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8242">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8244">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8244">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO info;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Distance from left side of widget to rotating center. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_xcenter = 100;

/* Distance from top size of widget to rotating center. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_ycenter = 100;

/* Radius of rotating circle. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_radius = 100;

/* Widget of rotating track. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_track_width = 40;

/* Current angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_current_angle = 0;

/* Minimum angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_min_anlge = -60;

/* Maximum angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_max_angle = 240;

/* Anchor value list. */
info.gx_radial_slider_angle_list = GX_NULL;

/* Anchor value count. */
info.gx_radial_slider_list_count = 0;

/* Resource ID of background pixelmap. */
info.gx_radial_slider_background_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_BKGRD;

/* Resource ID of needle pixelmap. */
info.gx_radial_slider_needle_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Define widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 0, 0, 200, 200);

/* Create “my_radial_slider”. */
status = gx_radial_slider_create(&my_radial_slider,
                                “my_radial_slider”, &my_parent,
                                &info, GX_STYLE_ENABLED,
                                MY_RADIAL_SLIDER_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider “my_radial_slider” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8279">gx_radial_slider_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8279">gx_radial_slider_event_process</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8281">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8281">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_event_process(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8282">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8282">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8283">このサービスにより、放射状スライダー イベントが処理されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8283">This service processes a radial slider event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8284">このサービスは、カスタム放射状スライダーのイベント処理関数によって既定のイベント ハンドラーとして呼び出される必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8284">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom radial slider event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8285">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8285">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8286">**slider** 放射状スライダー コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8286">**slider** Pointer to radial slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8287">**event_ptr** 処理するイベントへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8287">**event_ptr** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8288">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8288">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8289">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 放射状スライダーのイベントが正常に処理されしました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8289">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial slider event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8290">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8290">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8291">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8291">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8292">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8292">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8293">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8293">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8294">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8294">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8295">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8295">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */

UINT my_event_process(GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
                    GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_radial_slider_event_process(slider, event_ptr);

        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_radial_slider_event_process(slider, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8316">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8316">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider information pointer of “my_radial_slider” has been retrieved. */

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_info_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8331">gx_radial_slider_info_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8331">gx_radial_slider_info_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8332">放射状スライダー情報の設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8332">Set radial slider info</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8333">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8333">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_info_set(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8334">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8334">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8335">このサービスは、放射状スライダーの情報を設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8335">This service sets radial slider information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8336">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8336">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8337">**slider** 放射状スライダー コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8337">**slider** Pointer to radial slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8338">**info** 設定する放射状スライダー情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8338">**info** Radial slider information to set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8339">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8339">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8340">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 放射状スライダー情報が正常に設定されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8340">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial slider info set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8341">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8341">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8342">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8342">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8343">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8343">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8344">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8344">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8345">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8345">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8346">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8346">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO info;

/* Distance from left side of widget to rotating center. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_xcenter = 100;

/* Distance from top size of widget to rotating center. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_ycenter = 100;

/* Radius of rotating circle. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_radius = 100;

/* Widget of rotating track. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_track_width = 40;

/* Current angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_current_angle = 0;

/* Minimum angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_min_anlge = -60;

/* Maximum angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_max_angle = 240;

/* Anchor value list. */
info.gx_radial_slider_angle_list = GX_NULL;

/* Anchor value count. */
info.gx_radial_slider_list_count = 0;

/* Resource ID of background pixelmap. */
info.gx_radial_slider_background_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_BKGRD;

/* Resource ID of needle pixelmap. */
info.gx_radial_slider_needle_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Reset radial slider info for “my_radial_slider”. */
status = gx_radial_slider_info_set(&my_radial_slider, &info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider info of “my_radial_slider” has been reset. */
```

## <a name="gx_rich_text_view_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8384">gx_rich_text_view_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8384">gx_rich_text_view_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8385">リッチ テキスト ビューを作成します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8385">Create a rich text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8386">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8386">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_rich_text_view_create(
    GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    GX_RICH_TEXT_FONTS *fonts,
    USHORT id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8387">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8387">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8388">このサービスは、指定に従ってリッチ テキスト ビューを作成します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8388">This service creates a rich text view as specified.</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8389">**書式設定タグは、特殊な種類のテキストを表示するために使用されます。**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8389">**Formatting tags are used to display special types for text:**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8390">**\<b>\</b>** ユーザー指定の太字フォント ID を使用してテキストを設定します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8390">**\<b>\</b>** Set text font with user specified bold font id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8391">**\<i>\</i>** ユーザー指定の斜体フォント ID を使用してテキストを設定します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8391">**\<i>\</i>** Set text font with user specified italic font id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8392">**\<u>\</u>** テキストの下線を有効にします</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8392">**\<u>\</u>** Enable text underline</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8393">**\<f GX_FONT_ID>\</f>** 指定されたフォント ID でテキスト フォントを設定します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8393">**\<f GX_FONT_ID>\</f>** Set text font with specified font id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8394">**\<c GX_COLOR_ID>\</c>** 指定された色 ID でテキスト フォントを設定します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8394">**\<c GX_COLOR_ID>\</c>** Set text font with specified color id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8395">**\<hc GX_COLOR_ID>\</hc>** 指定された色 ID でテキストの強調表示の色を設定します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8395">**\<hc GX_COLOR_ID>\</hc>** Set text highlight color specified color id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8396">**\<align left/right/center>\</align>** テキストトの配置を設定します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8396">**\<align left/right/center>\</align>** Set text alignment</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8397">**書式設定タグの使用例:**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8397">**Examples of formatting tag usage:**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8398">\<b>これは太字テキストストです<\b></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8398">\<b>This is bold text<\b></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8399">\<i>これは斜体テキストストです<\i></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8399">\<i>This is italic text<\i></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8400">\<u>これは下線が引かれたテキストです<\u></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8400">\<u>This is text with underline<\u></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8401">\<f 0>このテキスト フォント ID は、0 に設定されています<\f></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8401">\<f 0>This text font id is set to 0<\f></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8402">\<c 1>このテキストの色 ID は、1 に設定されています<\c></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8402">\<c 1>This text color id is set to 1<\c></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8403">\<hc 2>このテキスト強調表示の色 ID は、2 に設定されています<\hc></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8403">\<hc 2>This text highlight color id is set to 2<\hc></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8404">\<align left>このテキストは左揃えになっています<\align></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8404">\<align left> This text is left aligned<\align></span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8405">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8405">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8406">**text_view** リッチ テキスト ビュー コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8406">**text_view** Pointer to rich text view control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8407">**name** リッチ テキスト ビューの名前</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8407">**name** Name of the rich text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8408">**parent** 親ウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8408">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8409">**text_id** テキスト文字列のリソース ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8409">**text_id** Resource ID of the text string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8410">**fonts** リッチ テキスト ビューのフォント情報へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8410">**fonts** Pointer to the rich text view font information.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8411">**Apendix I** に GX_RICH_TEXT_FONTS 構造体についての定義が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8411">**Apendix I** contains definition to GX_RICH_TEXT_FONTS structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8412">**style** ウィジェットのスタイル。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8412">**style** Style of the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8413">**付録 D** には、ウィジェット固有のスタイルだけでなく、すべてのウィジェット用に事前に定義されている一般的なスタイルが含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8413">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8414">**id** リッチ テキスト ビューのアプリケーション定義 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8414">**id** Application-defined ID of the rich text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8415">**size** リッチ テキスト ビューのサイズ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8415">**size** Size of the rich text view</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8416">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8416">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8417">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) リッチ テキスト ビューが正常に作成されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8417">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful rich text view creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8418">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8418">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8419">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8419">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8420">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) ウィジェットが既に作成されています</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8420">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8421">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) ウィジェット コントロール ブロック サイズが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8421">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8422">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8422">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8423">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8423">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8424">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8424">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW rich_view;
GX_RCIH_TEXT_FONTS fonts;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Defined widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 100, 100, 300, 150);

/* Define font information. */
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_normal_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_bold_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_italic_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_bold_italic_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;

/* Create rich text view widget. */
status = gx_rich_text_view_create(&rich_view, “my_rich_view”,
                                  parent, GX_STRING_ID_TEST_STRING,
                                  &fonts,
                                  GX_STYLE_ENABLED,
                                  MY_RICH_VIEW_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the rich text view was successfully created. */

```

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8425">GUIX Studio のインストールの一部として提供されているデモ アプリケーション demo_guix_widget_types には、リッチ テキスト ビュー ウィジェットの使用の完全な例が用意されています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8425">The demo application demo_guix_widget_types, provided as part of the GUIX Studio installation, provides a complete example of using the rich text view widget.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_rich_text_view_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8430">gx_rich_text_view_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8430">gx_rich_text_view_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8431">リッチ テキスト ビューを描画します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8431">Draw rich text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8432">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8432">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_rich_text_view_draw(GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8433">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8433">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8434">このサービスは、指定されたリッチ テキスト ビュー ウィジェットを描画します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8434">This service draws the specified rich text view widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8435">このサービスは通常、キャンバスの更新操作の一部として GUIX によって内部的に呼び出されますが、カスタム描画関数を提供し、カスタム描画ベースとして既定のリッチ テキスト ビュー描画を呼び出す必要があるアプリケーションにも公開されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8435">This service is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default rich text view drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8436">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8436">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8437">**text_view** リッチ テキスト ビュー ウィジェット コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8437">**text_view** Pointer to rich text view widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8438">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8438">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8439">**なし**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8439">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8440">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8440">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8441">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8441">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8442">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8442">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom rich text view drawing function. */

VOID my_rich_text_view_draw(GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view)
{
    /* Call default rich text view draw. */
    gx_rich_text_view_draw(text_view);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```
