- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8992">gx_vertical_scrollbar_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8992">gx_vertical_scrollbar_create</span></span>

## <a name="gx_scrollbar_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8993">gx_scrollbar_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8993">gx_scrollbar_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8994">スクロール バーのイベントを処理します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8994">Process scrollbar event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8995">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8995">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scrollbar_event_process(
    GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8996">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8996">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8997">このサービスは、スクロール バー イベントを処理します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8997">This service processes a scrollbar event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8998">共通のイベント処理関数が、垂直と水平の両方のスクロール バー ウィジェットに使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8998">A common event handling function used for both vertical and horizontal scrollbar widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-8999">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-8999">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9000">**scrollbar** スクロール バーのウィジェット コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9000">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9001">**event** 処理するイベントへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9001">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9002">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9002">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9003">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) スクロール バーのイベントが正常に処理されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9003">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scrollbar event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9004">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9004">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9005">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9005">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9006">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9006">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9007">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9007">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9008">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9008">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9009">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9009">Example</span></span>

```C
Call generic scrollbar event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_scrollbar_event_process(GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
                                    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* pass all other events to the generic scrollbar
            event processing */
        gx_scrollbar_event_process(scrollbar, event);
        break;
    }
}
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9010">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9010">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9011">gx_ horizontal_scrollbar_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9011">gx_ horizontal_scrollbar_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9012">gx_scrollbar_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9012">gx_scrollbar_draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9013">gx_scrollbar_limit_check</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9013">gx_scrollbar_limit_check</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9014">gx_scrollbar_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9014">gx_scrollbar_reset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9015">gx_vertical_scrollbar_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9015">gx_vertical_scrollbar_create</span></span>

## <a name="gx_scrollbar_limit_check"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9016">gx_scrollbar_limit_check</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9016">gx_scrollbar_limit_check</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9017">スクロール バーの制限を確認します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9017">Check scrollbar limit</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9018">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9018">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scrollbar_limit_check(GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9019">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9019">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9020">このサービスは、スクロール バーの制限を確認し、事前定義された制限を超えてスクロールバーのサムホイールが移動しないようにします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9020">This service checks the limit of the scrollbar and prevents the scrollbar thumbwheel from traveling beyond the predefined limits.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9021">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9021">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9022">**scrollbar** スクロール バーのウィジェット コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9022">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9023">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9023">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9024">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) スクロール バーの制限が正常に確認されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9024">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scrollbar limit check</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9025">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9025">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9026">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9026">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9027">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9027">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9028">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9028">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9029">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9029">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9030">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9030">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Check scrollbar limit of “my_scrollbar”. */
status = gx_scrollbar_limit_check(&my_scrollbar);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the limit of scrollbar “my_scrollbar” has been checked. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9031">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9031">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9032">gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9032">gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9033">gx_scrollbar_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9033">gx_scrollbar_draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9034">gx_scrollbar_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9034">gx_scrollbar_event_process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9035">gx_scrollbar_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9035">gx_scrollbar_reset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9036">gx_vertical_scrollbar_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9036">gx_vertical_scrollbar_create</span></span>

## <a name="gx_scrollbar_reset"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9037">gx_scrollbar_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9037">gx_scrollbar_reset</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9038">スクロール バーをリセットします</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9038">Reset scrollbar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9039">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9039">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scrollbar_reset(
    GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
    GX_SCROLL_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9040">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9040">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9041">このサービスは、スクロール バーをリセットします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9041">This service resets the scrollbar.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9042">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9042">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9043">**scrollbar** スクロール バーのウィジェット コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9043">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9044">**info** スクロール バーの制限、現在の値、およびステップまたは増分を定義する GX_SCROLL_INFO 構造体へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9044">**info** Pointer to GX_SCROLL_INFO structure that defines the scrollbar limits, current value, and step or increment.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9045">**付録 I** には GX_LINE_CHART_INFO 構造体についての定義が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9045">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SCROLL_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9046">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9046">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9047">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) スクロール バーが正常にリセットされました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9047">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scrollbar reset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9048">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9048">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9049">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9049">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9050">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9050">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9051">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) スクロール情報が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9051">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Scroll info not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9052">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9052">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9053">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9053">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9054">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9054">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Reset scrollbar “my_scrollbar”. */

GX_SCROLL_INFO my_info;

my_info.gx_scroll_value = 0;
my_info.gx_scroll_minimum = 0;
my_info.gx_scroll_maximum = 100;
my_info.gx_scroll_visible = 10;
my_info.gx_scroll_increment = 1;

status = gx_scrollbar_reset(&my_scrollbar, &my_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the scrollbar “my_scrollbar” has been reset. */
```

## <a name="gx_scrollbar_value_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9061">gx_scrollbar_value_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9061">gx_scrollbar_value_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9062">スクロール バーの値を割り当てます</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9062">Assign scrollbar value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9063">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9063">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scrollbar_value_set(
    GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
    INT value);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9064">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9064">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9065">このサービスは、現在のスクロール バー値を割り当てます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9065">This service assigns the current scrollbar value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9066">GX_EVENT_VERTICAL_SCROLL または GX_EVENT_HORIZONTAL_SCROLL イベントが親ウィンドウに生成されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9066">A GX_EVENT_VERTICAL_SCROLL or GX_EVENT_HORIZONTAL_SCROLL event will be generated to the parent window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9067">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9067">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9068">**scrollbar** スクロール バーのウィジェット コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9068">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9069">**value** 新しいスクロール バー値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9069">**value** New scrollbar value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9070">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9070">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9071">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) スクロール バーのイベントが正常に処理されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9071">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scrollbar event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9072">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9072">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9073">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9073">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9074">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9074">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9075">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) スクロール値が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9075">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Scroll value is not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9076">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9076">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9077">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9077">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9078">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9078">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Assign new value for scrollbar “my_scrollbar”. */

status = gx_scrollbar_value_set(&my_scrollbar, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the current position of scrollbar “my_scrollbar” has been set. */

```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9079">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9079">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9082">gx_scrollbar_limit_check</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9082">gx_scrollbar_limit_check</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9083">gx_scrollbar_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9083">gx_scrollbar_reset</span></span>

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_backspace"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9085">gx_single_line_text_input_backspace</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9085">gx_single_line_text_input_backspace</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9086">テキスト入力ウィジェット内のバックスペース文字を処理します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9086">Process a backspace character in text input widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9087">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9087">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_backspace(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9088">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9088">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9089">このサービスは、テキスト入力のカーソル位置の前にある文字を削除します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9089">This service deletes the character before text input cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9090">このサービスは、Backspace キーを押すイベントを受信したときに内部的に呼び出されますが、アプリケーションから呼び出すこともできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9090">This service is called internally when a backspace key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9091">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9091">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9092">**text_input** 単一行テキスト入力ウィジェット コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9092">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9093">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9093">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9094">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 単一行テキスト入力が正常に作成されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9094">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful single-line text input create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9095">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9095">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9096">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9096">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9097">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x23) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9097">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x23) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9098">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9098">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9099">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9099">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9100">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9100">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Delete a character before the cursor of “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_backspace(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the character before the cursor has been deleted. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_clear"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9122">gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_clear</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9122">gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_clear</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9123">テキスト入力バッファーからすべての文字を削除します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9123">Deletes all characters from the text input buffer</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9124">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9124">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_clear(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9125">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9125">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9126">このサービスは、テキスト入力バッファーからすべての文字を削除します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9126">This service deletes all characters from the text input buffer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9127">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9127">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9128">**text_input** 単一行テキスト入力ウィジェット コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9128">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9129">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9129">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9130">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 単一行テキスト入力バッファーが正常にクリアされました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9130">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully cleared single-line text input buffer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9131">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9131">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9132">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9132">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9133">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9133">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9134">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9134">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9135">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9135">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9136">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9136">Example</span></span>

```C
/* clear input buffer of “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_clear(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text input widget has emptied its input buffer. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9158">gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9158">gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9159">テキスト入力ウィジェットのバッファー情報を取得します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9159">Retrieves buffer information of text input widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9160">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9160">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_get(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CHAR **buffer_address, 
    UINT *content_size, 
    UINT *buffer_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9161">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9161">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9162">このサービスは、テキスト入力ウィジェットのバッファー情報を取得します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9162">This service retrieves buffer information of the text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9163">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9163">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9164">**text_input** 単一行テキスト入力ウィジェット コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9164">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9165">**buffer_address** 入力バッファーのアドレス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9165">**buffer_address** The address of the input buffer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9166">**content_size** 入力データのバイト数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9166">**content_size** The byte count of the input data</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9167">**buffer_size** 入力バッファーのサイズ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9167">**buffer_size** The size of the input buffer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9168">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9168">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9169">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) バッファー情報が正常に取得されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9169">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved buffer information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9170">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9170">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9171">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9171">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9172">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9172">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9173">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9173">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9174">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9174">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9175">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9175">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CHAR *buffer_address;
UINT buffer_size;
UINT content_size;

/* Retrieve buffer information of “my_text_input” widget. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_get(&my_text_input,
                    &buffer_address, &string_size, &buffer_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the value of buffer_address, string_size and buffer_size has been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_character_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9196">gx_single_line_text_input_character_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9196">gx_single_line_text_input_character_delete</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9197">現在のカーソル位置にある文字を削除します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9197">Delete the character at the current cursor position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9198">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9198">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_character_delete(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9199">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9199">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9200">このサービスでは、テキスト入力のカーソル位置の後にある文字を削除します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9200">This service deletes the character after the text input cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9201">このサービスは、Delete キーを押すイベントを受信したときに内部的に呼び出されますが、アプリケーションから呼び出すこともできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9201">This service is called internally when a delete key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9202">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9202">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9203">**text_input** 単一行テキスト入力ウィジェット コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9203">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9204">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9204">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9205">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) カーソルの後の文字を正常に削除しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9205">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully delete a character after the cursor</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9206">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9206">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9207">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9207">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9208">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9208">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9209">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9209">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9210">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9210">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9211">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9211">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Delete the character after the cursor of “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_character_delete(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the character after the cursor has been deleted. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9234">gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9234">gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9235">現在のカーソル位置に文字列を挿入します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9235">Insert a character string at current cursor position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9236">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9236">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_UBYTE *insert_str,
    UINT insert_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9237">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9237">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9238">このサービスでは、テキスト入力文字列バッファーの現在のカーソル位置に文字列を挿入します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9238">This service inserts a character string into the text input string buffer at the current cursor position.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9239">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9239">Parameters</span></span>

```C
/* Insert characters at current cursor position. */

GX_CHAR insert_text[10] = “insert”;
status = gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert(&my_text_input,

                                            GX_STRLEN(insert_text));

```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9272">gx_single_line_text_input_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9272">gx_single_line_text_input_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9273">テキスト入力ウィジェットを作成します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9273">Create a text input widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9274">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9274">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_create(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_CHAR *input_buffer, UINT buffer_size,
    UINT style, USHORT text_input_id, GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9275">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9275">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9276">このサービスは、テキスト入力ウィジェットを作成します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9276">This service creates a text input widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9277">呼び出し元は、入力文字列の記憶域を提供し、文字列の最大長を示す必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9277">The caller must provide storage for the input string and indicate the maximum length of the string.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9278">GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT は GX_PROMPT から派生しているため、すべての gx_prompt サービスを GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT ウィジェットで使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9278">GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT is derived from GX_PROMPT and therefore all gx_prompt services may be used with GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9279">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9279">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9280">**text_input** 単一行テキスト入力ウィジェット コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9280">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9281">**namae** 省略可能なウィジェット論理名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9281">**name** Optional widget logical name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9282">**parent** 省略可能な親ウィジェット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9282">**parent** Optional parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9283">**input_buffer** 入力文字列の記憶域</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9283">**input_buffer** Storage for input string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9284">**buffer_size** 入力文字列の記憶域のサイズ (バイト単位)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9284">**buffer_size** Size of input string storage area, in bytes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9285">**style** テキスト入力のスタイル フラグ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9285">**style** Text input style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9286">**text_input_id** 入力ウィジェットの省略可能な ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9286">**text_input_id** Optional ID of the input widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9287">**size** ウィジェットの初期サイズを定義する四角形</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9287">**size** Rectangle defining initial widget size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9288">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9288">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9289">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 単一行テキスト入力が正常に作成されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9289">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful single-line text input create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9290">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9290">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9291">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9291">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9292">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) ウィジェットが既に作成されています</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9292">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9293">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) ウィジェット コントロール ブロック サイズが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9293">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9294">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9294">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9295">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9295">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9296">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9296">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9297">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9297">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT my_text_input;
static GX_CHAR           text_input_buffer[100];
GX_RECTANGLE             size;

/* Define widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 10, 10, 110, 40);

/* Create single-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_create(&my_text_input,
                        “text_input”, GX_NULL, text_input_buffer, 100,
                        GX_STYLE_ENABLED, 0, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text input widget has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9319">gx_single_line_text_input_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9319">gx_single_line_text_input_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9320">テキスト入力ウィジェットを描画します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9320">Draw a text input widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9321">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9321">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_single_line_text_input_draw(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9322">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9322">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9323">このサービスは、テキスト入力ウィジェットを描画します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9323">This service draws a text input widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9324">このサービスは通常、キャンバスの更新中に内部的に呼び出されますが、カスタムのテキスト入力描画関数から呼び出すこともできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9324">This service is normally called internally during canvas refresh, but can also be called from custom text input drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9325">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9325">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9326">**text_input** 単一行テキスト入力ウィジェット コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9326">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9327">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9327">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9328">**なし**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9328">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9329">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9329">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9330">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9330">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9331">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9331">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom single line text input draw function. */

VOID my_sl_text_input_draw(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input)
{
    /* Call default single line text input draw. */
    gx_single_line_text_input_draw(input);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9353">gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9353">gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9354">テキスト描画の開始位置を取得します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9354">Retrieve text draw start position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9355">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9355">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_VALUE *xpos, GX_VALUE *ypos);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9356">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9356">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9357">このサービスは、テキスト入力テキストの描画開始位置を取得します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9357">This service retrieves the draw start position of text input text.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9358">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9358">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9359">**text_input** 単一行テキスト入力ウィジェット コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9359">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9360">**xpos** 取得された x 座標の描画開始位置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9360">**xpos** Retrieved draw start position in x coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9361">**ypos** 取得された y 座標の描画開始位置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9361">**ypos** Retrieved draw start position in y coordinate</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9362">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9362">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9363">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) テキスト入力カーソルを末尾に正常に移動しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9363">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully move text input cursor to end</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9364">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9364">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9365">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9365">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9366">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9366">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9367">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9367">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9368">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9368">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom single line text input draw function. */

VOID my_sl_text_input_draw(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input)
{
GX_VALUE xpos;
GX_VALUE ypos;

    /* Draw background. */
    gx_widget_border_draw(input, border_color, upper_fill_color,
                          lower_fill_color, GX_TRUE);

    /* Retrieve text draw start position. */
    gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get(input, xpos,
                                                ypos);

    /* Add your text drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_end"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9389">gx_single_line_text_input_end</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9389">gx_single_line_text_input_end</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9390">テキスト入力カーソルを文字列の末尾に移動します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9390">Move the text input cursor to the string end</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9391">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9391">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_end(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9392">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9392">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9393">このサービスでは、入力文字列の末尾にテキスト入力ウィジェット カーソルを配置します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9393">This service positions the text input widget cursor at the end of the input string.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9394">このサービスは、End キーを押すイベントを受信したときに内部的に呼び出されますが、アプリケーションから呼び出すこともできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9394">This service is called internally when an end key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9395">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9395">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9396">**text_input** 単一行テキスト入力ウィジェット コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9396">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9397">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9397">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9398">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) テキスト入力カーソルを末尾に正常に移動しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9398">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully move text input cursor to end</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9399">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9399">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9400">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9400">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9401">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9401">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9402">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9402">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9403">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9403">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9404">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9404">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move input cursor to end. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_end(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, text text input cursor has been moved to end. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9426">gx_single_line_text_input_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9426">gx_single_line_text_input_event_process</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9428">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9428">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9429">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9429">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9430">このサービスは、単一行テキスト入力イベントを処理します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9430">This service processes a single line text input event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9431">この関数は gx_single_line_text_input_create 関数によって内部的に参照されますが、アプリケーションでカスタムの単一行テキスト入力イベント処理関数を定義する場合には、アプリケーションで使用するために公開されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9431">This function is internally referenced by the gx_single_line_text_input_create function, but is exposed for use by the application in those cases where the application defines a custom single line text input event processing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9432">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9432">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9433">**text_input** 単一行テキスト入力ウィジェット コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9433">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9434">**event_ptr** GX_EVENT 構造体へのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9434">**event_ptr** Pointer to GX_EVENT structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9435">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9435">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9436">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) テキスト入力イベントが正常に処理されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9436">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully processed text input event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9437">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9437">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9438">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9438">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9439">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9439">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9440">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9440">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9441">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9441">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9442">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9442">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic single line text input event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_sl_text_input_event_process(
                                GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input,
                                GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default single line
            text input event processing */
        status =
        gx_single_line_text_input_event_process(input, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9464">gx_single_line_text_input_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9464">gx_single_line_text_input_fill_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9465">単一行テキスト入力の背景色を設定します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9465">Set single line text input background color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9466">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9466">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_fill_color_set(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID readonly_fill_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9467">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9467">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9468">このサービスは、単一行テキスト入力の塗りつぶしの色を設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9468">This service sets the fill color of the single line text input.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9469">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9469">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9470">**text_input** 単一行テキスト入力コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9470">**text_input** Pointer to single line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9471">**normal_fill_color_id** 通常状態のウィジェット塗りつぶしの色のリソース ID。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9471">**normal_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the widget fill color in normal state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9472">**付録 A** には、事前定義された色のリソース ID が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9472">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9473">なお、アプリケーションでカスタムの色のリソース ID を追加することもできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9473">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9474">**selected_fill_color_id** ウィジェットがフォーカスされたときのウィジェット塗りつぶしの色のリソース ID。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9474">**selected_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the widget fill color when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9475">**付録 A** には、事前定義された色のリソース ID が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9475">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9476">なお、アプリケーションでカスタムの色のリソース ID を追加することもできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9476">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9477">**disabled_fill_color_id** スタイル GX_STYLE_ENABLED が設定されていない場合のウィジェット塗りつぶしの色のリソース ID。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9477">**disabled_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the widget fill color when the style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9478">**付録 A** には、事前定義された色のリソース ID が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9478">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9479">なお、アプリケーションでカスタムの色のリソース ID を追加することもできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9479">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9480">**readonly_fill_color_id** スタイル GX_STYLE_ENABLED と GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READYONLY の両方が設定されている場合のウィジェット塗りつぶしの色のリソース ID。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9480">**readonly_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the widget fill color when both style GX_STYLE_ENABLED and GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READYONLY are set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9481">**付録 A** には、事前定義された色のリソース ID が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9481">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9482">なお、アプリケーションでカスタムの色のリソース ID を追加することもできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9482">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9483">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9483">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9484">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 単一行テキスト入力の塗りつぶしの色が正常に設定されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9484">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful single line text input fill color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9485">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9485">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9486">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9486">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9487">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9487">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9488">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9488">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9489">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9489">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9490">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9490">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set fill colors for single line text input “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_fill_color_set(&my_text_input,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_READONLY_FILL);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the fill color of “my_text_input” was
set. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_home"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9512">gx_single_line_text_input_home</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9512">gx_single_line_text_input_home</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9513">テキスト入力カーソルをホーム位置に移動します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9513">Move the text input cursor to the home position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9514">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9514">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_home(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9515">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9515">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9516">このサービスにより、テキスト入力カーソルの位置が入力文字列の先頭に移動されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9516">This service moves the text input cursor position to the start of the input string.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9517">このサービスは、Home キーを押すイベントを受信したときに内部的に呼び出されますが、アプリケーションから呼び出すこともできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9517">This service is called internally when a home key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9518">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9518">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9519">**text_input** 単一行テキスト入力ウィジェット コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9519">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9520">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9520">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9521">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) カーソルがホーム位置に正常に移動されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9521">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved cursor to the home position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9522">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9522">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9523">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9523">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9524">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9524">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9525">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9525">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* Move cursor to the start of the input text. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the cursor has been moved to the home position */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_left_arrow"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9549">gx_single_line_text_input_left_arrow</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9549">gx_single_line_text_input_left_arrow</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9550">入力のカーソルを 1 文字分左に移動します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9550">Move input cursor one character to the left</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9551">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9551">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_left_arrow(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9552">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9552">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9553">このサービスは、テキスト入力のカーソルを 1 文字分左に移動します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9553">This service moves the text input cursor one character to the left.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9554">このサービスは、左矢印キーを押すイベントを受信したときに内部的に呼び出されますが、アプリケーションから呼び出すこともできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9554">This service is called internally when a left key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9555">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9555">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9556">**text_input** 単一行テキスト入力ウィジェット コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9556">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9557">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9557">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9558">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) カーソルが左へ正常に移動されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9558">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved cursor to the left</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9559">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9559">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9560">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9560">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9561">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9561">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9562">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9562">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9563">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9563">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9564">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9564">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move the cursor one character to the left. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_left_arrow(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text input cursor has been moved one character to the left. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_position_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9586">gx_single_line_text_input_position_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9586">gx_single_line_text_input_position_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9587">カーソルをピクセル位置に移動します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9587">Move cursor to pixel position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9588">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9588">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_position_get(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    INT pixel_position);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9589">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9589">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9590">このサービスでは、要求されたピクセル位置に基づいてテキスト入力カーソルを配置します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9590">This service positions the text input cursor based on the requested pixel position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9591">テキスト入力カーソルのインデックスは、ピクセル位置の x 値に基づいて計算されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9591">The text input cursor index will be calculated based on the x value of the pixel position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9592">このサービスは、ペン ダウン イベントを受信したときに内部的に呼び出されますが、アプリケーションから呼び出すこともできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9592">This service is called internally when a pen down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9593">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9593">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9594">**text_input** 単一行テキスト入力ウィジェット コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9594">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9595">**pixel_position** ピクセル位置の X 値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9595">**pixel_position** X value of pixel position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9596">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9596">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9597">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 要求された位置にカーソルが正常に設定されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9597">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the cursor to requested position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9598">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9598">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9599">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9599">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9600">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9600">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9601">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9601">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9602">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9602">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9603">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9603">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set cursor to requested position. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_position_get(&my_text_input,
                                                100);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text input widget cursor has been positioned */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_right_arrow"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9625">gx_single_line_text_input_right_arrow</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9625">gx_single_line_text_input_right_arrow</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9626">入力のカーソルを 1 文字分右に移動します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9626">Move input cursor one character to the right</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9627">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9627">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_right_arrow(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9628">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9628">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9629">このサービスは、テキスト入力のカーソルを 1 文字分右に移動します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9629">This service moves the text input cursor one character to the right.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9630">このサービスは、右矢印キーを押すイベントを受信したときに内部的に呼び出されますが、アプリケーションから呼び出すこともできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9630">This service is called internally when a right key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9631">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9631">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9632">**text_input** 単一行テキスト入力ウィジェット コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9632">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9633">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9633">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9634">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) カーソルが右に正常に移動されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9634">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved cursor to the right</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9635">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9635">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9636">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9636">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9637">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9637">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9638">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9638">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9639">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9639">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9640">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9640">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move cursor one character to the right. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_right_arrow(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text input cursor has been moved one character to the right. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_style_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9661">gx_single_line_text_input_style_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9661">gx_single_line_text_input_style_add</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9662">スタイルを追加します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9662">Add styles</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9663">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9663">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_style_add(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input, 
    ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9664">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9664">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9665">このサービスは、指定したスタイルを単一行テキスト入力ウィジェットに追加します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9665">This service adds the specified style(s) to the single line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9666">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9666">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9667">**text_input** 単一行テキスト入力ウィジェット コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9667">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9668">**style** 追加する新しいスタイル。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9668">**style** New style to add.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9669">**付録 D** には、すべてのウィジェットの事前定義された一般的なスタイルが含まれています</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9669">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9670">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9670">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9671">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ウィジェットにスタイルが正常に追加されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9671">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully added style to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9672">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9672">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9673">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9673">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9674">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9674">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9675">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9675">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9676">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9676">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9677">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9677">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Add a new style to “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_style_add(&my_text_input,
GX_STYLE_CURSOR_AWAYS);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the GX_STYLE_CUSROSR_SHOR have been successfully added. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9702">このサービスは、指定したスタイルが単一行テキスト入力ウィジェットから削除します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9702">This service removes the specified style(s) from the single line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9703">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9703">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9705">**style** 削除するスタイル。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9705">**style** Style(s) to remove.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9706">**付録 D** には、すべてのウィジェットの事前定義された一般的なスタイルが含まれています</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9706">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9707">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9707">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9708">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ウィジェットからスタイルが正常に削除されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9708">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully removed style(s) from widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9709">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9709">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9710">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9710">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9711">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9711">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9712">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9712">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9714">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9714">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Remove cursor blink style from “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_style_remove(&my_text_input,
GX_STYLE_CURSOR_BLINK);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the GX_STYLE_CURSOR_BLINK style has been successfully removed. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_style_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9734">gx_single_line_text_input_style_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9734">gx_single_line_text_input_style_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9735">テキスト入力のスタイルを設定します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9735">Set text input styles</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9736">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9736">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_style_set(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input, 
    ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9737">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9737">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9738">このサービスは、指定したスタイルを単一行テキスト入力ウィジェットに設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9738">This service sets the specified style(s) to the single line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9739">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9739">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9740">**text_input** 単一行テキスト入力ウィジェット コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9740">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9741">**style** 割り当てるスタイル フラグ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9741">**style** style flags to assign</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9742">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9742">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9743">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) テキスト入力スタイルが正常に設定されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9743">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the text input style</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9744">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9744">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9745">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9745">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9746">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9746">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9747">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9747">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9748">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9748">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9749">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9749">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set style for “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_style_set(&my_text_input,
                    GX_STYLE_ENABLED | GX_STYLE_CURSOR_BLINK);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text input style has been successfully set to the specified styles. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9762">gx_single_line_text_input_position_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9762">gx_single_line_text_input_position_get</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9765">gx_single_line_text_input_style_remove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9765">gx_single_line_text_input_style_remove</span></span>
