- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9768">gx_single_line_text_input_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9768">gx_single_line_text_input_text_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9769">gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9769">gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9770">単一行テキスト入力のテキストの色を設定します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9770">Set single line text input text color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9771">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9771">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID readonly_text_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9772">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9772">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9773">このサービスは、単一行テキスト入力のテキストの色を設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9773">This service sets the text color of the single line text input.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9774">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9774">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9775">**text_input** 単一行テキスト入力コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9775">**text_input** Pointer to single line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9776">**normal_text_color_id** 通常状態のテキストの色のリソース ID。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9776">**normal_text_color_id** Resource ID of the text color in normal state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9777">**付録 A** には、事前定義された色のリソース ID が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9777">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9778">なお、アプリケーションでカスタムの色のリソース ID を追加することもできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9778">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9779">**selected_text_color_id** ウィジェットがフォーカスされたときのテキストの色のリソース ID。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9779">**selected_text_color_id** Resource ID of the text color when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9780">**付録 A** には、事前定義された色のリソース ID が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9780">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9781">なお、アプリケーションでカスタムの色のリソース ID を追加することもできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9781">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9782">**disabled_text_color_id** スタイル GX_STYLE_ENABLED が設定されていない場合のテキストの色のリソース ID。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9782">**disabled_text_color_id** Resource ID of the text color when the style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9783">**付録 A** には、事前定義された色のリソース ID が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9783">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9784">なお、アプリケーションでカスタムの色のリソース ID を追加することもできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9784">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9785">**readonly_text_color_id** スタイル GX_STYLE_ENABLED と GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READONLY の両方が設定されている場合のテキストの色のリソース ID。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9785">**readonly_text_color_id** Resource ID of the text color when both style GX_STYLE_ENABLED and GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READONLY are set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9786">**付録 A** には、事前定義された色のリソース ID が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9786">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9787">なお、アプリケーションでカスタムの色のリソース ID を追加することもできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9787">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9788">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9788">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9789">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 単一行テキスト入力のテキストの色が正常に設定されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9789">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful single line text input text color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9790">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9790">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9791">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9791">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9792">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9792">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9793">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9793">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9794">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9794">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9795">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9795">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set text colors for single line text input “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set(&my_text_input,
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT,
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_READONLY_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text color “my_text_input” was set. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_text_select"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9817">gx_single_line_text_input_text_select</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9817">gx_single_line_text_input_text_select</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9818">テキストを選択します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9818">Select text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9819">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9819">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    UINT start_index, UINT end_index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9820">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9820">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9821">このサービスでは、指定された開始マークと終了マークのインデックスを使用してテキストを選択し、選択された塗りつぶしとテキストの色を使用して、選択されたテキストを強調表示します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9821">This service selects text with specified start mark and end mark index and highlights the selected text with the selected fill and text colors.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9822">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9822">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9823">**text_input** 単一行テキスト入力コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9823">**text_input** Pointer to single line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9824">**start_index** 最初に選択された文字のインデックス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9824">**start_index** Index of the first selected character</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9825">**end_index** 最後に選択された文字のインデックス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9825">**end_index** Index of the last selected character</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9826">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9826">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9827">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 単一行テキスト入力のテキストが正常に選択されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9827">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful single line text input text selection</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9828">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9828">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9829">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9829">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9830">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9830">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9831">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) インデックスの値が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9831">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Index value not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9832">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9832">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9833">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9833">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9834">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9834">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Select text between index [0, 9]. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_text_select(&my_text_input,
                                                0,9);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text between index [0, 9] “my_text_input” was selected. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9855">gx_single_line_text_input_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9855">gx_single_line_text_input_text_set</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9857">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9857">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_text_set(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9858">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9858">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9860">このサービスは、単一行テキスト入力のテキストを設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9860">This service sets the text of the single line text input.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9861">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9861">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9863">**text** null 値で終わるテキスト文字列</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9863">**text** NULL-terminated text string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9864">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9864">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9865">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 単一行テキスト入力のテキストの色が正常に設定されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9865">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful single line text input text color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9866">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9866">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9867">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9867">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9868">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9868">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9869">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) 文字列の長さが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9869">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9870">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9870">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9872">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9872">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CONST GX_CHAR new_text = “Set Single Line Text Input Text”;

/* Set text for single line text input “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_text_set(&my_text_input,
                                        new_text);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text of “my_text_input” was set. */
```

```C
GX_STRING new_string;
new_string.gx_string_ptr = “Set Single Line Text Input Text”;
new_string.gx_string_length = strlen(new_string.gx_string_ptr);

/* Set text for single line text input “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_text_set_ext(&my_text_input,
                                        &new_string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the string has been assigned to my_text_input. */
```

## <a name="gx_slider_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9912">gx_slider_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9912">gx_slider_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9913">スライダーを作成します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9913">Create slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9914">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9914">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_create(
    GX_SLIDER *slider, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, INT tick_count,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *slider_info,
    ULONG style, USHORT slider_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9915">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9915">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9916">このサービスにより、スライダー ウィジェットが作成されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9916">This service creates a slider widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9917">GX_SLIDER は GX_WIDGET から派生しているため、すべての gx_widget API サービスを GX_SLIDER 型のウィジェットで使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9917">GX_SLIDER is derived from GX_WIDGET, and therefore all gx_widget API services may be used with GX_SLIDER type widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9918">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9918">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9919">**slider**: スライダー ウィジェット コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9919">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9920">**name**: スライダーの名前</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9920">**name**: Name of slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9921">**parent**: 親ウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9921">**parent**: Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9922">**tick_count**: スライダーの目盛りの数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9922">**tick_count**: Number of slider ticks</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9923">**slider_info**: スライダーの値の制限、スライダーの針のサイズと位置、およびその他のスライダー パラメーターを渡すために使用される構造体であるスライダー情報へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9923">**slider_info**: Pointer to slider info which is a structure used to pass the slider value limits, slider needle size and position, and other slider parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9924">**付録 I** に GX_SLIDER_INFO 構造体についての定義が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9924">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9925">**style**: スライダーのスタイル。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9925">**style**: Style of slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9926">**付録 D** には、すべてのウィジェット用に事前定義されている一般的なスタイルと、ウィジェット固有のスタイルが含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9926">**Appendix D** contains predefined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9927">**slider_id**: スライダーのアプリケーション定義 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9927">**slider_id**: Application-defined ID of slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9928">**size**: スライダーの大きさ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9928">**size**: Dimensions of slider</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9929">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9929">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9930">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) スライダーが正常に作成されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9930">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9931">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9931">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9932">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9932">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9933">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) ウィジェットが既に作成されています</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9933">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9934">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) ウィジェット コントロール ブロック サイズが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9934">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9935">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) 親ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9935">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9936">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9936">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9937">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9937">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9938">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9938">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create slider “my_slider”. */

GX_SLIDER my_slider;
GX_SLIDER_INFO info;

info.gx_slider_info_min_val = 0;
info.gx_slider_info_max_val = 100;
info.gx_slider_info_current_val = 50;
info.gx_slider_info_increment = 1;
info.gx_slider_info_min_travel = 20;
info.gx_slider_info_max_travel = 20;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_width = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_height = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_inset = 5;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_hotspot_offset = 5;

status = gx_slider_create(&my_slider, “my_slider”,
    &my_parent, 10, info, GX_STYLE_ENABLED, ID_MY_SLIDER, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the slider “my_slider” has been created. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9947">gx_slider_needle_position_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9947">gx_slider_needle_position_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9948">gx_slider_needle_position_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9948">gx_slider_needle_position_get</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9952">gx_slider_value_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9952">gx_slider_value_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_slider_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9953">gx_slider_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9953">gx_slider_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9954">スライダーを描画します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9954">Draw slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9955">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9955">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_slider_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9956">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9956">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9957">このサービスにより、スライダーが描画されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9957">This service draws a slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9958">このサービスは gx_slider_create 関数によって内部的に使用されますが、カスタムのスライダー描画関数が定義されている場合に、それらのインスタンスのアプリケーションで使用するために公開もされています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9958">This service is used internally by the gx_slider_create function, but is also exposed for use by the application in those instances when a custom slider drawing function is defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9959">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9959">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9960">**slider**: スライダー ウィジェット コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9960">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9961">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9961">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9962">**なし**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9962">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9963">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9963">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9964">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9964">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9965">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9965">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom slider draw function. */
VOID my_slider_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider)
{
    /* Call default slider draw. */
    gx_slider_draw(slider);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_slider_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9980">gx_slider_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9980">gx_slider_event_process</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9981">スライダーのイベントを処理します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9981">Process slider event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9982">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9982">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_event_process(
    GX_SLIDER *slider, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9983">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9983">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9984">このサービスでは、スライダー イベントが処理されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9984">This service processes a slider event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9985">この関数は gx_slider_creat 関数によって内部的に参照されますが、アプリケーションでカスタムのスライダー イベント処理関数を定義する場合は、アプリケーションで使用するために公開されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9985">This function is internally referenced by the gx_slider_create function, but is exposed for use by the application in those cases where the application defines a custom slider event processing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9986">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9986">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9987">**slider**: スライダー ウィジェット コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9987">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9988">**event**: 処理するイベントへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9988">**event**: Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9989">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9989">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9990">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) スライダーのイベントが正常に処理されしました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9990">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9991">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9991">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9992">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9992">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9993">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9993">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9994">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9994">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9995">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9995">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-9996">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-9996">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic slider event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_slider_event_process(GX_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
        case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;
        default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default slider event processing */
            status = gx_slider_event_process(slider, event);
            break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_slider_info_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10011">gx_slider_info_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10011">gx_slider_info_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10012">スライダー情報ブロックを設定します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10012">Set slider information block</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10013">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10013">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_info_set(
    GX_SLIDER *slider, 
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10014">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10014">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10015">このサービスは、スライダーの最小値、スライダーの最大値、スライダーの現在の値などの指定されたスライダー情報を、指示されたスライダーに割り当てます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10015">This service assigns the specified slider information such as slider minimum, slider maximum, and slider current value to the indicated slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10016">スライダーは、新しいスライダー情報に基づいて針の位置を更新し、再描画します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10016">The slider will update the needle position and redraw based on the new slider information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10017">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10017">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10018">**slider**: スライダー ウィジェット コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10018">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10019">**info**: スライダー情報構造体へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10019">**info**: Pointer to the slider information structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10020">**付録 I** に GX_SLIDER_INFO 構造体についての定義が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10020">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10021">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10021">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10022">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) スライダー情報が正常に設定されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10022">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set slider information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10023">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10023">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10024">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10024">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10025">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10025">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10026">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10026">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10027">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10027">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10028">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10028">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SLIDER_INFO my_slider_info;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_min_val = 0;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_max_val = 100;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_current_val = 50;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_increment = 1;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_min_travel = 20;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_max_travel = 20;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_needle_width = 10;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_needle_height = 10;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_needle_inset = 5;

my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_needle_hotspot_offset = 5;

/* Set slider information for slider “my_slider”. */
status = gx_slider_info_set (&my_slider, &my_slider_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “my_slider” is configured with my_slider_info. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10040">gx_slider_travel_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10040">gx_slider_travel_get</span></span>

## <a name="gx_slider_needle_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10043">gx_slider_needle_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10043">gx_slider_needle_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10044">スライダーの針を描画します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10044">Draw slider needle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10045">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10045">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_slider_needle_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10046">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10046">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10047">このサービスは、スライダーの針を描画します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10047">This service draws a slider needle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10048">このサービスは、gx_slider_draw 関数によって自動的に呼び出されますが、カスタマイズされたスライダー描画関数の一部としてアプリケーションによって呼び出されることもあります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10048">This service is automatically called by the gx_slider_draw function, but may also be invoked by the application as part of a customized slider drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10049">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10049">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10050">**slider**: スライダー ウィジェット コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10050">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10051">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10051">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10052">**なし**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10052">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10053">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10053">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10054">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10054">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10055">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10055">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom slider draw function. */
VOID my_slider_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider)
{
    /* Add your own background draw here. */

    /* Call default tickmarks draw. */
    gx_slider_tickmarks_draw(slider);

    /* Call default slider needle draw. */
    gx_slider_needle_draw(slider);
}
```

## <a name="gx_slider_needle_position_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10070">gx_slider_needle_position_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10070">gx_slider_needle_position_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10071">スライダーの針の位置を取得します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10071">Get slider needle position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10072">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10072">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_needle_position_get(
    GX_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *slider_info,
    GX_RECTANGLE *return_position);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10073">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10073">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10074">このサービスにより、現在のスライダー値に基づいてスライダーの針の位置が計算されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10074">This service computes the slider needle position based on the current slider value.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10075">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10075">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10076">**slider**: スライダー ウィジェット コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10076">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10077">**slider_info**: スライダーの制限、針のサイズとオフセット、およびその他のスライダー パラメーターを定義するスライダー情報構造体へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10077">**slider_info**: Pointer to slider information structure defining the slider limits, needle size and offset, and other slider parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10078">**付録 I** に GX_SLIDER_INFO 構造体についての定義が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10078">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10079">**return_position**: 針の位置の設定先へのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10079">**return_position**: Pointer to destination for needle position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10080">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10080">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10081">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) スライダーの針の位置が正常に取得されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10081">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider needle position get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10082">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10082">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10083">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10083">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10084">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10084">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10085">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) スライダー情報が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10085">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Slider info not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10086">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10086">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10087">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10087">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10088">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10088">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RECTANGLE needle_position;

/* Get the needle position for slider “my_slider”. */
status = gx_slider_needle_posistion_get(&my_slider, &slider_info,
    &needle_position);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the needle position for slider “my_slider” has been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_slider_tickmarks_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10103">gx_slider_tickmarks_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10103">gx_slider_tickmarks_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10104">スライダーの目盛りを描画します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10104">Draw slider tickmarks</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10105">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10105">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_slider_tickmarks_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10106">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10106">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10107">このサービスでは、スライダーの目盛りが描画されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10107">This service draws the slider tickmarks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10108">この関数は gx_slider_draw 関数によって内部的に呼び出されますが、カスタム スライダー描画関数を実装する可能性のあるアプリケーションで使用するために公開されています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10108">This function is called internally by the gx_slider_draw function, but is exposed for use by applications that might implement a custom slider drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10109">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10109">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10110">**slider**: スライダー ウィジェット コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10110">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10111">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10111">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10112">**なし**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10112">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10113">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10113">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10114">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10114">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10115">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10115">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom slider draw function. */
VOID my_slider_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider)
{
    /* Add your own background draw here. */

    /* Call default tickmarks draw. */
    gx_slider_tickmarks_draw(slider);

    /* Call default slider needle draw. */
    gx_slider_needle_draw(slider);
}
```

## <a name="gx_slider_travel_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10130">gx_slider_travel_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10130">gx_slider_travel_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10131">スライダーの移動を取得します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10131">Get slider travel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10132">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10132">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_travel_get(
    GX_SLIDER *widget,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info,
    INT *return_min_travel, 
    INT *return_max_travel);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10133">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10133">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10134">このサービスにより、スライダーの移動が取得されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10134">This service gets the slider travel.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10135">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10135">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10136">**slider**: スライダー ウィジェット コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10136">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10137">**info**: スライダー情報の構造体へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10137">**info**: Pointer to slider info structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10138">**付録 I** には GX_SLIDER_INFO 構造体の定義が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10138">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10139">**return_min_travel**: 最小移動値の宛先へのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10139">**return_min_travel**: Pointer to destination for minimum travel value</span></span></td>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10140">**return_max_travell**: 最大移動値の宛先へのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10140">**return_max_travell**: Pointer to destination for maximum travel value</span></span></td>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10141">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10141">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10142">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) スライダーの移動の取得に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10142">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider travel get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10143">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10143">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10144">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10144">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10145">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10145">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10146">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) スライダー情報が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10146">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Slider info not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10147">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10147">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10148">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10148">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10149">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10149">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get travel information for for slider “my_slider”. */
status = gx_slider_travel_get(&my_slider, &info,
    &my_min_travel, &my_max_travel);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the travel max/min values for slider “my_slider” have been retrieved. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10163">gx_slider_value_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10163">gx_slider_value_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_slider_value_calculate"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10164">gx_slider_value_calculate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10164">gx_slider_value_calculate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10165">スライダーの値を計算します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10165">Calculate slider value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10166">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10166">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_value_calculate(
    GX_SLIDER *slider, 
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info,
    INT new_position);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10167">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10167">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10168">このサービスでは、スライダーの針の位置に基づいてスライダーの値が計算されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10168">This service calculates the slider value based on the slider needle position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10169">この関数は、ユーザーがスライダーの針を動かしたときに GUIX によって内部的に呼び出されますが、カスタム スライダー ウィジェットを実装するときにアプリケーションから呼び出すこともできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10169">This function is called internally by GUIX when the user moves the slider needle, but can also be invoked by the application when implementing a custom slider widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10170">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10170">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10171">**slider**: スライダー ウィジェット コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10171">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10172">**info**: スライダー情報へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10172">**info**: Pointer to slider info.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10173">**付録 I** には GX_SLIDER_INFO 構造体の定義が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10173">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_LISDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10174">**new_position**: スライダーの新しい位置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10174">**new_position**: New slider position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10175">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10175">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10176">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) スライダーの値の計算に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10176">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider value calculate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10177">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10177">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10178">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10178">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10179">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10179">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10180">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) スライダー情報が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10180">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Slider info not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10181">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10181">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10183">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10183">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Calculate new value for slider “my_slider”. */
status = gx_slider_value_calculate(&my_slider,
    &my_slider.gx_slider_info, new_slider_position);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the slider value of “my_slider” has been calculated. */

```

## <a name="gx_slider_value_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10198">gx_slider_value_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10198">gx_slider_value_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10199">スライダーの値を設定します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10199">Set slider value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10200">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10200">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_value_set(
    GX_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info, 
    INT new_value);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10201">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10201">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10202">このサービスでは、スライダーの値が設定されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10202">This service sets the slider value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10203">この API をアプリケーションから呼び出すと、プログラムによる制御の下でスライダーの針を移動できます。これにより、ユーザー入力でスライダーの針をドラッグする必要がなくなります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10203">This API can be called by the application to move a slider needle under program control, bypassing the need for user input to drag the slider needle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10204">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10204">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10205">**slider**: スライダー ウィジェット コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10205">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10206">**info**: スライダー情報の構造体へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10206">**info**: Pointer to slider info structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10207">**付録 I** には GX_SLIDER_INFO 構造体の定義が含まれています</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10207">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10208">**new_value**: スライダーの新しい値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10208">**new_value**: New slider value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10209">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10209">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10210">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) スライダーの値の設定に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10210">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider value set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10211">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10211">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10212">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10212">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10213">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10213">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10214">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10214">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10215">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10215">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10216">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10216">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set new value for slider “my_slider”. */
status = gx_slider_value_set(&my_slider,
    &my_slider.gx_slider_info, new_value);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the new value has been set for slider “my_slider”. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10225">gx_slider_needle_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10225">gx_slider_needle_draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10226">gx_slider_needle_position_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10226">gx_slider_needle_position_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10227">gx_slider_needle_position_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10227">gx_slider_needle_position_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10228">gx_slider_tickmarks_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10228">gx_slider_tickmarks_draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10229">gx_slider_travel_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10229">gx_slider_travel_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10230">gx_slider_value_calculate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10230">gx_slider_value_calculate</span></span>

##  <a name="gx_sprite_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10231">gx_sprite_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10231">gx_sprite_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10232">スプライト ウィジェットを作成します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10232">Create a sprite widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10233">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10233">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_sprite_create(
    GX_SPRITE *sprite, GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_SPRITE_FRAME *frame_list,
    USHORT frame_count,
    ULONG style, USHORT sprite_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10234">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10234">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10235">このサービスでは、GX_SPRITE ウィジェットが作成されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10235">This service creates a GX_SPRITE widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10236">スプライトは、アニメーションのようにピクセルマップのシーケンスを表示するために使用されます。また、マルチ状態のピクセルマップ表示ウィジェットとしても使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10236">A sprite is used to display a sequence of pixelmaps as in an animation, or can be used as a multi-state pixelmap display widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10237">GX_SPRITE は GX_WIDGET から派生しており、すべての gx_widget API サービスがサポートされます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10237">GX_SPRITE is derived from GX_WIDGET and supports all gx_widget API services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10238">GX_SPRITE ウィジェットでは、スプライト アニメーションを定義するために GX_SPRITE_FRAME 構造体の配列が必要です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10238">The GX_SPRITE widget requires an array of GX_SPRITE_FRAME structures to define the sprite animation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10239">**付録 I** には GX_PRITE_FRAME 構造体の定義が含まれています</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10239">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_PRITE_FRAME structure.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10240">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10240">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10241">**sprite**: スプライト ウィジェット コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10241">**sprite**: Sprite widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10242">**name**: 省略可能なスプライト名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10242">**name**: Optional sprite name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10243">**parent**: 親ウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10243">**parent**: Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10244">**frame_list**: GX_SPRITE_FRAME 構造体の配列</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10244">**frame_list**: An array of GX_SPRITE_FRAME structures</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10245">**frame_count**: フレーム リスト配列内のエントリの数を指定します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10245">**frame_count**: specifies the number of entries in the frame list array</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10246">**style** スプライトのスタイル。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10246">**style**: Style of sprite.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10247">**付録 D** には、すべてのウィジェット用に事前に定義されている一般的なスタイルおよびウィジェット固有のスタイルが含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10247">**Appendix D** contains predefined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10248">**sprite_id**: スプライトのアプリケーション定義 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10248">**sprite_id**: Application-defined ID of sprite</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10249">**size**: スプライトの大きさ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10249">**size**: Dimensions of sprite</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10250">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10250">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10251">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) スプライトの作成に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10251">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful sprite create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10252">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10252">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10253">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10253">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10254">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) ウィジェットは既に作成されています</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10254">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10255">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) 親ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10255">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10256">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10256">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10257">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10257">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10258">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10258">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create sprite “my_sprite”. */

status = gx_sprite_create(&my_sprite, “my_sprite”,
    &my_parent,
    sprite_frame_list, frame_count,
    GX_STYLE_SPRITE_AUTO|GX_STYLE_SPRITE_LOOP,
    ID_MY_SPRITE, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the sprite “my_sprite” has been created. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10260">gx_sprite_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10260">gx_sprite_start</span></span>
