## <a name="gx_system_dirty_mark"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10723">gx_system_dirty_mark</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10723">gx_system_dirty_mark</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10724">領域をダーティとしてマークします</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10724">Mark area dirty</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10725">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10725">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_dirty_mark(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10726">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10726">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10727">このサービスは、このウィジェットの領域をダーティとしてマークします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10727">This service marks the area of this widget as dirty.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10728">これにより、システム イベントの処理が完了したときに再描画するためにウィジェットが効果的にキューに登録されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10728">This effectively queues the widget for redrawing when the system event processing has been completed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10729">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10729">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10730">**widget** ウィジェット制御ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10730">**widget**: Pointer to widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10731">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10731">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10732">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) ウィジェットがダーティと正常にマークされました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10732">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully marked widget dirty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10733">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10733">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10734">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10734">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10735">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10735">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10736">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10736">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10737">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10737">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10738">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10738">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Mark widget “my_widget” as dirty. */
status = gx_system_dirty_mark(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the area associated
   with “my_widget” has been marked as dirty. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_dirty_partial_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10763">gx_system_dirty_partial_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10763">gx_system_dirty_partial_add</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10764">一部の領域をダーティとしてマークします</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10764">Mark partial area dirty</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10765">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10765">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_dirty_partial_add(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RECTANGLE *dirty_area);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10766">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10766">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10767">このサービスは、このウィジェットの部分的な領域をダーティとしてマークします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10767">This service marks the partial area of this widget as dirty.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10768">これにより、システム イベントの処理が完了したときに GUIX キャンバスの更新操作によって再描画するためにウィジェットがキューに登録されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10768">This queues the widget for redrawing by the GUIX canvas refresh operation when the system event processing has been completed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10769">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10769">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10770">**widget** ウィジェット制御ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10770">**widget**: Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10771">**dirty_area**: ダーティとしてマークするウィジェットのダーティ領域</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10771">**dirty_area**: Dirty area of widget to mark dirty</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10772">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10772">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10773">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 部分的なダーティ領域のマーク付けが成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10773">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful partial dirty area mark</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10774">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10774">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10775">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10775">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10776">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10776">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10777">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) ダーティ領域のサイズが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10777">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid size of dirty area</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10778">使用可能な場所</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10778">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10779">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10779">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10780">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10780">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Mark widget “my_widget” partial area as dirty. */

status = gx_system_dirty_partial_add(&my_widget,
    &partial_area);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the partial area “partial_area”
associated with “my_widget” has been marked as dirty. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_draw_context_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10805">gx_system_draw_context_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10805">gx_system_draw_context_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10806">描画コンテキストを取得します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10806">Get drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10807">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10807">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_draw_context_get(GX_DRAW_CONTEXT **current_context);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10808">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10808">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10809">このサービスは、現在の描画コンテキストへのポインターを返します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10809">This service returns a pointer to the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10810">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10810">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10811">**current_context**: 現在の描画コンテキスト ポインターの宛先へのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10811">**current_context**: Pointer to destination for current drawing context pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10812">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10812">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10813">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 現在のコンテキストの取得に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10813">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful current context get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10814">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10814">**GX_PTR_ERROR**:0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10815">使用可能な場所</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10815">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10816">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10816">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10817">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10817">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_DRAW_CONTEXT *current_context;

/* Get current drawing context. */

status = gx_system_draw_context_get(&current_context);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the current drawing context
   is contained in “current_context”. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_event_fold"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10842">gx_system_event_fold</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10842">gx_system_event_fold</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10843">イベントを送信します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10843">Send event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10844">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10844">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_event_fold(GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10845">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10845">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10846">このサービスは、GUIX イベント キューで同じ種類のイベントを探します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10846">This service searches the GUIX event queue for an event of the same type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10847">同じ種類のイベントが存在する場合、イベント ペイロードが新しいイベントに合わせて更新されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10847">If an event of the same type exists, the event payload is updated to match the new event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10848">一致するイベントが見つからない場合は、イベント キューの最後に新しいイベントを追加するために、gx_system_event_send 関数が呼び出されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10848">If no matching event is found, the gx_system_event_send function is called to add the new event to the end of the event queue.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10849">この関数は、イベント キューが複数の PEN_DRAG イベントでいっぱいにならないようにするために、高速タッチ入力ドライバーでよく使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10849">This function is commonly used by fast touch input drivers to prevent filling the event queue with multiple PEN_DRAG events.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10850">同じ種類の複数のイベントが GUIX イベント キューに追加されないようにするために、この関数をアプリケーションから呼び出すこともできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10850">This function can also be called by the application to prevent multiple events of the same type from being added to the GUIX event queue.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10851">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10851">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10852">**event**: イベントへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10852">**event**: Pointer to event</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10853">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10853">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10854">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) イベントの送信が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10854">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful event send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10855">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10855">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10856">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10856">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10857">使用可能な場所</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10857">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10858">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10858">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10859">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10859">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_EVENT my_event;

memset(&my_event, 0, sizeof(GX_EVENT));

my_event.gx_event_type = GX_EVENT_PEN_DOWN;

my_event.gx_event_payload.gx_event_pointdata.gx_point_x = 100;
my_event.gx_event_payload.gx_event_pointdata.gx_point_y = 200;

/* Send “my_event” for processing. */
status = gx_system_event_fold(&my_event);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the event has been sent for processing. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_event_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10884">gx_system_event_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10884">gx_system_event_send</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10885">イベントを送信します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10885">Send event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10886">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10886">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_event_send(GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10887">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10887">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10888">このサービスは、指定されたイベントを GUIX システム イベント キューに送信します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10888">This service sends the specified event into the GUIX system event queue.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10889">新しいイベントは、キューの最後に配置されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10889">The new event is placed at the end of the queue.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10890">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10890">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10891">**event**: イベントへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10891">**event**: Pointer to event</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10892">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10892">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10893">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) イベントの送信が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10893">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful event send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10894">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10894">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10895">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10895">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10896">使用可能な場所</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10896">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10897">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10897">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10898">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10898">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Send “new_event” for processing. */

GX_EVENT new_event;

new_event.gx_event_target = widget ->gx_widget_parent;
new_event.gx_event_type = MY_EVENT_TYPE;

/* Set optional param. */
new_event.gx_event_payload.xxxx = yyyy
new_event.gx_event_sender = widget->gx_widget_id;

/* Push the event to event pool. */
status = gx_system_event_send(&new_event);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the event has been sent for processing. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_focus_claim"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10923">gx_system_focus_claim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10923">gx_system_focus_claim</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10924">フォーカスを要求します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10924">Claim focus</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10925">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10925">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_focus_claim(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10926">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10926">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10927">このサービスは、指定されたウィジェットのフォーカスを要求します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10927">This service claims the focus for the specified widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10928">ウィジェットは、以前にフォーカスされていなかった場合、GX_EVENT_FOCUS_GAINED イベントを受信します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10928">If the widget did no previously have focus, it will receive a GX_EVENT_FOCUS_GAINED event.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10929">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10929">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10930">**widget**: フォーカスを要求するウィジェット制御ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10930">**widget**: Pointer to widget control block to claim focus</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10931">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10931">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10932">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) フォーカスの要求に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10932">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful focus claim</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10933">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10933">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10934">**GX_NO_CHANGE**: (0x08) ウィジェットは既にフォーカスされています</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10934">**GX_NO_CHANGE**: (0x08) Widget already owns focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10935">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10935">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10936">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10936">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12 Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10937">使用可能な場所</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10937">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10938">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10938">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10939">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10939">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Claim focus for widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_system_claim_focus(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the focus has been claimed for
   “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_initialize"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10964">gx_system_initialize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10964">gx_system_initialize</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10965">GUIX を初期化します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10965">Initialize GUIX</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10966">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10966">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_initialize(VOID);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10967">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10967">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10968">このサービスは、GUIX を初期化します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10968">This service initializes GUIX.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10969">このサービスは、他の GUIX API サービスの前に呼び出す必要があり、システムの起動時に 1 回だけ呼び出す必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10969">This service must be invoked before any other GUIX API service, and should only be invoked once at system startup.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10970">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10970">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10971">**なし**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10971">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10972">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10972">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10973">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) システムが正常に初期化されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10973">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful system initialize</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10974">**GX_SYSTEM_ERROR**: (0xFE) GX_EVENT 制御ブロック サイズが無効であるか、キューまたはミューテックスまたはスレッドの作成のイベントが失敗しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10974">**GX_SYSTEM_ERROR**: (0xFE) Invalid GX_EVENT control block size or event queue/mutex/thread create failed.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10975">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10975">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10976">使用可能な場所</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10976">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10977">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10977">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-10978">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-10978">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Initialize GUIX. */
status = gx_system_initialize();

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, GUIX has been initialized. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_language_table_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11003">gx_system_language_table_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11003">gx_system_language_table_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11004">アクティブな言語テーブルを取得します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11004">Retrieve active language table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11005">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11005">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_language_table_get( 
    GX_CHAR ****language_table,
    GX_UBYTE *languages_count, 
    UINT *string_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11006">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11006">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11007">このサービスは、アクティブな言語テーブルを取得します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11007">This service retrieves the active language table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11008">gx_display_language_table_get が採用されたため、この関数は非推奨となりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11008">This function is deprecated in favor of gx_display_language_table_get.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11009">すべての新しいアプリケーションで gx_display_language_table_get を使用してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11009">All new applications should use gx_display_language_table_get.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11010">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11010">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11011">**language_table**: 言語テーブルを返すポインターのアドレス。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11011">**language_table**: Address of pointer to return language table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11012">**languages_count**: テーブルの列数を返す変数のアドレス。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11012">**languages_count**: Address of variable to return table columns.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11013">**string_count**: テーブルの行数を返すポインターのアドレス。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11013">**string_count**: Address of pointer to return table rows.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11014">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11014">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11015">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) アクティブな言語テーブルを正常に取得しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11015">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully retrieved active language table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11016">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11016">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11017">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11017">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11018">使用可能な場所</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11018">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11019">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11019">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
GX_CHAR ***language_table;

GX_UBYTE language_count;

UINT string_count;

/* Retrieve the language table */

status = gx_system_language_table_get(&language_table,
    &language_count, &string_count);
```

## <a name="gx_system_language_table_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11024">gx_system_language_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11024">gx_system_language_table_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11025">アクティブな言語テーブルを割り当てます</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11025">Assign active language table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11026">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11026">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_language_table_set(
    GX_CHAR ***language_table,
    GX_UBYTE languages_count, 
    UINT string_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11027">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11027">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11028">このサービスは、アクティブな言語テーブルをインストールします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11028">This service installs the active language table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11029">gx_display_language_table_set が採用されたため、この関数は非推奨となりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11029">This function has been deprecated in favor of gx_display_language_table_set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11030">すべての新しいアプリケーションでは gx_display_language_table_set を使用してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11030">All new applications should use gx_display_language_table_set.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11031">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11031">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11032">**language_table**: 言語テーブルへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11032">**language_table**: Pointer to language table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11033">**languages_count**: テーブル内の言語の数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11033">**languages_count**: Number of languages in table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11034">**string_count**: 文字列テーブルの行数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11034">**string_count**: Number of string table rows.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11035">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11035">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11036">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 言語テーブルが正常に設定されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11036">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set language table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11037">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11037">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11038">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11038">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11039">使用可能な場所</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11039">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11040">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11040">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11041">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11041">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve the language table */

status = gx_system_language_table_set(language_table,
    language_count, string_count);
```

## <a name="gx_system_memory_allocator_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11046">gx_system_memory_allocator_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11046">gx_system_memory_allocator_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11047">メモリの割り当て、割り当て解除のために関数を割り当てます</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11047">Assign functions for memory allocation, de-allocation</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11048">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11048">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_memory_allocator_set(VOID *(allocate)(ULONG size),
    VOID(*release)(VOID *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11049">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11049">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11050">このサービスは、動的なメモリ割り当てと割り当て解除のために、アプリケーションが提供するコールバック関数を割り当てます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11050">This service assigns the application supplied callback function for dynamic memory allocation and de-allocation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11051">動的メモリ割り当てを使用する GUIX サービスがアプリケーションで必要ない場合は、このサービスを呼び出す必要はありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11051">If no GUIX service that uses dynamic memory allocation is needed by the application, this service does not need to be called.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11052">このサービスを使用する場合は、GUIX サービス ポインターをクリアする gx_system_initialize() の後、動的なメモリ割り当てを使用する必要がある GUIX サービスの前に呼び出す必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11052">If used, this service should be called after gx_system_initialize() which clears the GUIX service pointers, and before any GUIX service that requires use of dynamical memory allocation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11053">実行時のメモリ割り当ておよび割り当て解除サービスを必要とする GUIX サービスには、次のものがあります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11053">GUIX services which require a runtime memory allocation and de-allocation service include:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11054">外部ストレージから GUIX ランタイム環境へのバイナリ リソースの読み込み。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11054">Loading binary resources from external storage into the GUIX runtime environment.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11055">ソフトウェア ランタイム jpeg 画像デコーダー。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11055">The software runtime jpeg image decoder.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11056">ソフトウェア ランタイム png 画像デコーダー。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11056">The software runtime png image decoder.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11057">GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY でのテキスト ウィジェットの使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11057">Using text widgets with GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11058">実行時のピクセルマップのサイズ変更および回転の各ユーティリティ関数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11058">Runtime pixemap resize and rotation utility functions.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11059">実行時のスクリーンおよびウィジェットの制御ブロックの割り当て。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11059">Runtime screen and widget control block allocation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11060">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11060">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11061">**allocator**: メモリ アロケーター関数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11061">**allocator**: Memory allocator function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11062">**release**: メモリ解放関数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11062">**release**: Memory free function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11063">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11063">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11064">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) メモリ割り当て関数が正常に割り当てられました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11064">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully assigned memory allocate function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11065">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11065">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11066">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11066">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11067">使用可能な場所</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11067">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11068">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11068">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11069">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11069">Example</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11070">次の例では、ThreadX バイト プールを使用して、スレッドセーフな動的メモリ割り当てとメモリ割り当て解除サービスを実装しています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11070">The following example utilizes a ThreadX byte pool to implement a threadsafe dynamic memory allocation and memory de-allocation service.</span></span>

```C
TX_BYTE_POOL memory_pool;

#define SCRATCHPAD_SIZE (1024 * 4)

ULONG scratchpad[SCRATCHPAD_SIZE];

/* define memory allocation service */

VOID *memory_allocate(ULONG size)
{
    VOID *memptr;

    if (tx_byte_allocate(&memory_pool, &memptr, size, TX_NO_WAIT) == TX_SUCCESS)
    {
        return memptr;
    }
    return NULL;
}

/* define memory de-allocation service */
void memory_free(VOID *mem)
{
    tx_byte_release(mem);
}

/* create byte pool and install our dynamic memory services with GUIX
*/

VOID tx_application_define(void *first_unused_memory)
{
    /* create byte pool for GUIX to use */
    tx_byte_pool_create(&memory_pool, "scratchpad", scratchpad,
        SCRATCHPAD_SIZE * sizeof(ULONG));

    guix_setup();

    /* install our memory allocator and de-allocator */
    gx_system_memory_allocator_set(memory_allocate, memory_free);
}
```

## <a name="gx_system_pen_configure"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11095">gx_system_pen_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11095">gx_system_pen_configure</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11096">ペンの構成を設定します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11096">Set pen configuration</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11097">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11097">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_pen_configure(GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION *pen_configuration);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11098">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11098">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11099">このサービスは、ペンの構成を設定して、ペンの速度と距離のパラメーターを制御します (これらはGX_EVENT_FLICK イベントの種類の生成をトリガーするために使用されます)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11099">This service sets pen configuration to control the pen speed and distance parameters used to trigger the generation of GX_EVENT_FLICK event types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11100">GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION の gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist メンバーは固定小数点データ型であるため、GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(値) を使用して INT から GX_FIXED_VAL に変換する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11100">The gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist member of GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION is a fixed point data type, and you should use GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(value) to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11101">たとえば、最小ドラッグ距離をティックあたり 0.5 ピクセルに設定する場合は、gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist を `GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2` に設定する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11101">For example, if you want to set minimum drag distance to 0.5 pixel per tick, you have to set the gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist to `GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2`.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11102">GUIX リリース 5.4.0 以前では、GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION の gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist メンバーは GX_FIXED_VAL 型ではなく (INT << 8) 型でした。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11102">In GUIX releases 5.4.0 and older, the gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist member of GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION was of (INT << 8) type rather than GX_FIXED_VAL type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11103">5\.4.0 バージョン GUIX ライブラリを使用しているプロジェクトでこの API を使用している場合は、GUIX ライブラリをビルドするときに、min_drag_dist パラメーターを変更するか、#define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY を指定する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11103">If your project with 5.4.0 version GUIX library is using this API, you will need to modify the min_drag_dist parameter or #define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY when building the GUIX library.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11104">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11104">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11105">**pen_configuration** ペンの構成の構造へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11105">**pen_configuration** Pointer to pen configuration structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11106">**付録 I** には GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION 構造の定義が含まれています</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11106">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11107">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11107">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11108">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) ペンの構成が正常に設定されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11108">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set pen configuration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11109">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11109">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11110">使用可能な場所</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11110">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11111">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11111">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11112">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11112">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define pen configuration, set minimum drag distance to 0.5 pixel
per tick, maximum pen speed to 10 ticks. That means GUIX will trigger
a vertical or horizontal flick event if the drag time is smaller than
10 ticks and the drag distance is bigger than 0.5 * drag_ticks. */

GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION pen_configuration;

#if defined(GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY)
Pen_configuration.gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist = (1 << 8)/ 2;
#else
pen_configuration.gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2;
#endif

pen_configuration.gx_pen_configuration_max_pen_speed_ticks = 10;

/* Set the pen configuration. */
status = gx_system_pen_configure(&pen_configuration);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the touch configure has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11113">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11113">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11114">システム画面スタックを作成して初期化します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11114">Create and initialize the system screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11115">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11115">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_create(
    GX_WIDGET **memory, 
    INT size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11116">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11116">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11117">このサービスは、システム画面スタックに使用されるメモリ プールを定義します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11117">This service defines a memory pool to be used for the system screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11118">システム画面スタックは、アプリケーションでアプリケーション画面フローの外観を管理するために使用できるオプションの関数です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11118">The system screen stack is an optional feature that can be used by the application to manage application screen flow appearance.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11119">アプリケーションで画面スタック サービスを使用する場合は、まず、画面スタック メモリ領域を設定するために gx_system_screen_stack_create 関数を呼び出す必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11119">If the application intends to utilize the screen stack services, the gx_system_screen_stack_create function must first be called to setup the screen stack memory region.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11120">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11120">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11121">**memory**: 予約されたメモリ ブロックへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11121">**memory**: Pointer to the reserved memory block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11122">**size**: 予約されたメモリ ブロックのサイズ (バイト単位)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11122">**size**: Size, in bytes, of the reserved memory block.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11123">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11123">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11124">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 正常に作成しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11124">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11125">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11125">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11126">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11126">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11127">使用可能な場所</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11127">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11128">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11128">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11129">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11129">Example</span></span>

```C
#define SCREEN_STACK_DEPTH 8
GX_WIDGET *screen_stack[SCREEN_STACK_DEPTH * 2];

UINT status;

/* Get the scrollbar appearance. */

status = gx_system_screen_stack_create(screen_stack,
    sizeof(GX_WIDGET *) * SCREEN_STACK_DEPTH * 2);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the system screen stack is initialized
and ready for use. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11130">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11130">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11131">gx_system_screen_stack_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11131">gx_system_screen_stack_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11132">gx_system_screen_stack_pop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11132">gx_system_screen_stack_pop</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11133">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11133">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11134">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11134">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11135">gx_system_screen_stack_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11135">gx_system_screen_stack_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11136">最上位の画面スタック ポインターをポップします</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11136">Pop the topmost screen stack pointers</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11137">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11137">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_get(
    GX_WIDGET **popped_parent,
    GX_WIDGET **popped_screen);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11138">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11138">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11139">この関数は、最上位の画面スタック ポインターをポップし、それらのポインターを呼び出し元に返します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11139">This function pops the topmost screen stack pointers and returns those pointers to the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11140">この関数は gx_system_screen_stack_pop() とは異なり、ポップされた画面は前の親に自動的に再アタッチされません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11140">This function differs from gx_system_screen_stack_pop() in that the popped screen is not automatically reattached to the previous parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11141">代わりに、ポインターがスタックからポップされ、呼び出し元に返されます。これにより、呼び出し元は、返された画面を必要に応じてをアタッチしたり破棄したりできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11141">Instead, the pointers are popped from the stack and returned to the caller, allowing the caller to attach the or discard the returned screen as desired.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11142">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11142">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11143">**popped_parent**: 親ウィジェットのポインターを格納する場所。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11143">**popped_parent**: Location to store the parent widget pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11144">**popped_screen**: ポップされた画面ポインターを格納する場所。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11144">**popped_screen**: Location to store the popped screen pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11145">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11145">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11146">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 画面スタック ポインターを正常に取得しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11146">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully retrieval of screen stack pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11147">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11147">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11148">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11148">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11149">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) 無効または空の画面スタック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11149">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) Invalid or empty screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11150">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11150">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11151">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11151">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11152">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11152">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

GX_WIDGET *parent_screen;

GX_WIDGET *popped_screen;

/* Pop a screen stack entry. */
status = gx_system_screen_stack_get(&parent_screen, &popped_screen);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, parent_screen and
popped_screen hold the topmost screen stack pointers. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11153">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11153">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11154">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11154">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11155">gx_system_screen_stack_pop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11155">gx_system_screen_stack_pop</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11156">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11156">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11157">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11157">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_pop"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11158">gx_system_screen_stack_pop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11158">gx_system_screen_stack_pop</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11159">システム画面スタックから最上位のエントリをポップします</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11159">Pop the topmost entry from the system screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11160">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11160">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_pop();
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11161">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11161">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11162">この関数は、画面スタックの最上位のエントリをポップし、ポップされた画面をポップされた親ウィジェットに自動的にアタッチします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11162">This function pops the topmost entry fo the screen stack and automatically attaches the popped screen to the popped parent widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11163">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11163">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11164">"**なし**"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11164">**none**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11165">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11165">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11166">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 画面スタック ポインターを正常に取得しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11166">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfull retrieval of screen stack pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11167">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11167">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11168">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11168">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11169">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) 無効または空の画面スタック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11169">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) Invalid or empty screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11170">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11170">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11171">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11171">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11172">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11172">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

/* Pop a screen stack entry. */
status = gx_system_screen_stack_pop();

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the topmost screen stack entry has been
popped from the stack and re-attached to the previous parent. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11173">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11173">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11174">gx_system_screen_stack_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11174">gx_system_screen_stack_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11175">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11175">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11176">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11176">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11177">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11177">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_push"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11178">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11178">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11179">ウィジェットと親ポインターを画面スタックにプッシュする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11179">Push a widget and parent pointer to the screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11180">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11180">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_push(GX_WIDGET *screen)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11181">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11181">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11182">このサービスは、(通常はトップレベル画面である) 指定されたウィジェットへのポインターを画面スタックに配置します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11182">This service places a pointer to the indicated widget, which is usually a top-level screen, onto the screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11183">ウィジェットに親がある場合、親からデタッチされます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11183">If the widget has a parent it is detached from the parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11184">親ウィジェットのポインターも画面スタックにプッシュされます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11184">The parent widget pointer is also pushed to the screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11185">親ウィジェットは NULL でもかまいません。つまり、表示されていないか親にアタッチされていない画面は、画面スタックにプッシュされる可能性があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11185">The parent widget may be NULL, meaning a screen that is not visible or attached to any parent may be pushed onto the screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11186">親を持たないウィジェットが画面スタックにプッシュされた場合は、ポップされたウィジェットを前の親に再アタッチしようとする screen_stack_pop() API を使用するのではなく、screen_stack_get() API を使用してプッシュ画面ポインターを取得する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11186">If a widget with no parent is pushed to the screen stack, the screen_stack_get() API should be used to retrieve the pushed screen pointer, rather than using the screen_stack_pop() API, which attempts to reattached the popped widget to its previous parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11187">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11187">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11188">**screen**: 画面スタックにプッシュされるウィジェットへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11188">**screen**: Pointer to the widget to be pushed to the screen stack.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11189">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11189">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11190">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) スクロールバーの外観を正常に取得しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11190">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully get scrollbar appearance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11191">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11191">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11192">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11192">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11193">使用可能な場所</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11193">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11194">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11194">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11195">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11195">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the scrollbar appearance. */
status = gx_system_screen_stack_push(window);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the widget pointed to by “window” has
been pushed to the screen stack, along with the widget’s parent
ponter. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11196">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11196">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11197">gx_system_screen_stack_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11197">gx_system_screen_stack_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11198">gx_system_screen_stack_pop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11198">gx_system_screen_stack_pop</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11199">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11199">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11200">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11200">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_reset"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11201">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11201">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11202">システム画面スタックをリセットします</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11202">Reset the system screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11203">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11203">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_reset();
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11204">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11204">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11205">この関数は、システム画面スタックからすべてのエントリを削除します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11205">This function removes all entries from the system screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11206">スタックからポップされた画面に、GUIX Studio によってコントロール ブロックが動的に割り当てられている場合は、それらのコントロール ブロックのメモリが解放されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11206">If the screens popped from the stack have dynamically allocated control blocks allocated by GUIX Studio, the memory for those control blocks is freed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11207">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11207">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11208">"**なし**"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11208">**none**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11209">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11209">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11210">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) スクロールバーの外観を正常に取得しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11210">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully get scrollbar appearance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11211">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11211">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11212">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11212">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11213">使用可能な場所</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11213">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11214">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11214">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11215">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11215">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the scrollbar appearance. */
status = gx_system_screen_stack_reset();

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the system screen stack has been cleared
of entries. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11216">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11216">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11217">gx_system_screen_stack_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11217">gx_system_screen_stack_get</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11219">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11219">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11220">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11220">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_scroll_appearance_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11221">gx_system_scroll_appearance_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11221">gx_system_scroll_appearance_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11222">スクロールの外観を取得します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11222">Get scroll appearance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11223">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11223">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_scroll_appearance_get(
    ULONG style,
    GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE *return_appearance);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11224">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11224">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11225">このサービスは、スクロールバーの外観を取得します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11225">This service gets the scrollbar appearance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11226">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11226">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11227">**style**: スクロールバーのスタイル: `GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL` または `GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11227">**style**: Scrollbar style: `GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL` or `GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL`</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11228">**return_appearance**:外観の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11228">**return_appearance**: Pointer to destination for appearance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11229">**付録 I** には GX_SCROLLBAR_APPERANCE の定義が含まれています</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11229">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SCROLLBAR_APPERANCE</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11230">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11230">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11231">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) スクロールバーの外観を正常に取得しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11231">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully get scrollbar appearance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11232">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11232">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11233">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11233">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11234">使用可能な場所</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11234">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11235">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11235">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11236">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11236">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE my_appearance;

/* Get the scrollbar appearance. */

status = gx_system_scroll_appearance_get(style, &my_appearance);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS “my_appearance” now contains the scroll
appearance. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11254">gx_system_string_table_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11254">gx_system_string_table_get</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_scroll_appearance_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11261">gx_system_scroll_appearance_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11261">gx_system_scroll_appearance_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11262">スクロールの外観を設定します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11262">Set scroll appearance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11263">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11263">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_scroll_appearance_set(
    ULONG style,
    GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE *appearance);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11264">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11264">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11265">このサービスは、既定のスクロールの外観を設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11265">This service sets the default scroll appearance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11266">スクロールを作成するとき、アプリケーションでカスタム バージョンが指定されない限り、この外観構造が使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11266">When a scroll is created, this appearance structure is used unless the application provides a custom version.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11267">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11267">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11268">**style**: スクロールスタイル `GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL` または `GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11268">**style**: Scroll style `GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL` or `GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL`</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11269">**appearance**: さまざまなスクロールバーの外観属性で初期化された外観構造へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11269">**appearance**: Pointer to appearance structure initialized with various scrollbar appearance attributes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11270">GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE 構造の定義については、**付録 I** を参照してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11270">Refer to **Appendix I** for the definition of the GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11271">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11271">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11272">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) スクロールの外観セットが正常に設定されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11272">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set scroll appearance set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11273">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11273">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11274">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11274">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11275">使用可能な場所</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11275">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11276">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11276">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11277">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11277">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE my_appearance;

memset(&my_appearance, 0, sizeof(GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE));

my_appearance.gx_scroll_width = 20;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_width = 18;

my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_color = GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_border_color = GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_button_color = GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_travel_min = 20;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_travel_max = 20;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_border_style = GX_STYLE_BORDER_THIN;

/* Set the scroll appearance. */

status = gx_system_scroll_appearance_set(GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL, &my_appearance);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the scroll appearance has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11301">gx_system_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11301">gx_system_start</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11302">GUIX を開始します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11302">Start GUIX</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11303">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11303">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_start(VOID);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11304">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11304">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11305">このサービスは、GUIX 処理を開始します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11305">This service starts GUIX processing.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11306">通常の状況では、この関数は処理を返しませんが、代わりに GUIX イベント キューの処理を開始します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11306">Under normal circumstances this function never returns, but instead begins processing the GUIX event queue.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11307">GUIX イベント キューが空の場合、このサービスは、新しいイベントが GUIX イベント キューに到達するまで呼び出し元のスレッドを中断します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11307">When the GUIX event queue is empty, this service suspends the calling thread until new events arrive in the GUIX event queue.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11308">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11308">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11309">**なし**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11309">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11310">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11310">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11311">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) システムが正常に開始しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11311">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful system start</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11312">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11312">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11313">使用可能な場所</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11313">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11314">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11314">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11315">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11315">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Start GUIX. */
status = gx_system_start();

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . GUIX has been started. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_string_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11340">gx_system_string_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11340">gx_system_string_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11341">文字列を取得します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11341">Get string</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11342">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11342">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_string_get(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id,
    GX_CHAR **return_string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11343">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11343">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11344">このサービスは、最初に定義された表示と現在アクティブな言語を使用して、指定されたリソース ID の文字列を取得します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11344">This service gets the string for the specified resource ID, using the first defined display and the currently active language.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11345">gx_display_string_get を優先して、この関数は非推奨となりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11345">This function has been deprecated in favor of gx_display_string_get.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11346">すべての新しいアプリケーションで gx_display_string_get を使用する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11346">All new applications should use gx_display_string_get.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11347">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11347">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11348">**string_id**: 文字列のリソース ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11348">**string_id**: String resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11349">**return_string**: 文字列宛先ポインターへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11349">**return_string**: Pointer to string destination pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11350">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11350">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11351">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 文字列の取得に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11351">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful string get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11352">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11352">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11353">**GX_PTR_ERROR (0x07)** : ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11353">**GX_PTR_ERROR (0x07)**: Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11354">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID**: (0x33) リソース ID が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11354">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID**: (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11355">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11355">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11356">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11356">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11357">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11357">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the string associated with MY_STRING_ID. */

status = gx_system_string_get(MY_STRING_RESOURCE_ID, &my_string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string is contained in “my_string”.
*/
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-11358">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-11358">See Also</span></span>
