## <a name="gx_utility_math_sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12831">gx_utility_math_sin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12831">gx_utility_math_sin</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12832">サイン (正弦) を計算する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12832">Compute sine</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12833">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12833">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_FIXED_VAL gx_utility_math_sin(GX_FIXED_VAL angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12834">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12834">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12835">このサービスにより、指定された角度のサインが計算されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12835">This service computes the sine of the supplied angle.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12836">入力値は固定ポイント データ型であり、GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE を呼び出して INT から GX_FIXED_VAL に変換します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12836">The input value is a fixed point data type, call GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12837">たとえば、90 度のサインを計算する場合は、入力を GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE (90) とします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12837">For example, if you want to calculate the sine of 90 degree, make input as GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(90).</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12838">戻り値は固定ポイント データ型であり、GX_FIXED_VAL_TO_INT を呼び出して GX_FIXED_VAL から INT に変換します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12838">The return value is a fixed point data type, call GX_FIXED_VAL_TO_INT to convert from GX_FIXED_VAL to INT.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12839">5\.4.0 またはそれ以下の GUIX バージョンでは、入力値と戻り値の型は INT で、入力値と戻り値は 256 で拡大されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12839">In 5.4.0 or lesser version GUIX, the input value and return value type is INT, the input value and return value are enlarged by 256.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12840">したがって、このサービスを呼び出す前に、アプリケーションで角度の値を 256 でスケーリングする必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12840">And therefore, the application must scale the angle value by 256 before invoke this service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12841">GUIX バージョンが 5.4.0 以下のプロジェクトで、最新の guix ライブラリを使用してプロジェクトをアップグレードする場合は、2 つのオプションがあります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12841">If your project with GUIX version equal or lesser than 5.4.0, and you want to upgrade your project with the latest guix library, you have two options.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12842">この API 呼び出しの入力値と戻り値の処理を、GX_FIXED_VAL データ型の値を使用するように修正します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12842">Fix the input value and the handing to the return value of this API call to use GX_FIXED_VAL data type value.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12843">GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY を定義します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12843">Define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12844">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12844">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12845">**angle**: サインを計算する角度</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12845">**angle**: Angle to compute sine of</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12846">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12846">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12847">**sine**: 指定された角度のサイン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12847">**sine**: Sine of supplied angle</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12848">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12848">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12849">すべて</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12849">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12850">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12850">Example</span></span>

```C
INT my_angle = 80;

/* Compute sine of “my_angle”. */

#if defined(GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY)
    INT scaled_angle = my_angle << 8;
#else
    GX_FIXED_VAL = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(my_angle);
#endif

my_angle_sine = gx_utility_math_sin(scaled_angle);

/* “my_angle_sine” contains the sine of “my_angle”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_math_sqrt"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12868">gx_utility_math_sqrt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12868">gx_utility_math_sqrt</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12869">平方根を計算する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12869">Compute square root</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12870">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12870">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_math_sqrt(UINT value);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12871">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12871">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12872">このサービスにより、指定された値の平方根が計算されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12872">This service computes the square root of the supplied value.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12873">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12873">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12874">**value**: 平方根を計算する値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12874">**value**: Value to compute square root of</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12875">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12875">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12876">**square root**: 指定された値の平方根</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12876">**square root**: Square root of supplied value</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12877">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12877">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12878">すべて</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12878">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12879">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12879">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compute square root of “my_value”. */
my_square_root = gx_utility_math_sqrt(my_value);

/* “my_square_root” contains the square root of “my_value”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12895">gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12895">gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12896">BiDi テキストを表示順に並べ替える</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12896">Reorder BiDi text into its display order</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12897">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12897">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO *input_info, 
                                       GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO **resolved_info_head)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12898">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12898">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12899">このサービスは、BiDi テキストを表示順に並べ替えます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12899">This service reorders BiDi text into its display order.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12900">テキスト描画のフォントと表示幅が指定されている場合は、最初に改行が適用され、各行に基づいて並べ替え処理が適用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12900">If text draw font and display width are provided, line breaking will be applied first, reordering process will be applied based on each line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12901">指定したテキストに複数の段落が含まれている場合、サービスはテキストを段落に分割し、各段落の改行と並べ替えの結果がリストとしてリンクされます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12901">If the provided text contains more than one paragraph, the service will break the text into paragraphs, the line breaking and reordering result of each paragraph will be linked as a list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12902">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12902">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12903">**input_info**: 改行とテキストの並べ替えに関する情報へのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12903">**input_info**: Pointer to the information for line breaking and text reordering</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12904">**resolved_info_head**: 指定されたテキストの各段落の改行と並べ替えの結果を含むリンク リストへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12904">**resolved_info_head**: Pointer to the linked list that contains line breaking and reordering results of each paragraph of the the provided text</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12905">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12905">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12906">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) bidi テキストの並べ替えが成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12906">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful bidi text reorder</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12907">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 入力ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12907">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12908">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) メモリ アロケーターが定義されていないか、メモリの割り当てに失敗しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12908">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12909">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12909">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12910">すべて</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12910">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12911">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12911">Example</span></span>
#### <a name="draw-single-line-bidi-text-to-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12912">単一行の bidi テキストをキャンバスに描画する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12912">Draw single line bidi text to canvas</span></span>
```C
VOID custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
    GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO input_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *resolved_info;
    GX_CHAR bidi_text[] = "Single Line String";
    
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_ptr = bidi_text;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_length = sizeof(bidi_text) - 1;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_font = GX_NULL;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_display_width = -1;
    
    /* Reordering BiDi text. */
    status = gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(&input_info, &resolved_info);
    
    if(status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        /* Draw reordered bidi text to canvas. */
        gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(widget->gx_widget_size.gx_rectangle_left,
                                widget->gx_widget_size.gx_rectangle_top,
                                resolved_info.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_text);

        /* Delete resolved information list. */
        gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete(&resolved_info);
    }
}
```
#### <a name="draw-multi-line-bidi-text-to-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12913">複数行の bidi テキストをキャンバスに描画する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12913">Draw multi line bidi text to canvas</span></span>
```C
VOID custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
    GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO input_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *resolved_info;
    GX_CHAR bidi_text[] = "Multi Line BiDi Text Display Example";
    GX_FONT *font;
    GX_RECTANGLE client;
    GX_VALUE display_width;
    INT index;
    GX_VALUE xpos;
    GX_VALUE ypos;
    
    /* Pickup the font. */
    gx_context_font_get(font_id, &font);
    gx_widget_client_get(widget, 2, &client);
    
    display_width = (GX_VALUE)(client.gx_rectangle_right - client.gx_rectangle_left + 1);
    
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_ptr = bidi_text;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_length = sizeof(bidi_text) - 1;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_font = font;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_display_width = display_width;
    
    /* Reordering BiDi text. */
    status = gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(&input_info, &resolved_info);
    
    if(status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        xpos = client.gx_rectangle_left;
        ypos = client.gx_rectangle_top;
        
        /* Draw reordered bidi text to canvas. */
        for(index = 0; index < resolved_info.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_total_lines; index++)
        {
            gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(xpos, ypos, &resolved_info.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_text[index]);
        
            ypos += font->gx_font_line_height;
        }
        
        /* Delete resolved information list. */
        gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete(&resolved_info);
    }
}
```

#### <a name="draw-multi-paragraph-bidi-text-to-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12914">複数段落の bidi テキストをキャンバスに描画する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12914">Draw multi paragraph bidi text to canvas</span></span>
```C
VOID custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
    GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO input_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *resolved_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *next;
    GX_CHAR bidi_text[] = "Multi Paragraph\r BiDi Text Display Example";
    GX_FONT *font;
    GX_RECTANGLE client;
    GX_VALUE display_width;
    INT index;
    GX_VALUE xpos;
    GX_VALUE ypos;
    
    /* Pickup the font. */
    gx_context_font_get(font_id, &font);
    gx_widget_client_get(widget, 2, &client);
    
    display_width = (GX_VALUE)(client.gx_rectangle_right - client.gx_rectangle_left + 1);
    
    
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_ptr = bidi_text;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_length = sizeof(bidi_text) - 1;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_font = font;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_display_width = display_width;
    
    /* Reordering BiDi text. */
    status = gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(&input_info, &resolved_info);
    
    if(status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        xpos = client.gx_rectangle_left;
        ypos = client.gx_rectangle_top;
        
        next = resolved_info;
        
        /* Draw reordered bidi text to canvas. */
        while(next)
        {
            for(index = 0; index < next.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_total_lines; index++)
            {
                gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(xpos, ypos, &next.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_text[index]);
            
                ypos += font->gx_font_line_height;
            }
            
            next = next->gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_next;
        }
        
        /* Delete resolved information list. */
        gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete(&resolved_info);
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_utility_pixelmap_resize"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12933">gx_utility_pixelmap_resize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12933">gx_utility_pixelmap_resize</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12934">ピクセルマップをサイズ変更する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12934">Resize pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12935">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12935">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_pixelmap_resize(
    GX_PIXELMAP *src,
    GX_PIXELMAP *destination, 
    INT width, 
    INT height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12936">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12936">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12937">このサービスは、ピクセルマップのサイズを変更し、サイズ変更後の新しいピクセルマップへのポインターを返します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12937">This service resizes a pixelmap and returns a pointer to a new pixelmap, which is the result of the pixelmap resize.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12938">このサービスでは、サイズ変更されたピクセルマップ データを保持するためのメモリ割り当てを可能にするために、事前に gx_system_memory_allocator_set を使用する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12938">This service requires the prior use of gx_system_memory_allocator_set, to allow allocation of memory to hold the resized pixelmap data.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12939">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12939">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12940">**src**: サイズ変更するピクセルマップへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12940">**src**: Pointer to the pixelmap to resize</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12941">**destination**: 結果のピクセルマップの保存先バッファー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12941">**destination**: Destination buffer for the resulting pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12942">**width**: 結果のピクセルマップの幅 (ピクセル単位)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12942">**width**: Width of the resulting pixelmap, in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12943">**height**: 結果のピクセルマップの高さ (ピクセル単位)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12943">**height**: Hieght of the resulting pixelmap, in pixels</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12944">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12944">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12945">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) ピクセルマップのサイズ変更が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12945">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful pixelmap resize</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12946">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) ソースまたはターゲットのピクセルマップ ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12946">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid source or destination pixelmap pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12947">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) 幅または高さの値が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12947">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Width or height value not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12948">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x28) ソース ピクセルマップは圧縮形式です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12948">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x28) Source pixelmap is compressed format</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12949">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) メモリ アロケーターが定義されていないか、メモリの割り当てに失敗しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12949">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12950">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12950">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12951">すべて</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12951">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12952">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12952">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PIXLEMAP *des_pixelmap;

/* Resize “src_pixelmap” with specifiy width and height. */
status = gx_utility_pixelmap_resize(src_pixelmap,
    &des_pixelmap, 100, 200);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS. “des_pixelmap” successfully load the
resulting pixelmap of resize. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12967">gx_utility_rectangle_shift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12967">gx_utility_rectangle_shift</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12968">gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12968">gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate</span></span>

## <a name="gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12969">gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12969">gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12970">ピクセルマップを回転する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12970">Rotate pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12971">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12971">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(
    GX_PIXELMAP *src, INT angle,
    GX_PIXELMAP *destination,
    UINT *rot_cx, 
    UINT *rot_cy);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12972">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12972">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12973">このサービスは、ピクセルマップを回転し、回転後の新しいピクセルマップへのポインターを返します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12973">This service rotates a pixelmap and returns a pointer to a new pixelmap, which is the result of the pixelmap rotation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12974">ピクセルマップをキャンバスで直接回転させるには、gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate() を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12974">To rotate a pixelmap directly to the canvas, use gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12975">このサービスでは、回転したピクセルマップ データを保持するためのメモリ割り当てを可能にするために、事前に gx_system_memory_allocator_set を使用する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12975">This service requires the prior use of gx_system_memory_allocator_set, to allow allocation of memory to hold the rotated pixelmap data.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12976">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12976">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12977">**src**: 回転するピクセルマップ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12977">**src**: The pixelmap to rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12978">**angle**: 回転角度</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12978">**angle**: Angle of rotation in degrees</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12979">**destination**: 結果のピクセルマップの宛先バッファー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12979">**destination**: Destination buffer for the resulting pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12980">**rot_cx**: 宛先のピクセルマップに対する、取得された回転中心の x 座標。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12980">**rot_cx**: Retrieved x coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12981">ソースのピクセルマップに対する、回転中心の x 座標を使用して開始する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12981">Should be initiated with the x coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12982">rot_cx が GX_NULL の場合、値は取得されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12982">If rot_cx is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12983">**rot_cy**: 宛先のピクセルマップに対する、取得された回転中心の y 座標。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12983">**rot_cy**: Retrieved y coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12984">ソースのピクセルマップに対する、回転中心の y 座標を使用して開始する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12984">Should be initiated with the y coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12985">rot_cy が GX_NULL の場合、値は取得されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12985">If rot_cy is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12986">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12986">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12987">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) ピクセルマップの回転が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12987">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful pixelmap rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12988">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) ソースまたはターゲットのピクセルマップ ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12988">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid source or destination pixelmap pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12989">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) 角度の値が 0 です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12989">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Angle value is 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12990">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT**: (0x28) ソースのピクセルマップが圧縮形式です。これはサポートされていません</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12990">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT**: (0x28) Source pixelmap is compressed format, which is not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12991">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) メモリ アロケーターが定義されていないか、メモリの割り当てに失敗しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12991">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12992">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12992">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12993">すべて</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12993">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-12994">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-12994">Example</span></span>

```C
rot_cx = source_rotate_center_x;
rot_cy = source_rotate_center_y;

/* rotate “src_pixelmap” by 30 degree in clockwise direction. */
status = gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(src_pixelmap, 30,
    &des_pixelmap, &rot_cx, &rot_cy);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS. “des_pixelmap” successfully load the
resulting pixelmap of rotation. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13003">gx_utility_rectangle_combine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13003">gx_utility_rectangle_combine</span></span>

## <a name="gx_utility_pixelmap_simple_rotate"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13011">gx_utility_pixelmap_simple_rotate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13011">gx_utility_pixelmap_simple_rotate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13012">ピクセルマップを回転する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13012">Rotate pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13013">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13013">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_pixelmap_simple_rotate(
    GX_PIXELMAP *src,
    INT angle,
    GX_PIXELMAP *destination,
    UINT *rot_cx,
    UINT *rot_cy);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13014">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13014">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13015">このサービスにより、ピクセルマップが 90 度、180 度、または 270 度回転されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13015">This service rotates a pixelmap by 90 degree, 180 degree or 270 degree.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13016">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13016">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13017">**src**: 回転するピクセルマップ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13017">**src**: The pixelmap to rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13018">**angle**: 回転角度</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13018">**angle**: Angle of rotation in degrees</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13019">**destination**: 結果のピクセルマップの宛先バッファー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13019">**destination**: Destination buffer for the resulting pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13020">**rot_cx**: 宛先のピクセルマップに対する、取得された回転中心の x 座標。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13020">**rot_cx**: Retrieved x coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13021">ソースのピクセルマップに対する、回転中心の x 座標を使用して開始する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13021">Should be initiated with the x coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13022">rot_cx が GX_NULL の場合、値は取得されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13022">If rot_cx is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13023">**rot_cy**: 宛先のピクセルマップに対する、取得された回転中心の y 座標。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13023">**rot_cy**: Retrieved y coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13024">ソースのピクセルマップに対する、回転中心の y 座標を使用して開始する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13024">Should be initiated with the y coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13025">rot_cy が GX_NULL の場合、値は取得されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13025">If rot_cy is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13026">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13026">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13027">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) ピクセルマップの回転が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13027">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful pixelmap rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13028">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) ピクセルマップ ポインターのソースまたは宛先が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13028">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid source or destination pixelmap pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13029">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) 角度値が 0 であるか、または90、180、270 のような単純な角度ではありません</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13029">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Angle value is 0 or not a simple angle like 90, 180, 270</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13030">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT**: (0x28) ソースのピクセルマップが圧縮形式です。これはサポートされていません</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13030">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT**: (0x28) Source pixelmap is compressed format, which is not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13031">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) メモリ アロケーターが定義されていないか、メモリの割り当てに失敗しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13031">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**:  (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13032">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13032">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13033">すべて</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13033">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13034">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13034">Example</span></span>

```C
rot_cx = source_rotate_center_x;
rot_cy = source_rotate_center_y;

/* rotate “src_pixelmap” by 90 degree in clockwise direction. */
status = gx_utility_pixelmap_simple_rotate(src_pixelmap, 90,
    &des_pixelmap,
    &rot_cx, &rot_cy);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS. “des_pixelmap” successfully load the
resulting pixelmap of rotation. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_center"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13050">gx_utility_rectangle_center</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13050">gx_utility_rectangle_center</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13051">四角形内で別の四角形を中央に配置する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13051">Center rectangle within another rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13052">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13052">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_center(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *within_rectangle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13053">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13053">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13054">このサービスにより、四角形の内側の中央に別の四角形が配置されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13054">This service centers the rectangle within another rectangle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13055">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13055">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13056">**rectangle**: 中央に配置する四角形</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13056">**rectangle**: Rectangle to center</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13057">**within_rectangle**: 内側で中央に配置する四角形</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13057">**within_rectangle**: Rectangle to center within</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13058">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13058">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13059">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) が四角形が正しく中央に配置されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13059">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully centered the rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13060">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 入力四角形ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13060">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input rectangle pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13061">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) 四角形のサイズが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13061">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid rectangle size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13062">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13062">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13063">すべて</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13063">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13064">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13064">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

/* Center “my_inner_rectangle” inside of “my_outer_rectangle”.*/
status = gx_utility_rectangle_center(&my_inner_rectangle,
    &my_outer_rectangle);

/* Is status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_inner_rectangle” is centered
within “my_other_rectangle”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_center_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13080">gx_utility_rectangle_center_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13080">gx_utility_rectangle_center_find</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13081">四角形の中央を検出する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13081">Find center of rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13082">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13082">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_center_find(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_POINT *return_center);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13083">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13083">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13084">このサービスにより、四角形の中心が検出されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13084">This service finds the center of the rectangle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13085">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13085">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13086">**rectangle**: 四角形</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13086">**rectangle**: Rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13087">**return_center**: 中心点へのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13087">**return_center**: Pointer to center point</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13088">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13088">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13089">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 四角形の中心の検出に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13089">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully found the center of the rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13090">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) 入力ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13090">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13091">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) 四角形のサイズが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13091">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid rectangle size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13092">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13092">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13093">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13093">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13094">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13094">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

GX_RECTANGLE my_rectangle;

GX_POINT my_center_point;

gx_utility_define(&my_rectangle, 0, 0, 100, 100);

/* Find center of “my_rectangle””. */

status = gx_utility_rectangle_center_find(&my_rectangle,
    &my_center_point);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_center_point” is the center point
of “my_rectangle” (50, 50). */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_combine"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13110">gx_utility_rectangle_combine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13110">gx_utility_rectangle_combine</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13111">2 つの四角形を最初のものに結合する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13111">Combine two rectangles into first</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13112">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13112">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_combine(
    GX_RECTANGLE *first_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *second_rectangle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13113">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13113">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13114">このサービスにより、1 番目と 2 番目の四角形が 1 つ目の四角形に結合されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13114">This service combines the first and second rectangle into the first rectangle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13115">最初の四角形は、2 番目を含むように拡張されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13115">The first rectangle is expanded to include the second.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13116">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13116">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13117">**first_rectangle**: 最初の四角形と結合された四角形</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13117">**first_rectangle**: First rectangle and combined rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13118">**second_rectangle**: 2 番目の四角形</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13118">**second_rectangle**: Second rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13119">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13119">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13120">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 2 つの四角形の結合に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13120">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully combined two rectangles</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13121">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) 入力ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13121">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13122">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13122">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13123">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13123">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13124">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13124">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

GX_RECTANGLE rect_a;

GX_RECTANGLE rect_b;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&rect_a, 0, 0, 100, 100);
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&rect_b, 50, 50, 200, 200);

/* Combine “my_rectangle_a” to “my_rectangle_b”. */
status = gx_utility_rectangle_combine(&rect_a, &rect_b);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “rect_a” is (0, 0, 200, 200) the merger
of the original “rect_a” and “rect_b”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_compare"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13140">gx_utility_rectangle_compare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13140">gx_utility_rectangle_compare</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13141">2 つの四角形を比較する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13141">Compare two rectangles</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13142">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13142">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL gx_utility_rectangle_compare( 
    GX_RECTANGLE *first_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *second_rectangle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13143">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13143">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13144">このサービスにより、1 番目と 2 番目の四角形が比較されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13144">This service compares the first and second rectangle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13145">等しい場合は、GX_TRUE の値が返されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13145">If they are equal, a value of GX_TRUE is returned.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13146">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13146">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13147">**first_rectangle**: 最初の四角形</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13147">**first_rectangle**: First rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13148">**second_rectangle**: 2 番目の四角形</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13148">**second_rectangle**: Second rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13149">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13149">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13150">**result**: 四角形が等しい場合は GX_TRUE、それ以外の場合は GX_FALSE が返されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13150">**result**: GX_TRUE if rectangles are equal, otherwise GX_FALSE is returned.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13151">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13151">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13152">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13152">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13153">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13153">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compare “my_rectangle_a” to “my_rectangle_b”. */
result = gx_utility_rectangle_compare(&my_rectangle_a,
    &my_rectangle_b);

/* If result is GX_TRUE, the two rectangles are equal. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13169">gx_utility_rectangle_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13169">gx_utility_rectangle_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13170">四角形を定義する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13170">Define a rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13171">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13171">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_define(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_VALUE left,
    GX_VALUE top, 
    GX_VALUE right, 
    GX_VALUE bottom);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13172">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13172">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13173">このサービスにより、指定されたように四角形が定義されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13173">This service defines a rectangle as specified.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13174">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13174">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13175">**rectangle**: 四角形のコントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13175">**rectangle**: Rectangle control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13176">**left**: 左端の座標</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13176">**left**: Left most coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13177">**top**: 上端の座標</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13177">**top**: Top most coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13178">**right**: 右端の座標</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13178">**right**: Right most coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13179">**bottom**: 下端の座標</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13179">**bottom**: Bottom most coordinate</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13180">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13180">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13181">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) が四角形の定義に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13181">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully defined a rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13182">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 四角形ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13182">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid rectangle pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13183">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13183">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13184">すべて</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13184">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13185">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13185">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

GX_RECTANGLE my_rect;

/* Define “my_rect”. */

status = gx_utility_rectangle_define(&my_rect, 10, 5, 200, 100);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_rect” is defined. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13201">gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13201">gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13202">四角形の重複を検出する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13202">Detect overlap of rectangles</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13203">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13203">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect(
    GX_RECTANGLE *first_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *second_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *return_overlap_area);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13204">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13204">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13205">このサービスにより、指定された四角形の重複が検出されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13205">This service detects any overlap of the supplied rectangles.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13206">重複が見つかった場合、サービスは GX_TRUE と、重複した四角形を返します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13206">If overlap is found, the service returns GX_TRUE and the overlapping rectangle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13207">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13207">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13208">**first_rectangle**: 最初の四角形</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13208">**first_rectangle**: First rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13209">**second_rectangle**: 2 番目の四角形</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13209">**second_rectangle**: Second rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13210">**return_overlap_area**: 重複する四角形の領域</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13210">**return_overlap_area**: Overlapping rectangle area</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13211">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13211">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13212">**result**: 四角形が重複している場合は GX_TRUE、それ以外の場合は GX_FALSE。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13212">**result**: GX_TRUE if rectangles overlap, otherwise GX_FALSE.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13213">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13213">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13214">すべて</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13214">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13215">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13215">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Detect overlap of “my_rectangle_a” and “my_rectangle_b”. */
result = gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect(&my_rectangle_a,
    &my_rectangle_b,
    &my_overlap_area);

/* If result is GX_TRUE, “my_overlap_area” specifies the area the
rectangles overlap. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13231">gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13231">gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13232">ポイントが四角形内に存在するかを検出する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13232">Detect if point resides in rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13233">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13233">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_POINT point);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13234">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13234">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13235">このサービスにより、指定されたポイントが四角形内に存在するかどうかが検出されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13235">This service detects if the specified point resides in the rectangle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13236">ポイントが四角形内に存在する場合、サービスは GX_TRUE を返します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13236">If the point does reside in the rectangle, the service returns  GX_TRUE.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13237">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13237">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13238">**rectangle**: 四角形</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13238">**rectangle**: Rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13239">**point**: ポイント</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13239">**point**: Point</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13240">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13240">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13241">**result**: ポイントが四角形内に存在する場合は GX_TRUE、それ以外の場合は GX_FALSE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13241">**result**: GX_TRUE if point resides in rectangle, otherwise GX_FALSE</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13242">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13242">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13243">すべて</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13243">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13244">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13244">Example</span></span>

```c
GX_RECTANGLE my_rectangle;

GX_POINT my_point;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&my_rectangle, 0, 0, 100, 100);

my_point.gx_point_x = 20; my_point.gx_point_y = 20;

/* Detect if point “my_point” is within “my_rectangle””. */
result = gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect(&my_rectangle,
    &my_point);

/* If result is GX_TRUE, “my_point” resides in the rectangle. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_resize"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13260">gx_utility_rectangle_resize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13260">gx_utility_rectangle_resize</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13261">四角形を拡張する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13261">Grow rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13262">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13262">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_resize(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_VALUE adjust);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13263">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13263">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13264">このサービスにより、四角形のサイズが指定どおりに拡張されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13264">This service increases the size of the rectangle as specified.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13265">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13265">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13266">**rectangle**: 四角形へのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13266">**rectangle**: Pointer to rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13267">**adjust**: 四角形を調整する量</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13267">**adjust**: Amount to adjust the rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13268">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13268">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13269">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 四角形のサイズ変更に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13269">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully resized the rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13270">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 入力四角形ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13270">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input rectangle pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13271">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13271">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13272">すべて</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13272">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13273">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13273">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

/* Adjust “my_rectangle” by increasing 20 pixels on four sides */
status = gx_utility_rectangle_resize(&my_rectangle, 20);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_rectangle” is 20 pixels larger. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_shift"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13289">gx_utility_rectangle_shift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13289">gx_utility_rectangle_shift</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13290">四角形をシフトする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13290">Shift rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13291">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13291">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_shift(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_VALUE x_shift,
    GX_VALUE y_shift);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13292">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13292">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13293">このサービスにより、指定された値で四角形がシフトされます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13293">This service shifts the rectangle by the specified values.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13294">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13294">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13295">**rectangle**: シフトする四角形</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13295">**rectangle**: Rectangle to shift</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13296">**x_shift** X 軸でシフトするピクセル数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13296">**x_shif**: Number of pixels to shift on the x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13297">**y_shift** Y 軸でシフトするピクセル数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13297">**y_shift**: Number of pixels to shift on the y-axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13298">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13298">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13299">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 四角形のシフトに成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13299">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully shifted the rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13300">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 入力四角形ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13300">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input rectangle pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13301">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13301">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13302">すべて</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13302">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13303">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13303">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

/* Shift “my_rectangle”. */

status = gx_utility_rectangle_shift(&my_rectangle, 10, 20);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_rectangle” has been shifted. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_string_to_alphamap"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13319">gx_utility_string_to_alphamap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13319">gx_utility_string_to_alphamap</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13320">文字列を 8bpp alphamap 型のピクセルマップにレンダリングする (非推奨)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13320">Render string to an 8bpp alphamap type pixelmap (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13321">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13321">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_string_to_alphamap(
    const GX_CHAR *text, const
    GX_FONT *font, 
    GX_PIXELMAP *return_map);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13322">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13322">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13323">gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext() を優先して、このサービスは非推奨になりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13323">This service has been deprecated in favor of gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13324">このサービスは、テキスト文字列を alphamap にレンダリングします。これは、アルファ値のみを含む特殊な形式の 8bpp ピクセルマップです。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13324">This service renders a text string to an alphamap, which is a special form of 8bpp pixelmap containing only alpha values.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13325">通常、このサービスは gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate および gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw と共に使用して、回転したテキストをキャンバスに描画します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13325">This service is typically used along with gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate and gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw to draw rotated text to the canvas.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13326">このサービスは、結果として得られる alphamap に必要なメモリ サイズを計算し、アプリケーションによって定義された gx_system_memory_allocator() 関数を呼び出してメモリを動的に割り当てます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13326">This service calculates the memory size needed for the resulting alphamap, and invokes the gx_system_memory_allocator() function defined by the application to dynamically allocate memory.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13327">アプリケーションは、このサービスを使用する前に、通常はプログラムの起動時に gx_system_memory_allocator_set() を呼び出す必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13327">The application must call gx_system_memory_allocator_set() at some point, usually during program startup, prior to using this service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13328">テキスト文字列を回転してキャンバスに一度だけ描画する場合は、代替としてサービス gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() が提供されています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13328">If a text string is to be rotated and drawn to the canvas just once, the service gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() is provided as an alternate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13329">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() は、gx_utility_string_to_alphamap()、gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate()、および gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw() を呼び出して、1 回の操作で回転したテキストをレンダリングします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13329">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() will call gx_utility_string_to_alphamap(), gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(), and gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw() to render the rotated text in one operation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13330">ただし、同じテキストがさまざまな角度で回転されて複数回描画される場合は、gx_utility_string_to_alphmap API を使用して alphamap を 1 回作成した後、必要に応じて結果の alphamap を複数回回転する方が効率的です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13330">However if the same text will be drawn multiple times rotated at various angles, it is more efficient to create the alphamap once using the gx_utility_string_to_alphmap API, then rotate the resulting alphamap multiple times as needed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13331">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13331">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13332">**text**: alphamap にレンダリングするテキスト文字列</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13332">**text**: Text string to render to alphamap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13333">**font**: テキストをレンダリングするためのフォント</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13333">**font**: The font to be to render the text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13334">**return_map**: 呼び出し元に返される GX_PIXELMAP へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13334">**return_map**: Pointer to the GX_PIXELMAP to be returned to the caller.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13335">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13335">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13336">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) テキスト文字列を alphamap に正常にレンダリングしました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13336">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully rendered a text string to an alphamap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13337">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) 入力ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13337">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13338">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) メモリ割り当て/free 関数が定義されていません</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13338">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocation/free function is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13339">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) 文字列の長さが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13339">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13340">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13340">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13341">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13341">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13342">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13342">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PIXELMAP alphamap;

GX_PIXELMAP rotated_text;

INT xpos;

INT ypos;

gx_widget_font_get(widget, GX_FONT_ID_SCREEN_LABEL, &font);

/* render string to alphamap once */

gx_utility_string_to_alphamap("Hello World", font, &alphamap);

/* rotate and render the alphmap at multiple angles */

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 45, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(10, 10, &rotated_text);

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 135, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(100, 100, &rotated_text);

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 300, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(200, 200, &rotated_text);
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13343">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13343">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13344">gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13344">gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext</span></span>

## <a name="gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13345">gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13345">gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13346">文字列を 8bpp alphamap 型のピクセルマップにレンダリングする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13346">Render string to an 8bpp alphamap type pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13347">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13347">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext(
    GX_CONST GX_STRING *string,
    GX_CONST GX_FONT *font, 
    GX_PIXELMAP *return_map);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13348">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13348">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13349">このサービスは、テキスト文字列を alphamap にレンダリングします。これは、アルファ値のみを含む特殊な形式の 8bpp ピクセルマップです。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13349">This service renders a text string to an alphamap, which is a special form of 8bpp pixelmap containing only alpha values.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13350">通常、このサービスは gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate および gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw と共に使用して、回転したテキストをキャンバスに描画します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13350">This service is typically used along with gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate and gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw to draw rotated text to the canvas.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13351">このサービスは、結果として得られる alphamap に必要なメモリ サイズを計算し、アプリケーションによって定義された gx_system_memory_allocator() 関数を呼び出してメモリを動的に割り当てます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13351">This service calculates the memory size needed for the resulting alphamap, and invokes the gx_system_memory_allocator() function defined by the application to dynamically allocate memory.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13352">アプリケーションは、このサービスを使用する前に、通常はプログラムの起動時に gx_system_memory_allocator_set() を呼び出す必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13352">The application must call gx_system_memory_allocator_set() at some point, usually during program startup, prior to using this service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13353">テキスト文字列を回転してキャンバスに一度だけ描画する場合は、代替としてサービス gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() が提供されています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13353">If a text string is to be rotated and drawn to the canvas just once, the service gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() is provided as an alternate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13354">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() は、gx_utility_string_to_alphamap()、gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate()、および gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw() を呼び出して、1 回の操作で回転したテキストをレンダリングします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13354">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() will call gx_utility_string_to_alphamap(), gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(), and gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw() to render the rotated text in one operation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13355">ただし、同じテキストがさまざまな角度で回転されて複数回描画される場合は、gx_utility_string_to_alphmap API を使用して alphamap を 1 回作成した後、必要に応じて結果の alphamap を複数回回転する方が効率的です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13355">However if the same text will be drawn multiple times rotated at various angles, it is more efficient to create the alphamap once using the gx_utility_string_to_alphmap API, then rotate the resulting alphamap multiple times as needed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13356">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13356">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13357">**string**: alphamap にレンダリングするテキスト文字列</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13357">**string**: Text string to render to alphamap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13358">**font**: テキストをレンダリングするためのフォント</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13358">**font**: The font to be to render the text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13359">**return_map**: 呼び出し元に返される GX_PIXELMAP へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13359">**return_map**: Pointer to the GX_PIXELMAP to be returned to the caller.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13360">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13360">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13361">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) テキスト文字列を alphamap に正常にレンダリングしました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13361">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully rendered a text string to an alphamap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13362">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) 入力ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13362">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13363">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) メモリ割り当て/free 関数が定義されていません</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13363">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocation/free function is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13364">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) 文字列の長さが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13364">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13365">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13365">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13366">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13366">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13367">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13367">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_STRING string;

GX_PIXELMAP alphamap;

GX_PIXELMAP rotated_text;

INT xpos;

INT ypos;

gx_widget_font_get(widget, GX_FONT_ID_SCREEN_LABEL, &font);

string.gx_string_ptr = “Hello World”;

string.gx_string_length = strlen(string.gx_string_ptr);

/* render string to alphamap once */
gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext(&string, font, &alphamap);

/* rotate and render the alphmap at multiple angles */
gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 45, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(10, 10, &rotated_text);

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 135, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(100, 100, &rotated_text);

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 300, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(200, 200, &rotated_text);
```

## <a name="gx_vertical_list_children_position"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13383">gx_vertical_list_children_position</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13383">gx_vertical_list_children_position</span></span>
### <a name="position-children-for-the-vertical-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13384">縦のリストに子を配置する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13384">Position children for the vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13385">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13385">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_vertical_list_children_position(
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13386">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13386">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13387">この関数は、縦のリストの子を配置します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13387">This function positions the children for the vertical list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13388">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13388">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13389">**vertical_list** 縦のリストのコントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13389">**vertical_list** Pointer to the vertical list control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13390">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13390">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13391">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 縦のリストの子を正常に配置しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13391">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully positioned the children for the vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13392">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13392">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13393">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13393">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13394">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13394">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13395">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13395">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13396">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13396">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13397">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13397">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Position children in the vertical list */
status = gx_vertical_list_children_position (&vertical_list);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the children in the vertical list are positioned.. */
```

## <a name="gx_vertical_list_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13407">gx_vertical_list_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13407">gx_vertical_list_create</span></span>
### <a name="create-vertical-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13408">縦のリストを作成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13408">Create vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13409">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13409">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_vertical_list_create(
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    INT total_rows,
    VOID (*callback)(GX_VERTICAL_LIST *, GX_WIDGET *, INT),
    ULONG style, USHORT vertical_list_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13410">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13410">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13411">このサービスにより、縦のリストが作成されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13411">This service creates a vertical list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13412">GX_VERTICAL_LIST は GX_WINDOW から派生し、すべての gx_window API サービスをサポートします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13412">GX_VERTICAL_LIST is derived from GX_WINDOW and supports all gx_window API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13413">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13413">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13414">**vertical_list** 縦のリストのウィジェット コントロール ブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13414">**vertical_list** Vertical list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13415">**name** 縦のリストの名前</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13415">**name** Name of vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13416">**parent** 親ウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13416">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13417">**total_rows** 縦のリストの合計行数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13417">**total_rows** Total number of rows in vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13418">**callback** リストがスクロールされるときに縦のリストによって呼び出される関数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13418">**callback** A function that will be called by the vertical list when the list is scrolled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13419">呼び出し元により、最初に、表示されるリスト行を埋めるために十分な GX_WIDGET ベースの子を作成する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13419">The caller should initially create enough GX_WIDGET based children to fill the visible list rows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13420">リストがスクロールされると、この関数が呼び出され、指定されたリスト インデックスに対応する子リストが再作成されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13420">As the list is scrolled, this function is called to re-create the list children corresponding to the supplied list index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13421">**style** スクロール バー ウィジェットのスタイル。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13421">**style** Style of scrollbar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13422">**Appendix D** には、ウィジェット固有のスタイルだけでなく、すべてのウィジェット用に事前に定義された一般的なスタイルが含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13422">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13423">**vertical_list_id** アプリケーションで定義された、縦のリストの ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13423">**vertical_list_id** Application-defined ID of vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13424">**size** 縦のリストのディメンション</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13424">**size** Dimensions of vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13425">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13425">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13426">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 縦のリストの作成に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13426">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created the vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13427">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13427">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-13428">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-13428">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

been set to 4. */
