## <a name="gx_widget_detach"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14510">gx_widget_detach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14510">gx_widget_detach</span></span>
### <a name="detach-widget-from-parent"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14511">親からウィジェットをデタッチする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14511">Detach widget from parent</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14512">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14512">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_detach(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14513">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14513">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14514">このサービスにより、ウィジェットが親からデタッチされます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14514">This service detaches the widget from its parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14515">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14515">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14516">**widget** ウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14516">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14517">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14517">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14518">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ウィジェットのデタッチに成功しました GX_CALLER_ERROR (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14518">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget detach GX_CALLER_ERROR (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14519">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14519">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14520">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14520">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14521">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14521">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14522">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14522">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14523">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14523">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Detach widget “my_widget” from its parent. */
status = gx_widget_detach(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has been detached. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14560">gx_widget_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14560">gx_widget_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14561">ウィジェットを描画する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14561">Draw widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14562">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14562">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14563">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14563">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14564">このサービスによりウィジェットが描画されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14564">This service draws the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14565">通常、この関数は GUIX キャンバスの更新機構によって内部的に呼び出されますが、カスタム描画関数の実装を支援するためにアプリケーションに公開されています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14565">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14566">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14566">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14567">**widget** ウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14567">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14568">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14568">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14569">**なし**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14569">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14570">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14570">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14571">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14571">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14572">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14572">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom widget draw function. */

VOID my_custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
      /* Call default widget draw. */
      gx_widget_draw(widget);

      /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_draw_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14609">gx_widget_draw_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14609">gx_widget_draw_set</span></span>
### <a name="assign-the-widget-drawing-function"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14610">ウィジェット描画関数を割り当てる</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14610">Assign the widget drawing function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14611">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14611">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_draw_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    VOID (*drawing_function) (GX_WIDGET *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14612">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14612">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14613">このサービスにより、ウィジェットのデフォルトの描画関数がオーバーライドされます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14613">This service overrides the default drawing function of the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14614">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14614">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14615">**widget** ウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14615">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14616">**drawing_function** 描画関数へのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14616">**drawing_function** Pointer to drawing function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14617">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14617">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14618">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ウィジェット描画関数のオーバーライドに成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14618">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget drawing function override</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14619">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14619">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14620">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14620">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14621">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14621">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14622">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14622">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14623">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14623">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14624">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14624">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function. */
VOID my_drawing_function(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
      /* Add your own drawing here. */
}

/* Set the drawing function of widget “my_widget” to “my_drawing_function”. */
status = gx_widget_draw_set(&my_widget, my_drawing_function);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has the drawning function “my_drawing_function”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_event_generate"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14661">gx_widget_event_generate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14661">gx_widget_event_generate</span></span>
### <a name="generate-widget-event"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14662">ウィジェット イベントを生成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14662">Generate widget event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14663">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14663">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_generate(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    USHORT event_type, LONG value);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14664">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14664">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14665">このサービスにより、GX_EVENT の特定の型またはクラスである GX_SIGNAL 型のイベントが生成されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14665">This service generates a GX_SIGNAL type of event, which is a particular type or class of GX_EVENT.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14666">gx_widget_event_generate() は、16 ビット ウィジェット ID を、渡された event_type と共に 1 つの 32 ビット GX_EVENT.gx_event_type 値にエンコードします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14666">gx_widget_event_generate() encodes the 16 bit widget ID, along with the passed in event_type, into a single 32 bit GX_EVENT.gx_event_type value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14667">値パラメーターは、生成された gx_event.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14667">The value parameter is encoded into the generated gx_event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14668">gx_event_payload.gx_event_longdata フィールドにエンコードされます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14668">gx_event_payload.gx_event_longdata field.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14669">生成された event.gx_event_target フィールドは、常に呼び出し元のウィジェットの親と共に読み込まれます。つまり、生成されたイベントは常に、生成元のウィジェットの親に対して最初に送信されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14669">The generated event.gx_event_target field is always loaded with the calling widget’s parent, meaning the generated event is always sent first to the parent of the generating widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14670">gx_widget_event_generate は、GX_SIGNAL 範囲のイベントの種類を送信する場合にのみ使用することに注意してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14670">Note that gx_widget_event_generate should only be used to send GX_SIGNAL range event types.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14671">ユーザー定義のイベントの種類など、他のすべてのイベントの種類では、gx_system_event_send() API を使用します。これにより、GUIX イベント キューにプッシュされるイベントのすべてのフィールドに対するフル コントロールが許可されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14671">For all  other event types, including user defined event types, use the gx_system_event_send() API, which grants full control over every field of the event pushed in the GUIX event queue.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14672">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14672">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14673">**widget** ウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14673">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14674">**event_type** イベントの種類。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14674">**event_type** Type of event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14675">**付録 E** には、事前定義済みの GUIX イベントが含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14675">**Appendix E** contains pre-defined GUIX events.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14676">アプリケーションによって追加のイベントが追加される場合があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14676">Additional events may be added by the application.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14677">**value** 追加のイベント情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14677">**value** Additional event information</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14678">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14678">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14679">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ウィジェット イベントの生成に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14679">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget event generation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14680">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14680">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14681">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14681">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>


## <a name="gx_widget_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14723">gx_widget_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14723">gx_widget_event_process</span></span>
### <a name="process-widget-event"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14724">ウィジェット イベントを処理する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14724">Process widget event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14725">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14725">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_process(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14726">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14726">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14727">これは、すべてのウィジェットのデフォルトのイベント処理関数です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14727">This is the default event processing function for all widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14728">カスタム イベント処理関数が記述されている場合、任意のイベントの種類のデフォルト アクションは、常にウィジェットの基になるウィジェットの種類にイベントを渡すことです。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14728">When a custom event processing function is written, the default action for any event type should always be to pass the event to the widget type upon which a widget is based.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14729">最も基本的な GX_WIDGET の種類のパスに基づいたウィジェットは、デフォルトのイベント処理関数として gx_widget_event_process を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14729">Widgets that are based on the most basic GX_WIDGET type pass use gx_widget_event_process as their default event processing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14730">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14730">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14731">**widget** ウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14731">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14732">**event** 処理するイベントへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14732">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14733">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14733">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14734">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ウィジェット イベントの処理に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14734">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget event processing</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14735">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14735">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14736">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14736">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14737">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14737">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14738">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14738">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14739">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14739">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14740">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14740">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Process event “my_event” for widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_event_process(&my_widget, &my_event);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the event “my_event” for widget “my_widget” has been processed. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_event_process_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14777">gx_widget_event_process_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14777">gx_widget_event_process_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-event-processing-function-of-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14778">ウィジェットのイベント処理関数を設定する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14778">Set event processing function of widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14779">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14779">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_process_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    UINT (*event_processing) (GX_WIDGET *, GX_EVENT *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14780">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14780">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14781">このサービスにより、ウィジェットのイベント処理関数がオーバーライドされます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14781">This service overrides the event processing function of the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14782">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14782">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14783">**widget** ウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14783">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14784">**event_processing** 新しいイベント処理関数へのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14784">**event_processing** Pointer to new event processing function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14785">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14785">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14786">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ウィジェット イベント処理のオーバーライドに成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14786">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget event processing override</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14787">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14787">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14788">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14788">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14789">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14789">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14790">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14790">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14791">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14791">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT my_event_process(GX_TREE_VIEW *tree_view,
                      GX_EVENT *event)
{
      UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

      switch(event->gx_event_type)
      {
      case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;

      default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default tree view
               event processing */
            status = gx_tree_view_event_process(tree_view, event);
            break;
      }
      return status;
}

/* Use “my_event_process” to process events for widget “my_tree_view”. */
status = gx_widget_event_process_set((GX_WIDGET *)&my_tree_view,
                    (VOID (*)(GX_WIDGET *))my_event_process);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS all event processing for widget “my_tree_view” is handled by “my_event_process”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_event_to_parent"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14828">gx_widget_event_to_parent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14828">gx_widget_event_to_parent</span></span>
### <a name="send-event-to-widgets-parent"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14829">ウィジェットの親にイベントを送信する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14829">Send event to widget’s parent</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14830">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14830">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_to_parent(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14831">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14831">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14832">このサービスにより、ウィジェットの親にイベントが送信されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14832">This service sends an event to the widget’s parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14833">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14833">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14834">**widget** ウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14834">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14835">**event** イベントへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14835">**event** Pointer to the event</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14836">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14836">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14837">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ウィジェットの親にイベントが送信されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14837">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully sent event to widget’s parent</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14838">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14838">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14839">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14839">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14840">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14840">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14841">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14841">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14842">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14842">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Send my_event to the widget’s parent */
status = gx_widget_event_to_parent(&my_widget, my_event);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the event has been delivered to the parent of my_widget. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14879">gx_widget_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14879">gx_widget_fill_color_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-widget-background-color"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14880">ウィジェットの背景色を設定する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14880">Set widget background color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14881">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14881">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_fill_color_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_color_id);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14882">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14882">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14883">このサービスにより、ウィジェットの背景色が設定されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14883">This service sets the widget background colors.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14884">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14884">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14885">**widget** ウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14885">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14886">**normal_color_id** 通常状態の塗りつぶしの色のリソース ID。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14886">**normal_color_id** Resource ID of the fill color in normal state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14887">**付録 A** には、事前定義済みの色リソース ID が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14887">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14888">アプリケーションでは、カスタムの色リソース ID も追加できることに注意してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14888">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14889">**selected_color_id** ウィジェットがフォーカスを得るときの塗りつぶしの色のリソース ID。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14889">**selected_color_id** Resource ID of the fill color when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14890">**付録 A** には、事前定義済みの色リソース ID が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14890">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14891">アプリケーションでは、カスタムの色リソース ID も追加できることに注意してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14891">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14892">**disabled_color_id** スタイル GX_STYLE_ENABLED が設定されていない場合の塗りつぶしの色のリソース ID。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14892">**disabled_color_id** Resource ID of the fill color when the style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14893">**付録 A** には、事前定義済みの色リソース ID が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14893">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14894">なお、アプリケーションでカスタムの色のリソース ID を追加することもできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14894">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14895">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14895">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14896">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ウィジェットの塗りつぶしの色が設定されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14896">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set widget fill color</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14897">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14897">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14898">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14898">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14899">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14899">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14900">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14900">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14901">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14901">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14902">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14902">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set background of “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_fill_color_set(&my_widget,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_FILL);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” background has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14939">gx_widget_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14939">gx_widget_find</span></span>
### <a name="find-child-widget-of-parent-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14940">親ウィジェットの子ウィジェットを検索する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14940">Find child widget of parent widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14941">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14941">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_find(
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    USHORT widget_id,
    INT search_depth, 
    GX_WIDGET **return_widget);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14942">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14942">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14943">このサービスにより、指定された親の子の中から、要求された ID 値を持つウィジェットが検索されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14943">This service searches through the children of the specified parent looking for a widget with the  requested ID value.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14944">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14944">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14945">**parent** 検索を開始する親ウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14945">**parent** Pointer to parent widget from which search is started</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14946">**widget_id** 検索するウィジェット ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14946">**widget_id** Widget ID to search for</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14947">**search_depth** 関数が子ウィジェットを検索する再帰的な入れ子レベルを定義します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14947">**search_depth** Defines the recursive nesting level into which the function will search child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14948">この値が 0 以下の場合は、親ウィジェットのすぐ下の子だけが検索されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14948">If this value is <= 0, only immediate children of the parent widget are searched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14949">この値が GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE 場合は、すべての子ウィジェットのすべての子が徹底的に検索されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14949">If this value is GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE, all children of all child widgets are exhaustively searched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14950">0 を超えるその他の値の場合には、この値によって、この関数が要求されたウィジェット ID を探し、入れ子になった子ウィジェットを検索するレベルが制限されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14950">For any other value > 0, this value limits how deeply nested this function will search through child widgets looked for the requested widget ID.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14951">**return_widget** 見つかったウィジェットの宛先へのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14951">**return_widget** Pointer to destination for found widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14952">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14952">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14953">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ウィジェットの検索に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14953">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget find</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14954">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) ウィジェットが見つかりませんでした</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14954">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) Widget not fount</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14955">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14955">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14956">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14956">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14957">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14957">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14958">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14958">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14959">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14959">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET *widget_found;

/* Find widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_find(&my_widget, GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE
                        MY_WIDGET_ID, &widget_found);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pointer “widget_found” contains the pointer to the widget found. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14990">gx_widget_status_test</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14990">gx_widget_status_test</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14991">gx_widget_style_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14991">gx_widget_style_add</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14993">gx_widget_style_remove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14993">gx_widget_style_remove</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_first_child_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14996">gx_widget_first_child_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14996">gx_widget_first_child_get</span></span>
### <a name="return-pointer-to-first-child-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14997">最初の子ウィジェットへのポインターを返す</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14997">Return pointer to first child widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14998">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14998">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_first_child_get(
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_WIDGET **widget_return);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-14999">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-14999">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15000">GUIX により、親と子のウィジェットのツリー構造リストが保持されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15000">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15001">このサービスにより、親の最初の子ウィジェットへのポインターが返されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15001">This service returns a pointer to the first child widget of the parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15002">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15002">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15003">**parent** 親ウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15003">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15004">**widget_return** リターン ウィジェット ポインターへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15004">**widget_return** Pointer to return widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15005">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15005">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15006">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ポインターが返されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15006">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15007">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ウィジェット ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15007">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15008">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15008">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15009">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15009">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15010">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15010">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15011">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15011">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve child widget pointer. */

GX_WIDGET *get_child_widget(GX_WIDGET *parent)
{
      GX_WIDGET *child;
      UINT status;

      status = gx_widget_first_child_get(parent, &child);
      if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
      {
            return child;
      }
      return GX_NULL;
}
```
### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15012">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15012">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15013">gx_widget_last_child_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15013">gx_widget_last_child_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15014">gx_widget_next_sibling_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15014">gx_widget_next_sibling_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15015">gx_widget_parent_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15015">gx_widget_parent_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15016">gx_widget_previous_sibling_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15016">gx_widget_previous_sibling_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15017">gx_widget_top_visible_child_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15017">gx_widget_top_visible_child_find</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_focus_next"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15018">gx_widget_focus_next</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15018">gx_widget_focus_next</span></span>
### <a name="move-focus-to-next-widget-in-navigation-order"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15019">ナビゲーション順で次のウィジェットにフォーカスを移動する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15019">Move focus to next widget in navigation order</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15020">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15020">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_focus_next(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15021">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15021">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15022">このサービスにより、フォーカスを受け入れるウィジェットのリンク リスト内の次の兄弟ウィジェットにフォーカスが移動されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15022">This service moves focus to the next sibling widget in the linked list of widgets that accept focus.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15023">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15023">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15024">**widget** ウィジェット コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15024">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15025">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15025">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15026">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) フォーカスが移動されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15026">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) focus was moved</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15027">**GX_FAILURE** (0x00) フォーカスが移動されませんでした</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15027">**GX_FAILURE** (0x00) focus was not moved</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15028">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ウィジェット ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15028">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15029">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15029">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15030">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15030">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15031">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15031">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15032">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15032">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15033">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15033">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move focus to next widget in navigation order. */ status =
gx_widget_focus_next(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the focus has been moved to the next
widget in the navigation order */
```
### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15034">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15034">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15035">gx_widget_focus_previous</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15035">gx_widget_focus_previous</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_focus_previous"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15036">gx_widget_focus_previous</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15036">gx_widget_focus_previous</span></span>
### <a name="move-focus-to-previous-widget-in-navigation-order"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15037">ナビゲーション順で前のウィジェットにフォーカスを移動する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15037">Move focus to previous widget in navigation order</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15038">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15038">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_focus_previous(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15039">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15039">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15040">このサービスにより、ナビゲーション順で前のウィジェットにフォーカスが移動されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15040">This service moves focus to the previous widget in the navigation order.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15041">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15041">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15042">**widget** 現在の入力フォーカスがあるウィジェットへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15042">**widget** Pointer to widget that current has input focus.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15043">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15043">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15044">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) フォーカスが移動されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15044">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) focus was moved</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15045">**GX_FAILURE** (0x00) フォーカスが移動されませんでした</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15045">**GX_FAILURE** (0x00) focus was not moved</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15046">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15046">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15047">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15047">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15048">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15048">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move focus to previuos widget in navigation order. */ status =
gx_widget_focus_previous(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the input focus has been moved to the
previous widget. */
```
### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15049">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15049">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15050">gx_widget_focus_next</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15050">gx_widget_focus_next</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_font_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15051">gx_widget_font_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15051">gx_widget_font_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-font-for-specified-resource-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15052">指定されたリソース ID のフォントを取得する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15052">Get font for specified resource ID</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15053">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15053">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_font_get(
    GX_WIDGETG *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID resource_id,
    GX_FONT **return_font);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15054">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15054">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15055">このサービスにより、このウィジェットが表示されている表示のフォント テーブルから、指定されたリソース ID に関連付けられているフォントが取得されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15055">This service retrieves the font associated with the specified resource ID from the font table of the display on which this widget is visible.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15056">この関数は、表示可能なウィジェットによってのみ呼び出してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15056">This function should only be called by a visible widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15057">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15057">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15058">**widget** ウィジェット コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15058">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15059">**resource_id** フォントのリソース ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15059">**resource_id** Resource ID of font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15060">**return_font** フォント ポインターの宛先へのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15060">**return_font** Pointer to destination for font pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15061">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15061">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15062">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) フォントの取得に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15062">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15063">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) リソース ID が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15063">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15064">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) ウィジェット キャンバスが無効であるか、ウィジェットが非表示です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15064">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget canvas not valid or widget is invisible</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15065">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ウィジェット ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15065">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15066">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15066">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15067">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15067">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15068">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15068">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15069">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15069">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_FONT *my_font;
/* Get font for MY_FONT_ID. */
status = gx_widget_font_get(widget, MY_FONT_RESOURCE_ID, &my_font);
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the font pointer has been retrieved in “my_font”. */
```
### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15070">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15070">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15071">gx_widget_color_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15071">gx_widget_color_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15072">gx_widget_pixelmap_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15072">gx_widget_pixelmap_get</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_free"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15073">gx_widget_free</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15073">gx_widget_free</span></span>
### <a name="release-memory-associated-with-a-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15074">ウィジェットに関連付けられているメモリを解放する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15074">Release memory associated with a widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15075">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15075">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_free(GX_WIDGETG *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15076">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15076">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15077">このサービスによって、ウィジェット コントロール ブロックに関連付けられているメモリが解放されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15077">This service releases the memory associated with a widget control block.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15078">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15078">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15079">**widget** ウィジェット コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15079">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15080">**resource_id** フォントのリソース ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15080">**resource_id** Resource ID of font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15081">**return_font** フォント ポインターの宛先へのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15081">**return_font** Pointer to destination for font pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15082">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15082">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15083">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ウィジェットの解放に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15083">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully freed widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15084">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR** (0x30) メモリ解放関数が定義されていません</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15084">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory free function is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15085">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ウィジェット ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15085">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15086">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15086">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15087">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15087">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15088">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15088">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET widget;
UINT status;

status = gx_widget_allocate(&widget, sizeof(GX_WIDGET))

/* Free a runtime allocated widget. */
if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
{
      status = gx_widget_free(widget);
}

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the memory that allocated to the widget has been released. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_front_move"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15125">gx_widget_front_move</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15125">gx_widget_front_move</span></span>
### <a name="move-widget-to-front"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15126">ウィジェットを前面へ移動する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15126">Move widget to front</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15127">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15127">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_front_move(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_BOOL *return_moved);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15128">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15128">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15129">このサービスにより、ウィジェットが、子ウィジェットの親 Z 順序リストの先頭に移動されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15129">This service moves the widget to the front in the parent Z-order list of child widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15130">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15130">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15131">**widget** 移動するウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15131">**widget** Pointer to widget to move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15132">**return_moved** 指示ウィジェットの移動先へのポインターが移動されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15132">**return_moved** Pointer to destination for indication widget was moved</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15133">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15133">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15134">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ウィジェットの前面への移動に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15134">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget move to front</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15135">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15135">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15136">**GX_NO_CHANGE** (0x08) ウィジェットが既に前面にあります</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15136">**GX_NO_CHANGE** (0x08) Widget already in front</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15137">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15137">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15138">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15138">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15139">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15139">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15140">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15140">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15141">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15141">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL widget_moved;

/* Move widget “my_widget” to the front. */
status = gx_widget_front_move(&my_widget, &widget_moved);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS and “widget_moved” is GX_TRUE, the
widget “my_widget” was moved to the front . */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_height_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15178">gx_widget_height_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15178">gx_widget_height_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-height"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15179">ウィジェットの高さを取得する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15179">Get widget height</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15180">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15180">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_height_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    UINT *return_height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15181">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15181">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15182">このサービスにより、ウィジェットの高さが取得されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15182">This service gets the widget height.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15183">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15183">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15184">**widget** ウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15184">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15185">**return_height** ウィジェットの高さの描画先へのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15185">**return_height** Pointer to destination for widget height</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15186">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15186">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15187">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ウィジェットの高さの取得に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15187">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget height get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15188">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15188">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15189">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15189">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15190">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15190">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15191">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15191">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* Get height for widget “my_widget”. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the height of the widget is contained in
“widget_height” . */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_hide"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15230">gx_widget_hide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15230">gx_widget_hide</span></span>
### <a name="hide-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15231">ウィジェットを非表示にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15231">Hide widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15232">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15232">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_hide(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15233">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15233">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15234">このサービスにより、ウィジェットが非表示になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15234">This service hides the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15235">このウィジェットは親にアタッチされたままですが、キャンバス上に描画することはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15235">This widget is still attached to it's parent, but it is not allowed to draw on the canvas.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15236">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15236">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15237">**widget** ウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15237">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15238">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15238">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15239">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ウィジェットの非表示に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15239">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget hide</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15240">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15240">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15241">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15241">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15242">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15242">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15243">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15243">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15244">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15244">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15245">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15245">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Hide widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_hide(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” is hidden. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_last_child_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15282">gx_widget_last_child_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15282">gx_widget_last_child_get</span></span>
### <a name="return-pointer-to-last-child-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15283">最後の子ウィジェットへのポインターを返す</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15283">Return pointer to last child widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15284">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15284">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_last_child_get(
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_WIDGET **widget_return);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15285">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15285">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15286">GUIX は、親と子のウィジェットのツリー構造のリストを保持します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15286">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15287">このサービスにより、親の最後の子ウィジェットへのポインターが返されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15287">This service returns a pointer to the last child widget of the parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15288">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15288">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15289">**parent** 親ウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15289">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15290">**widget_return** リターン ウィジェット ポインターへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15290">**widget_return** Pointer to return widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15291">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15291">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15292">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ポインターが返されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15292">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15293">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ウィジェット ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15293">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15294">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15294">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15295">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15295">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15296">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15296">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15297">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15297">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve child widget pointer. */

GX_WIDGET *get_last_child_widget(GX_WIDGET *parent)
{

      GX_WIDGET *child;
      UINT status;

      status = gx_widget_last_child_get(parent, &child);
      if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
      {
              return child;
      }
      return GX_NULL;
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_next_sibling_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15304">gx_widget_next_sibling_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15304">gx_widget_next_sibling_get</span></span>
### <a name="return-pointer-to-next-sibling-of-current-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15305">現在のウィジェットの次の兄弟へのポインターを返す</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15305">Return pointer to next sibling of current widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15306">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15306">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_next_sibling_get(
    GX_WIDGET *current,
    GX_WIDGET **widget_return);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15307">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15307">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15308">GUIX により、親と子のウィジェットのツリー構造リストが保持されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15308">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15309">このサービスにより、現在のウィジェットの次の兄弟へのポインターが返されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15309">This service returns a pointer to the next sibling of the current widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15310">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15310">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15311">**current** 現在のウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15311">**current** Pointer to current widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15312">**widget_return** リターン ウィジェット ポインターへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15312">**widget_return** Pointer to return widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15313">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15313">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15314">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ポインターが返されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15314">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15315">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ウィジェット ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15315">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15316">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15316">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15317">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15317">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15318">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15318">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15319">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15319">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve next sibling widget pointer. */

GX_WIDGET *get_next(GX_WIDGET *current)
{
      GX_WIDGET *sibling;
      UINT status;

      status = gx_widget_next_sibling_get(current, &sibling);
      if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
      {
            return sibling;
      }
      return GX_NULL;
}
```

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15324">gx_widget_previous_sibling_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15324">gx_widget_previous_sibling_get</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15337">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ウィジェット ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15337">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_pixelmap_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15348">gx_widget_pixelmap_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15348">gx_widget_pixelmap_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-pixelmap"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15349">ピクセルマップを取得する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15349">Get pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15350">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15350">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_pixelmap_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID resource_id,
    GX_PIXELMAP **return_pixelmap);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15351">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15351">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15352">このサービスにより、指定されたリソース ID に関連付けられているピクセルマップが取得されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15352">This service gets the pixelmap associated with the supplied resource ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15353">このサービスは、表示可能なウィジェットでのみ呼び出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15353">This service should only be called for visible widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15354">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15354">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15355">**widget** ウィジェット コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15355">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15356">**pixelmap_id** ピクセルマップのリソース ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15356">**pixelmap_id** Pixelmap resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15357">**return_pixelmap** ピクセルマップの宛先ポインターへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15357">**return_pixelmap** Pointer to pixelmap destination pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15358">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15358">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15359">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ピクセルマップの取得に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15359">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15360">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) リソース ID が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15360">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15361">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) ウィジェット キャンバスが無効であるか、ウィジェットが非表示です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15361">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget canvas not valid or widget is invisible</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15362">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15362">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15363">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15363">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15364">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15364">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15365">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15365">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15366">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15366">Example</span></span>

```c
GX_PIXELMAP *my_pixelmap;

/* Get the pixelmap associated with MY_PIXELMAP_ID. */
status = gx_widget_pixelmap_get(widget, MY_PIXELMAP_RESOURCE_ID,
                                &my_pixelmap);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_pixelmap” contains the pixemap pointer. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_resize"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15392">gx_widget_resize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15392">gx_widget_resize</span></span>
### <a name="resize-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15393">ウィジェットのサイズを変更する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15393">Resize widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15394">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15394">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_resize(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_RECTANGLE *new_size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15395">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15395">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15396">このサービスにより、ウィジェットのサイズが変更されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15396">This service resizes the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15397">ウィジェットが表示されている場合は、自動的に無効になり、再描画のためにキューに入れられます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15397">If the widget is visible, it is automatically invalidated and queued for redrawing.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15398">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15398">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15399">**widget** ウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15399">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15400">**new_size** 新しいウィジェットのサイズ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15400">**new_size** New widget size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15401">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15401">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15402">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ウィジェットのサイズ変更に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15402">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget resize</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15403">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15403">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15404">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15404">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15405">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15405">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15406">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15406">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15407">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15407">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15408">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15408">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RECTANGLE new_size;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&new_size, 0, 0, 100, 100);

/* Resize widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_resize(&my_widget, &new_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has been resized. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_shift"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15445">gx_widget_shift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15445">gx_widget_shift</span></span>
### <a name="shift-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15446">ウィジェットをシフトする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15446">Shift widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15447">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15447">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_shift(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_VALUE x_shift,
    GX_VALUE y_shift, 
    GX_BOOL mark_dirty);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15448">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15448">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15449">このサービスによりウィジェットがシフトされ、必要に応じてダーティとしてマークされます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15449">This service shifts the widget and optionally marks it as dirty.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15450">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15450">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15451">**widget** ウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15451">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15452">**x_shift** X 軸でシフトするピクセル数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15452">**x_shift** Number of pixels to shift on x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15453">**y_shift** Y 軸でシフトするピクセル数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15453">**y_shift** Number of pixels to shift on y-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15454">**mark_dirty** ダーティとして示す場合には GX_TRUE、それ以外の場合は GX_FALSE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15454">**mark_dirty** GX_TRUE to indicate dirty, otherwise GX_FALSE</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15455">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15455">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15456">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ウィジェットのシフトに成功しました GX_CALLER_ERROR (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15456">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget shift GX_CALLER_ERROR (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15457">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15457">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15458">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15458">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15459">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15459">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15460">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15460">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15461">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15461">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Shift widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_shift(&my_widget, 10, 20, GX_FALSE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has been shifted. */
```
