## <a name="gx_widget_show"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15498">gx_widget_show</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15498">gx_widget_show</span></span>
### <a name="show-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15499">ウィジェットを表示する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15499">Show widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15500">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15500">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_show(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15501">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15501">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15502">このサービスによりウィジェットが表示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15502">This service shows the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15503">ウィジェットは親にアタッチされていて、親ウィジェットも表示される場合にのみ表示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15503">The widget will become visible only if it is attached to a parent and the parent widget is also visible.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15504">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15504">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15505">**widget** ウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15505">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15506">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15506">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15507">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ウィジェットの表示に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15507">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget show</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15508">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15508">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15509">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15509">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15510">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15510">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15511">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15511">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15512">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15512">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15513">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15513">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Show widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_show(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has been shown. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_status_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15550">gx_widget_status_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15550">gx_widget_status_add</span></span>
### <a name="add-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15551">ウィジェットの状態を追加する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15551">Add widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15552">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15552">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_add(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG status)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15553">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15553">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15554">このサービスにより、指定されたウィジェットに状態フラグの任意の組み合わせが追加されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15554">This service adds any combination of status flags to the specified widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15555">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15555">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15556">**widget** ウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15556">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15557">**status** 追加する状態</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15557">**status** Status to add</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15558">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15558">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15559">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ウィジェットの状態の追加に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15559">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status add</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15560">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15560">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15561">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15561">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15562">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15562">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15563">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15563">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15564">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15564">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Add status to widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_status_add(&my_widget, status_to_add);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” status was. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_status_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15601">gx_widget_status_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15601">gx_widget_status_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15602">ウィジェットの状態を取得する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15602">Get widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15603">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15603">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    ULONG *return_status)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15604">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15604">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15605">このサービスにより、ウィジェットから状態フラグが取得されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15605">This service retrieves status flags from the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15606">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15606">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15607">**widget** ウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15607">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15608">**return_status** 返される状態へのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15608">**return_status** Pointer to the status being returned</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15609">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15609">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15610">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ウィジェットの状態の取得に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15610">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15611">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15611">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15612">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15612">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15613">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15613">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15614">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15614">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15615">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15615">Example</span></span>

```C
ULONT get_status;

/* Retrieve status flag from widget “my_widget”. */ status =
gx_widget_status_get(&my_widget, &get_status);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the status from widget “my_widget” is
saved to “get_status”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_status_remove"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15651">gx_widget_status_remove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15651">gx_widget_status_remove</span></span>
### <a name="remove-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15652">ウィジェットの状態を削除する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15652">Remove widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15653">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15653">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_remove(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG status)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15654">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15654">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15655">このサービスにより、ウィジェットの内部状態変数から、指定された状態フラグが削除されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15655">This service removes the specified status flags from the widgets internal status variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15656">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15656">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15657">**widget** ウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15657">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15658">**status** 削除する状態</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15658">**status** Status to remove</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15659">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15659">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15660">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ウィジェットの状態の削除に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15660">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status removal</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15661">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15661">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15662">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15662">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15663">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15663">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15664">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15664">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15665">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15665">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Remove status of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_status_remove(&my_widget, status_to_remove);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the status flags are removed from the
widget “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_status_test"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15702">gx_widget_status_test</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15702">gx_widget_status_test</span></span>
### <a name="test-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15703">ウィジェットの状態をテストする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15703">Test widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15704">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15704">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_test(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG status,
    GX_BOOL *return_test);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15705">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15705">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15706">このサービスにより、指定されたウィジェットの状態フラグがテストされ、結果が「return_test」で示されるメモリに格納されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15706">This service tests the status flags of the specified widget and stores the result in the memory pointed by “return_test”.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15707">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15707">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15708">**widget** ウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15708">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15709">**status** テストする状態</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15709">**status** Status to test</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15710">**return_status** テスト結果の格納先へのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15710">**return_status** Pointer to destination for result of test</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15711">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15711">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15712">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ウィジェットの状態テストに成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15712">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status test</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15713">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15713">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15714">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15714">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15715">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15715">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15716">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15716">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15717">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15717">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL test_result;

/* Test status of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_status_test(&my_widget, status_to_test,
                              &test_result);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” status was tested
and the result in “test_result”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_string_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15726">gx_widget_string_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15726">gx_widget_string_get</span></span>
### <a name="retrieve-string-associated-with-a-visible-widget-and-string-id-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15727">表示されているウィジェットと文字列 ID に関連付けられた文字列を取得する (非推奨)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15727">Retrieve string associated with a visible widget and string ID (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15728">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15728">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_string_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR **string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15729">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15729">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15730">このサービスは非推奨です。gx_widget_string_get_ext() を使用してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15730">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_widget_string_get_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15731">このサービスにより、指定された文字列 ID 値に対応する文字列テーブルのエントリが返されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15731">This service returns the string table entry for the given string ID value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15732">このサービスは gx_display_string_get に似ていますが、アクティブな表示が呼び出し元によって渡されるのではなく、自動的に決定される点が異なります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15732">This service is similar to gx_display_string_get, except the active display is determined automatically rather than being passed in by the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15733">このサービスは、表示されているウィジェットに対してのみ使用できます (このウィジェットに関連付けられている表示がわかっている)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15733">This service can only be used for widgets which are visible, i.e. the display associated with this widget is known.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15734">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15734">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15735">**widget** ウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15735">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15736">**string_id** リソース ヘッダーからの文字列 ID 値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15736">**string_id** String ID value from resources header</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15737">**string** 文字列を返す変数のアドレス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15737">**string** Address of variable to return string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15738">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15738">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15739">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ウィジェットの状態テストに成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15739">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status test</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15740">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15740">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15741">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15741">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15742">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15742">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15743">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15743">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15744">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15744">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CONST GX_CHAR *string;

/* Test status of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_string_get(&my_widget, GX_STRING_ID_SHUTDOWN,
      &string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string has been retrieved */
```
### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15745">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15745">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15746">gx_display_string_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15746">gx_display_string_get</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_string_get_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15748">gx_widget_string_get_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15748">gx_widget_string_get_ext</span></span>
### <a name="retrieve-string-associated-with-a-visible-widget-and-string-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15749">表示されているウィジェットと文字列 ID に関連付けられた文字列を取得する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15749">Retrieve string associated with a visible widget and string ID</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15750">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15750">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_string_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id,
    GX_CONST GX_STRING *string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15751">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15751">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15752">このサービスにより、指定された文字列 ID 値に対応する文字列テーブルのエントリが返されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15752">This service returns the string table entry for the given string ID value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15753">このサービスは gx_display_string_get に似ていますが、アクティブな表示が呼び出し元によって渡されるのではなく、自動的に決定される点が異なります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15753">This service is similar to gx_display_string_get, except the active display is determined automatically rather than being passed in by the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15754">このサービスは、表示されているウィジェットに対してのみ使用できます (このウィジェットに関連付けられている表示がわかっている)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15754">This service can only be used for widgets which are visible, i.e. the display associated with this widget is known.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15755">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15755">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15756">**widget** ウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15756">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15757">**string_id** リソース ヘッダーからの文字列 ID 値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15757">**string_id** String ID value from resources header</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15758">**string** 文字列を返す変数のアドレス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15758">**string** Address of variable to return string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15759">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15759">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15760">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ウィジェットの状態テストに成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15760">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status test</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15761">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15761">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15762">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15762">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15763">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15763">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15764">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15764">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15765">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15765">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_STRING string;

/* Test status of widget “my_widget”. */

status = gx_widget_string_get_ext(&my_widget,
                          GX_STRING_ID_SHUTDOWN, &string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string has been retrieved */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15766">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15766">See Also</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_style_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15769">gx_widget_style_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15769">gx_widget_style_add</span></span>
### <a name="add-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15770">ウィジェットのスタイルを追加する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15770">Add widget style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15771">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15771">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_style_add(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15772">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15772">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15773">このサービスにより、ウィジェットにスタイルが追加されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15773">This service adds a style to the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15774">さらに、次のアクションが実行されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15774">In addition, the following actions are taken.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15775">追加されたスタイルが GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT の場合は、状態 GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT が追加されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15775">If the added style is GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, status GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT will be added.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15776">追加されたスタイルが GX_STYLE_ENABLED の場合は、状態 GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE が追加されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15776">If the added style is GX_STYLE_ENABLED, status GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE will be added.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15777">ウィジェットが表示されている場合は、自動的に無効になり、再描画のためにキューに入れられます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15777">If the widget is visible, it is automatically invalidated and queued for redrawing.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15778">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15778">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15779">**widget** ウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15779">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15780">**style** 追加する新しいスタイル。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15780">**style** New style to add.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15781">**付録 D** には、ウィジェット固有のスタイルだけでなく、すべてのウィジェット用に事前に定義された一般的なスタイルが含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15781">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15782">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15782">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15783">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ウィジェット スタイルの追加に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15783">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget style add</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15784">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15784">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15785">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15785">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15786">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15786">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15787">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15787">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15788">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15788">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15789">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15789">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Add style to widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_style_add(&my_widget, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the style was successfully applied to the widget “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_style_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15826">gx_widget_style_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15826">gx_widget_style_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15827">ウイジェットのスタイルを取得する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15827">Get widget style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15828">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15828">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_style_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG *return_style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15829">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15829">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15830">このサービスにより、ウィジェットからスタイル フラグが取得されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15830">This service retrieves style flag from the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15831">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15831">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15832">**widget** ウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15832">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15833">**return_style** 返されるスタイルへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15833">**return_style** Pointer to the style being returned.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15834">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15834">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15835">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ウィジェット スタイルの取得に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15835">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved widget style</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15836">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15836">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15837">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15837">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15838">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15838">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15839">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15839">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15840">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15840">Initialization and threads</span></span>


### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15841">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15841">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve style from widget into “style”. */
status = gx_widget_style_get(&my_widget, &style);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the style flag from widget is saved in “style”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_style_remove"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15878">gx_widget_style_remove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15878">gx_widget_style_remove</span></span>
### <a name="remove-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15879">ウィジェットのスタイルを削除する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15879">Remove widget style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15880">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15880">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_style_remove(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15881">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15881">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15882">このサービスにより、ウィジェットからスタイルが削除されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15882">This service removes a style from the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15883">さらに、次のアクションが実行されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15883">In addition, the following actions are taken.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15884">削除されたスタイルが GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT の場合は、状態 GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT が削除されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15884">If the removed style is GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, status GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15885">削除されたスタイルが GX_STYLE_ENABLED の場合は、状態 GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE が削除されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15885">If the removed style is GX_STYLE_ENABLED, status GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15886">ウィジェットが表示されている場合は、自動的に無効になり、再描画のためにキューに入れられます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15886">If the widget is visible, it is automatically invalidated and queued for redrawing.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15887">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15887">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15888">**widget** ウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15888">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15889">**style** 削除するスタイル。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15889">**style** Style to remove.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15890">**付録 D** には、ウィジェット固有のスタイルだけでなく、すべてのウィジェット用に事前に定義された一般的なスタイルが含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15890">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15891">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15891">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15892">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ウィジェット スタイルの削除に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15892">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget style remove</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15893">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15893">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15894">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15894">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15895">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15895">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15896">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15896">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15897">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15897">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15898">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15898">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Remove style from widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_style_remove(&my_widget,
                                GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED style was removed from the widget “my_widget”.*/
```

## <a name="gx_widget_style_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15935">gx_widget_style_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15935">gx_widget_style_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15936">ウイジェットのスタイルを設定する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15936">Set widget style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15937">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15937">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_style_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15938">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15938">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15939">このサービスにより、ウィジェットにスタイルが設定されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15939">This service sets a style to the widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15940">設定されたスタイルに GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT が含まれている場合は、状態 GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT が追加されます。それ以外の場合は、状態が削除されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15940">If the set style includes GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, status GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT will be added, otherwise the status will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15941">設定されたスタイルに GX_STYLE_ENABLED が含まれている場合は、状態 GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE が追加されます。それ以外の場合は、状態が削除されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15941">If the set style includes GX_STYLE_ENABLED, status GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE will be added, otherwise the status will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15942">ウィジェットが表示されている場合は、自動的に無効になり、再描画のためにキューに入れられます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15942">If the widget is visible, it is automatically invalidated and queued for redrawing.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15943">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15943">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15944">**widget** ウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15944">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15945">**style** 設定するスタイル。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15945">**style** Style to set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15946">**付録 D** には、ウィジェット固有のスタイルだけでなく、すべてのウィジェット用に事前に定義された一般的なスタイルが含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15946">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15947">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15947">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15948">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ウィジェット スタイルの設定に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15948">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget style set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15949">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15949">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15950">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15950">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15951">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15951">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15952">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15952">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15953">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15953">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15954">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15954">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set style GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT to the widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_style_set(&my_widget, GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” style is set to GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_text_blend"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15991">gx_widget_text_blend</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15991">gx_widget_text_blend</span></span>
### <a name="blend-text-assigned-to-widget-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15992">割り当てられたテキストをウィジェットに合成する (非推奨)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15992">Blend text assigned to widget (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15993">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15993">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_text_blend(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    UINT *tColor,
    UINT font_id, 
    GX_CHAR *string,
    INT x_offset, 
    INT y_offset, 
    UCHAR alpha)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15994">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15994">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15995">このサービスは非推奨です。gx_widget_text_blend_ext() を使用してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15995">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_widget_text_blend_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15996">このサービスにより、現在のブラシとテキストの配置が使用され、ウィジェット上に指定されたテキストが合成されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15996">This service blends the specified text over a widget using current brush and text alignment.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15997">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15997">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15998">**widget** ウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15998">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-15999">**tColor** テキストの色</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-15999">**tColor** Text color</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16000">**font_id** フォント ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16000">**font_id** Font Id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16001">**string** 描画文字列</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16001">**string** Drawing string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16002">**x_offset** 描画位置の調整</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16002">**x_offset** Drawing position adjustment</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16003">**x_offset** 描画位置の調整</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16003">**y_offset** Drawing position adjustment</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16004">**alpha** 0 から 255 のブレンド値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16004">**alpha** Blending value 0-255</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16005">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16005">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16006">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ウィジェット幅の取得に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16006">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget width get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16007">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16007">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16008">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16008">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16009">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16009">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16010">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) 文字列の長さが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16010">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16011">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16011">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16012">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16012">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16013">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16013">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Blend “my_string” over “my_widget” given alpha value 120. */
status = gx_widget_text_blend(&my_widget, my_text_color, my_font_id,
                              &my_string, xoffset, yoffset, 120);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS “my_string” has been blend to “my_widget”. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16014">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16014">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16015">gx_widget_text_blend_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16015">gx_widget_text_blend_ext</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_text_blend_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16016">gx_widget_text_blend_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16016">gx_widget_text_blend_ext</span></span>
### <a name="blend-text-assigned-to-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16017">割り当てられたテキストをウィジェットに合成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16017">Blend text assigned to widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16018">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16018">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_text_blend(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    UINT *tColor,
    UINT font_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_STRING *string,
    INT x_offset, 
    INT y_offset, 
    UCHAR alpha)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16019">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16019">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16020">このサービスは非推奨です。gx_widget_text_blend_ext() を使用してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16020">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_widget_text_blend_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16021">このサービスにより、現在のブラシとテキストの配置、指定された色、フォント、および x、y オフセットを使用して、指定されたウィジェット上に文字列が表示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16021">This service renders a string over the specified widget using the current brush and text alignment and specified color, font, and x,y offset.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16022">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16022">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16023">**widget** ウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16023">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16024">**tColor** テキストの色</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16024">**tColor** Text color</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16025">**font_id** フォント ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16025">**font_id** Font Id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16026">**string** 描画文字列</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16026">**string** Drawing string</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16029">**alpha** 0 から 255 のブレンド値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16029">**alpha** Blending value 0-255</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16030">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16030">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16032">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16032">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16038">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16038">Example</span></span>

```C
gx_string render_string;
render_string.gx_string_ptr = “Hello”;
render_string.gx_string_length =
    strlen(render_string.gx_string_ptr);

/* Blend “my_string” over “my_widget” given alpha value 120. */
status = gx_widget_text_blend_ext(&my_widget,
        my_text_color,
        my_font_id,
        &render_string, xoffset, yoffset, 120);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS “my_string” has been blend to “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16041">gx_widget_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16041">gx_widget_text_draw</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16051">**string** 描画文字列</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16051">**string** Drawing string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16052">**x_offset** 描画位置の調整</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16052">**x_offset** Drawing position adjustment</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16053">**x_offset** 描画位置の調整</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16053">**y_offset** Drawing position adjustment</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom widget draw function. */

VOID my_custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
    /* Add your own background raw here. */

    gx_widget_text_draw(widget, my_text_color, my_font_id
                        &my_string, xoffset, yoffset);
}
```

### <a name="draw-text-assigned-to-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16083">割り当てられたテキストをウィジェットに描画する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16083">Draw text assigned to widget</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_top_visible_child_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16102">gx_widget_top_visible_child_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16102">gx_widget_top_visible_child_find</span></span>
### <a name="return-pointer-to-visible-child-that-is-top-of-z-order"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16103">Z 順序の最上位にある表示された子へのポインターを返す</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16103">Return pointer to visible child that is top of Z order</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16104">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16104">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_top_visible_child_find(
    GX_WIDGET *current,
    GX_WIDGET **widget_return);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16105">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16105">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16106">GUIX は、親と子のウィジェットのツリー構造のリストを保持します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16106">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16107">このサービスにより、現在のウィジェットの最上位の表示された子へのポインターが返されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16107">This service returns a pointer to the topmost visible child of the current widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16108">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16108">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16109">**current** 現在のウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16109">**current** Pointer to current widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16110">**widget_return** リターン ウィジェット ポインターへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16110">**widget_return** Pointer to return widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16111">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16111">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16112">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ポインターが返されました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16112">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16113">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ウィジェット ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16113">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16114">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16114">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16115">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16115">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16116">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16116">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16117">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16117">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve topmost visible widget on the display */

GX_WIDGET *get_top_window(GX_WINDOW_ROOT *root)
{
    GX_WIDGET *top_window;
    UINT status;

    status = gx_widget_top_visible_child_find(root, &top_window);
    if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        return top_window;
    }
    return GX_NULL;
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_type_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16124">gx_widget_type_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16124">gx_widget_type_find</span></span>
### <a name="search-for-a-widget-of-the-requested-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16125">要求された種類のウィジェットを検索する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16125">Search for a widget of the requested type</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16126">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16126">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_type_find(
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    USHORT widget_id,
    GX_WIDGET **return_widget)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16127">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16127">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16128">このサービスにより、要求された種類のウィジェットが検索されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16128">This service searches for a widget of the requested type.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16129">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16129">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16130">**widget** ウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16130">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16131">**return_width** ウィジェット幅の描画先へのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16131">**return_width** Pointer to destination for widget width</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16132">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16132">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16133">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ウィジェット幅の取得に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16133">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget width get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16134">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16134">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16135">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16135">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16136">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16136">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16137">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16137">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16138">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16138">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET *retrieved_widget;

/* Find horizontal scrollbar under “parent_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_type_find(&parent_widget,
                GX_TYPE_HORIZONTAL_SCROLL_BAR, &retrieved_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the horizontal scrollbar widget is retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_width_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16175">gx_widget_width_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16175">gx_widget_width_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-width"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16176">ウィジェットの幅を取得する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16176">Get widget width</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16177">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16177">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_width_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_VALUE *return_width)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16178">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16178">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16179">このサービスにより、ウィジェットの幅が取得されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16179">This service gets the width of the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16180">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16180">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16181">**widget** ウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16181">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16182">**return_width** ウィジェット幅の描画先へのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16182">**return_width** Pointer to destination for widget width</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16183">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16183">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16184">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ウィジェット幅の取得に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16184">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget width get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16185">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16185">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16186">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16186">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16187">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16187">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16188">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16188">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16189">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16189">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16190">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16190">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE my_widget_width;

/* Get width of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_width_get(&my_widget, &my_widget_width);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the width of widget “my_widget” is in “my_widget_width”. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_client_height_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16227">gx_window_client_height_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16227">gx_window_client_height_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-window-client-height"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16228">ウィンドウ クライアントの高さを取得する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16228">Get window client height</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16229">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16229">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_client_height_get(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
```

## <a name="gx_window_client_scroll"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16257">gx_window_client_scroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16257">gx_window_client_scroll</span></span>
### <a name="scroll-window-clients"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16258">ウィンドウ クライアントをスクロールする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16258">Scroll window clients</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16259">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16259">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_client_scroll(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    GX_VALUE x_scroll,
    GX_VALUE y_scroll);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16260">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16260">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16261">このサービスにより、指定された量だけウィンドウ クライアントをスクロールします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16261">This service scrolls the window clients by the specified amount.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16262">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16262">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16263">**window** ウィンドウへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16263">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16264">**x_scroll** X 軸でスクロールする量</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16264">**x_scroll** Amount to scroll on the x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16265">**x_scroll** X 軸でスクロールする量</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16265">**y_scroll** Amount to scroll on the y-axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16266">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16266">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16267">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ウィンドウ クライアントのスクロールに成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16267">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window client scroll</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16268">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16268">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16269">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16269">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16270">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16270">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16271">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) スクロール値が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16271">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Scroll value(s) not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16272">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16272">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16274">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16274">Example</span></span>

```C

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the clients of window “my_window” have been scrolled. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_close"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16319">gx_window_close</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16319">gx_window_close</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16321">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16321">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_close(GX_WINDOW *window);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16328">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16328">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16329">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16329">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16330">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16330">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

## <a name="gx_window_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16349">gx_window_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16349">gx_window_create</span></span>
### <a name="create-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16350">ウィンドウを作成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16350">Create window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16351">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16351">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_create(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT window_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16352">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16352">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16353">このサービスによりウィンドウが作成されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16353">This service creates a window.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16354">GX_WINDOW は GX_WIDGET から派生し、すべての gx_widget API サービスをサポートします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16354">GX_WINDOW is derived from GX_WIDGET and supports all gx_widget API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16355">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16355">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16356">**window** ウィンドウ コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16356">**window** Pointer to window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16357">**name** ウィンドウの論理名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16357">**name** Logical name of window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16358">**parent** 親ウィジェットへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16358">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16359">**style** ウィンドウのスタイル。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16359">**style** Window style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16360">**付録 D** には、ウィジェット固有のスタイルだけでなく、すべてのウィジェット用に事前に定義された一般的なスタイルが含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16360">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16361">**widget_id** アプリケーションで定義された、ウィンドウの ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16361">**window_id** Application-defined ID of the window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16362">**size** ウィンドウのサイズ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16362">**size** Size of the window</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16363">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16363">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16364">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ウィンドウの作成に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16364">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16365">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16365">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16366">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16366">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16367">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) ウィジェットが既に作成されています</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16367">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16368">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) ウィジェット コントロール ブロック サイズが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16368">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16369">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16369">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16370">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16370">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16371">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16371">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16372">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16372">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WINDOW my_window;

/* Create window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_create(&my_window, "my window",
                          &my_parent_window, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
                          MY_WINDOW_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS window “my_window” has been created. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16377">gx_window_client_width_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16377">gx_window_client_width_get</span></span>

## <a name="gx_window_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16388">gx_window_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16388">gx_window_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16389">ウィンドウを描画する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16389">Draw window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16390">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16390">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_window_draw(GX_WINDOW *window);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16391">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16391">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16392">このサービスにより、ウィンドウが描画されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16392">This service draws a window.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16393">このサービスは、通常、キャンバスの更新中に内部的に呼び出されますが、カスタムのウィンドウ描画関数から呼び出すこともできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16393">This service is normally called internally during canvas refresh, but can also be called from custom window drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16394">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16394">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16395">**window** ウィンドウ コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16395">**window** Pointer to window control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16396">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16396">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16397">**なし**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16397">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16398">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16398">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16399">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16399">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16400">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16400">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom window draw function. */

VOID my_custom_window_draw(GX_WINDOW *window)
{
    /* Call default window draw. */
    gx_window_draw(window);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_window_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16416">gx_window_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16416">gx_window_event_process</span></span>
### <a name="process-window-event"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16417">ウィンドウ イベントを処理する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16417">Process window event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16418">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16418">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_event_process(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16419">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16419">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16420">このサービスにより、このウィンドウのイベントが処理されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16420">This service processes an event for this window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16421">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16421">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16422">**window** ウィンドウ コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16422">**window** Pointer to window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16423">**event** 処理するイベントへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16423">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16424">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16424">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16425">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ウィンドウ イベントの処理に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16425">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window event processing</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16426">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16426">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16427">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16427">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16428">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16428">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16429">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16429">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16430">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16430">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16431">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16431">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic window event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_window_event_process(GX_WINDOW *window,
                                 GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
        case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;
        default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default window
            event processing */
            status = gx_window_event_process(window, event);
            break;
        }
        return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_window_execute"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16447">gx_window_execute</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16447">gx_window_execute</span></span>
### <a name="modally-execute-a-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16448">ウィンドウをモーダルで実行する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16448">Modally execute a window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16449">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16449">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_execute(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    ULONG *return_ptr)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16450">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16450">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16451">このサービスにより、モーダルでウィンドウが実行されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16451">This service modally executes a window.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16452">ウィンドウ クライアント領域外のユーザー入力 (ペン イベントなど) は無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16452">Any user input (pen events, etc.) outside of the window client area will be ignored.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16453">この関数は、連続的なブロッキング実行ループに入り、モデルの実行が終了するまで呼び出し元に戻らないことに注意してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16453">Note that this function enters a continuous blocking execution loop, and does not return to the caller until the model execution is terminated.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16454">モーダル実行は、受信したイベントのイベント処理によって 0 以外の状態値が返された場合、または gx_window_close API 関数が呼び出された場合に終了します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16454">Modal execution terminates when the event processing for any received event returns a non-zero status value, or when the gx_window_close API function is invoked.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16455">0 以外のイベント処理リターンコードは、この API に渡された return_ptr を通じて呼び出し元に返されます</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16455">The non-zero event processing return code is returned to the caller through the return_ptr passed into this API</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16456">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16456">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16457">**window** ウィンドウ コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16457">**window** Pointer to window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16458">**return_ptr** モーダル実行の終了状態を保存する場所。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16458">**return_ptr** Location to save modal execution exit status.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16459">GX_NULL の可能性があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16459">May be GX_NULL.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16460">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16460">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16461">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 実行が成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16461">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful execution</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16462">**GX_SYSTEM_EVENT_RECEIVE_ERROR** (0x05) イベント キューからのピックアップ イベントに失敗しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16462">**GX_SYSTEM_EVENT_RECEIVE_ERROR(0x05)** Pickup event from event queue failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16463">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16463">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16464">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16464">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16465">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16465">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16466">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16466">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16467">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16467">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16468">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16468">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Execute a modal window. */
status = gx_window_execute(&my_window, &return_code);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the window was executed, and return_code holds the execution return code. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16478">gx_window_root_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16478">gx_window_root_event_process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16479">gx_window_root_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16479">gx_window_root_find</span></span>
