- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16481">gx_window_scrollbar_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16481">gx_window_scrollbar_find</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16482">gx_window_wallpaper_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16482">gx_window_wallpaper_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16483">gx_window_wallpaper_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16483">gx_window_wallpaper_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_window_root_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16484">gx_window_root_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16484">gx_window_root_create</span></span>
### <a name="create-a-root-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16485">ルート ウィンドウを作成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16485">Create a root window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16486">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16486">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_root_create(
    GX_WINDOW_ROOT *root_window,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16487">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16487">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16488">このサービスは、ルート ウィンドウを作成します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16488">This service creates a root window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16489">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16489">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16490">**root_window** ルート ウィンドウ コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16490">**root_window** Pointer to root window control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16491">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16491">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16492">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ルート ウィンドウの作成に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16492">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created root window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16493">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16493">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16494">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16494">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16495">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) ウィジェット コントロール ブロック サイズが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16495">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16496">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) ウィジェットは既に作成されています</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16496">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16497">使用可能な場所</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16497">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16498">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16498">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16499">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16499">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ROOT_WINDOW root_window;
GX_CANVAS canvas;

/* Create canvas here. */

/* Create a root window */
status = gx_window_root_create(&root_window, “root”, &canvas,
GX_STYLE_BORDER_NONE, GX_NULL, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the “root_window” is successfully created. */
```

### <a name="destroy-a-root-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16505">ルート ウィンドウを破棄する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16505">Destroy a root window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16506">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16506">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_root_delete(GX_WINDOW_ROOT *root_window)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16507">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16507">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16508">このサービスにより、ルート ウィンドウが削除されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16508">This service deletes a root window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16509">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16509">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16510">**root_window** ルート ウィンドウ コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16510">**root_window** Pointer to root window control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16511">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16511">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16512">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ルート ウィンドウの削除に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16512">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully deleted root window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16513">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16513">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16514">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16514">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16515">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16515">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16516">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR** (0x30) メモリ解放関数が定義されていません</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16516">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory free function is not defined</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16517">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16517">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16518">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16518">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16519">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16519">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Delete a root window */
status = gx_window_root_delete(&root_window);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “root_window” is destroyed. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_root_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16535">gx_window_root_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16535">gx_window_root_event_process</span></span>
### <a name="process-event-for-the-root-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16536">ルート ウィンドウのイベントを処理する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16536">Process event for the root window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16537">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16537">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_root_create(
    GX_WINDOW_ROOT *root_window,
    GX_EVENT *event)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16538">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16538">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16539">このサービスにより、指定されたルート ウィンドウのイベントが処理されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16539">This service processes events for the specified root window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16540">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16540">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16541">**root_window** ルート ウィンドウ コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16541">**root_window** Pointer to root window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16542">**event** 処理するイベントへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16542">**event** Pointer to the event to be processed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16543">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16543">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16544">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ルート ウィンドウ イベントの処理に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16544">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully processed root window event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16545">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16545">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16546">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16546">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16547">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16547">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16548">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16548">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16549">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16549">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic root window event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_root_window_event_process(GX_ROOT_WINDOW *root,
                                      GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default root window
            event processing */
        status = gx_window_root_event_process(root, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16564">gx_window_wallpaper_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16564">gx_window_wallpaper_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_window_root_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16565">gx_window_root_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16565">gx_window_root_find</span></span>
### <a name="find-root-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16566">ルート ウィンドウを探す</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16566">Find root window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16567">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16567">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_root_find(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_WINDOW_ROOT **return_root_window);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16568">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16568">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16569">このサービスにより、指定されたウィジェットのルート ウィンドウが探されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16569">This service finds the root window for the specified widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16570">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16570">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16571">**widget** ウィジェット コントロール ブロックへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16571">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16572">**return_root_window** 見つかったルート ウィンドウの宛先へのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16572">**return_root_window** Pointer to destination for found root window</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16573">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16573">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16574">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ルート ウィンドウが見つかりました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16574">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful root window find</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16575">**GX_FAILURE** (0x00) ルート ウィンドウが存在しません</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16575">**GX_FAILURE** (0x00) Root window not exist</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16576">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16576">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16577">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16577">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16578">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16578">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16579">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16579">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16580">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16580">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Find root window associated with window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_root_find(&my_window, &root_window);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “root_window” contains the root window for window “my_window”. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_scroll_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16596">gx_window_scroll_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16596">gx_window_scroll_info_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-window-scroll-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16597">ウィンドウのスクロール情報を取得する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16597">Get window scroll info</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16598">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16598">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_scroll_info_get(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    ULONG style,
    GX_SCROLL_INFO *return_scroll_info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16599">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16599">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16600">このサービスにより、ウィンドウのスクロール情報が取得されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16600">This service gets the window scroll information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16601">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16601">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16602">**window** ウィンドウへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16602">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16603">**style** GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL または GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16603">**style** GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL or GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16604">**return_scroll_info** スクロール情報の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16604">**return_scroll_info** Pointer to destination for scroll info.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16605">親ウィンドウは、この構造体を初期化して、親ウィンドウの合計サイズ、表示可能領域、スクロールの増分と制限をスクロールバーに通知します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16605">The parent window initializes this structure to inform the scrollbar of the parent window total size, viewable area, and scrolling increment and limits.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16606">デフォルトの実装では、表示可能領域として Windows クライアント領域が使用され、ピクセル単位でスクロールされますが、カスタマイズされたウィンドウの実装ではスクロール パラメーターを使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16606">The default implementation uses the windows client area as the viewable area and scrolls by pixels, but customized window implementation can utilize the scroll parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16607">**付録 I** には GX_SCROLL_INFO 構造の定義が含まれています</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16607">**Appendix I** contains the definition of the GX_SCROLL_INFO structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16608">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16608">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16609">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ウィンドウ スクロール情報の取得に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16609">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window scroll info get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16610">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16610">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16611">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16611">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16612">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) 種類が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16612">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Invalid type</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16613">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16613">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16614">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16614">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16615">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16615">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SCROLL_INFO scroll_info;

/* Get scroll information for window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_scroll_info_get(&my_window,
                    GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL, &scroll_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “scroll_info” contains the scroll information for window “my_window”. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_scrollbar_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16631">gx_window_scrollbar_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16631">gx_window_scrollbar_find</span></span>
### <a name="find-window-scrollbar"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16632">ウィンドウのスクロールバーを探す</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16632">Find window scrollbar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16633">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16633">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_scrollbar_find(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    USHORT type,
    GX_SCROLLBAR **return_scrollbar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16634">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16634">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16635">このサービスにより、指定されたウィンドウのスクロールバーが探されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16635">This service finds the scrollbar for the specified window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16636">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16636">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16637">**window** ウィンドウへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16637">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16638">**type** GX_TYPE_VERTICAL_SCROLL または GX_TYPE_HORIZONTAL_SCROLL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16638">**type** GX_TYPE_VERTICAL_SCROLL or GX_TYPE_HORIZONTAL_SCROLL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16639">**return_scrollbar** スクロールバーの宛先へのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16639">**return_scrollbar** Pointer to destination for scrollbar</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16640">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16640">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16641">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ウィンドウのスクロールバーが見つかりました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16641">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window scrollbar find</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16642">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09)スクロールバーが見つかりません</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16642">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) Scrollbar not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16643">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16643">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16644">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16644">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16645">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) 種類が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16645">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Invalid type</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16646">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16646">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16647">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16647">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16648">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16648">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Find horizontal scrollbar for window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_scrollbar_find(&my_window,
                 GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL, &my_scrollbar);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “my_scrollbar” contains the horizontal scrollbar for window “my_window”. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_wallpaper_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16664">gx_window_wallpaper_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16664">gx_window_wallpaper_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-window-wallpaper"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16665">ウィンドウの壁紙を取得する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16665">Get window wallpaper</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16666">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16666">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_wallpaper_get(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID *return_wallpaper_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16667">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16667">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16668">このサービスにより、指定されたウィンドウの壁紙が取得されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16668">This service gets the wallpaper for the specified window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16669">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16669">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16670">**window** ウィンドウへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16670">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16671">**return_wallpaper_id** 壁紙のリソース ID の宛先へのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16671">**return_wallpaper_id** Pointer to destination for resource ID of wallpaper</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16672">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16672">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16673">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ウィンドウの壁紙の取得に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16673">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window wallpaper get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16674">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16674">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16675">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16675">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16676">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16676">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16677">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16677">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16678">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16678">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RESOURCE_ID my_window_wallpaper;

/* Get wallpaper for window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_wallpaper_get(&my_window, &my_window_wallpaper);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “my_window_wallpaper” contains the wallpaper resource ID for window “my_window”. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_wallpaper_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16694">gx_window_wallpaper_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16694">gx_window_wallpaper_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-window-wallpaper"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16695">ウィンドウの壁紙を設定する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16695">Set window wallpaper</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16696">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16696">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_wallpaper_set(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID wallpaper_id,
    GX_BOOL tile);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16697">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16697">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16698">このサービスにより、指定されたウィンドウの壁紙が設定されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16698">This service sets the wallpaper for the specified window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16699">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16699">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16700">**window** ウィンドウへのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16700">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16701">**wallpaper_id** 使用する壁紙のリソース ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16701">**wallpaper_id** Resource ID of wallpaper to use</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16702">**tile** GX_TRUE の場合には壁紙は並べて表示され、そうでない場合には並べて表示されません</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16702">**tile** Wallpaper is tiled if GX_TRUE, otherwise wallpaper is not tiled</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16703">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16703">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16704">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ウィンドウの壁紙の設定に成功しました</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16704">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window wallpaper set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16705">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) この関数の呼び出し元が無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16705">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16706">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16706">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16707">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) ウィジェットが無効です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16707">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16708">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16708">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16709">初期化とスレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16709">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="af9f7-16710">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af9f7-16710">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set wallpaper for window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_wallpaper_set(&my_window,
                                 MY_WALLPAPER_RESOURCE_ID,
                                 GX_TRUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the wallpaper for window “my_window” is set. */
```
